# Russia events by soclibdictator

add_namespace = russia
add_namespace = rcw
add_namespace = rusd
add_namespace = rusfor
add_namespace = orth
add_namespace = rusdem
add_namespace = russoc
add_namespace = russianews
add_namespace = rusdroz
add_namespace = rusdeminfo
add_namespace = rus_karelian_crisis

#Intro events

country_event = { #History
	id = russia.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1" }
	title = russia.1.t 
	desc = russia.1.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { tag = RUS }
	option = {
		name = russia.1.a
		country_event = {
			id = russia.2
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1.b
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
		}
		country_event = russia.1017
		country_event = {
			id = russia.2
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #History
	id = russia.1017
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1017" }
	title = russia.1017.t 
	desc = russia.1017.d 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

		country_event = russia.1018
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1017.b
		country_event = russia.1
	}
}

			id = russia.2017
			days = 1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian economy
	id = russia.2017
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2017" }
	title = russia.2017.t
	desc = russia.2017.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_rus_economic

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.2017.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.3
				days = 21
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.5
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #reparations
	id = russia.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.3" }
	title = russia.3.t
	desc = russia.3.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_treaty_brest_livtosk
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.3.a
		add_stability = -0.24
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_austerity_measures
			days = 365
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.4
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #reparations for Germany
	id = russia.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.4" }
	title = russia.4.t
	desc = russia.4.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_treaty_brest_livtosk

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.4.a
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = ger_brest_litovsk
			days = 365
		}
	}
}

#Politics
country_event = { #Kerensky
	id = russia.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.5" }
	title = russia.5.t
	desc = russia.5.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kerensky_assassination
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_kerensky_assasination
					option = RUS_KERENSKY_LIVE_BITCH
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.6
			days = 1
		}
		add_ideas = rus_political_instability
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		add_manpower = -1
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = worldnews.15
					days = 1
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = worldtension.10
					days = 1
				}
			}
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.897
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { #Lives 
		name = russia.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_kerensky_assasination
					option = RUS_KERENSKY_DIE
				}
			}
		}
			
		country_event = {
			id = russia.7
			days = 1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER
		set_country_leader_portrait = {
			portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Alexander_Kerensky_I_Lived_Bitch.png"
		}
		set_country_flag = PORTRAIT_PICKER_ACTIVE
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_global_flag = RUS_I_lived_bitch_flag
		add_ideas = {
			rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.12
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Aftermath of assassination
	id = russia.6
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.6" }
	title = russia.6.t
	desc = russia.6.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Russia_Kerensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.6.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = coalition_power
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lkdp_will_leave_coalition
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rkdp_will_leave_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 3 }
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 }
			remove_soclib_from_coalition = yes
			remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
			RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.13
				days = 3
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.10
				days = 4
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.9
				days = 12
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.14
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.1
				days = 6
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.30
				days = 25
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.3
				days = 75
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.6
				days = 80
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.8
				days = 85
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.5
				days = 89
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.10
				days = 92
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.4
				days = 95
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.11
				days = 100
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.100
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.101
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.102
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.103
				days = 55
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.104
				days = 55
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.105
				days = 20
			}
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = social_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes	
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				name = RUS_left_kadets_party
				long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = market_liberal
				name = RUS_left_kadets_party
				long_name = RUS_right_kadets_party_long
			}			
			mp_support_calc = yes
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_new_soclib = RUS.party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_new_soclib = 2 }

			set_temp_variable = { RUS_new_socdem = RUS.party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_new_socdem = RUS_new_soclib }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = RUS_new_socdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = RUS_new_soclib }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@national_populist }

			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_new_socdem = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = RUS_new_socdem
				social_liberal = RUS_new_soclib
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = party_popularity_100@national_populist
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.21
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
	}
}
	
country_event = { #Next morning
	id = russia.7
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.7" }
	title = russia.7.t
	desc = russia.7.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Russia_Kerensky
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.7.a
		add_stability = -0.14
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.103
				days = 5
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.8
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Gorgulov Trial
	id = russia.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.10"}
	title = russia.10.t
	desc = russia.10.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_trial
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.10.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_GOR_ALIVE
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_small = yes
		add_stability = 0.04
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability
				add_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		add_stability = -0.04
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability
				add_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Pardon Gorgulov?
	id = russia.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.11"}
	title = russia.11.t
	desc = russia.11.d
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_event
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Boris Savinkov"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		has_country_flag = RUS_GOR_ALIVE
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russia.11.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.12
				days = 20
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.11.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.01
		add_political_power = -25
	}
	
}
country_event = { #Gorgulov Coups Savinkov
	id = russia.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.12"}
	title = russia.12.t
	desc = russia.12.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	picture = GFX_rus_gorguloff_army_event
	option = {
		name = russia.12.a
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Pavel Gorgulov"
			desc = "POLITICS_GORGULOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Gorgulov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = scythianism_subtype
		}
		set_country_flag = savinkov_dead
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_The_Vozhd_Is_Dead
		end_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.28
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Motion
	id = russia.14
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.14"}
	title = russia.14.t
	desc = russia.14.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_rus_duma_take_power
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {

		add_stability = -0.01
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.17
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Questions of bolsheviks
	id = russia.16
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.16"}
	title = russia.16.t
	desc = russia.16.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_nsp
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.16.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = bolsheviks_allowed
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_country_flag = appease_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = fight_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR	}
					AND = {
						has_stability < -0.29
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
							}
							has_game_rule = {
								rule = RUS_post_assassination
								option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop_small = yes
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		clr_country_flag = nsp_banned
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "The Senate"
				desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype
			}
		}	
	}	
	option = {
		name = russia.16.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = red_terror
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop_large = yes
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_country_flag = fight_socialists
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				AND = {
					has_stability > -0.3
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
						}
						has_game_rule = {
							rule = RUS_post_assassination
							option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_political_instability
			add_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 2
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #Black monday hits russia
	id = russia.20
	immediate = { 
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.20"		
		hidden_effect = {
			ALO = {
				country_event = {
					id = alash.56
					days = 2
				}
			}
			TRK = {
				country_event = {
					id = turkestan.209
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = russia.20.t 
	desc = russia.20.d
	picture = NOR_black_monday
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.20.a
		add_ideas = rus_black_monday
		complete_national_focus = RUS_black_monday
		RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes		
	}
}
country_event = { #Black monday hits russia
	id = russia.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.21"}
	title = russia.21.t 
	desc = russia.21.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_senate_duma_plans
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.21.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
				}
			}		
		}
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_Nationalize_German_Assets }
		set_country_flag = RUS_black_monday_duma_plan
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_black_monday
			add_idea = rus_black_monday_duma_1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.21.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_taxes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_black_monday_senate_plan
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_ep_pop = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_black_monday
			add_idea = rus_black_monday_senate_1
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Unlock foreign policy
	id = russia.23
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.23 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = unlock_foreign
		}
	}
	title = russia.23.t
	desc = russia.23.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bear_expansion

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}

	option = {
		name = russia.23.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_foreign_tooltip
		add_political_power = -100
		add_stability = -0.05
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 2 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 217 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 2 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 3
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.23.b
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_foreign_tooltip
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 219 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			prioritize = { 217 }
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				free_building_slots = { building = arms_factory size > 0 include_locked = yes }
				impassable = no
			}
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = arms_factory
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Power Struggle
	id = russia.28
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.28"}
	title = russia.28.t
	desc = russia.28.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.28.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_gorgulov_party_long
			name = RUS_gorgulov_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Pavel_T_Gorgulov_hog_npo
			RUS_Ivan_Kolesnikov_for_npo
			RUS_Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_eco_npo
			RUS_Pyotr_Tokmakov_sec_npo
		}
		if = { limit = { has_country_flag = rus_solidarism }
			clr_country_flag = rus_solidarism
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_successors_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_GOR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.7845
				days = 2
			}
		}

	}
	option = {
		name = russia.28.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Viktor Abakumov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Abakumov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = national_security_state_subtype 
			traits = { vozhd }
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_abakumov_party_long
			name = RUS_abakumov_party
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_hog_npo
			RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau
			RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_sec_npo
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_successors_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_siloviki
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.28.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			name = RUS_solidarist_party
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Viktor Baydalakov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Baydalakov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = solidarism_subtype
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Viktor_M_Baydalakov_hog_npo
			RUS_Aleksey_N_Tolstoy_for_npo
			RUS_Arkadiy_P_Stolypin_eco_npo
			RUS_Anatoliy_MacReady_Stenroos_sec_npo
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }
			clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russia_nsnp_democratic_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
		subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
		RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
			}
		}
		
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.606
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Socialist demonstration
	id = russia.30
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.30"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_demonstration
	title = russia.30.t 
	desc = russia.30.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.30.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = fight_socialists
		add_stability = -0.1
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russia.16
			days = 5
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.31
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.30.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION }
					AND = {
						has_stability < -0.2
						OR = {
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION }
							has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = appease_socialists
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russia.16
			days = 5
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russia.31
			days = 2
		}
	}
}

					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL }

country_event = { #Clashes in Petrograd
	id = russia.32
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.32"}
	title = russia.32.t 
	desc = {
		text = russia.32.d.reject_sav
		trigger = { has_country_flag = fight_nationalists }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.32.d.accept_sav
		trigger = { has_country_flag = appease_nationalists }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_clashes
	option = {
		name = russia.32.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
			factor = 6
				OR = {
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = appease_socialists
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = fight_nationalists
							has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
						}
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = fight_socialists
							has_country_flag = appease_socialists
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR }
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		set_country_flag = clashes_peace
		country_event = {
			id = russia.33
			days = 1
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.32.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_REVOLUTION }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_post_assassination	option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = fight_socialists
					has_country_flag = fight_nationalists
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		set_country_flag = clashes_army
		
		country_event = {
			id = russia.33
			days = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Day after
	id = russia.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.33" }
	title = russia.33.t 
	desc = { 
		text = russia.33.d-peace 
		trigger = { has_country_flag = clashes_peace }
	}
	desc = { 
		text = russia.33.d-army 
		trigger = { has_country_flag = clashes_army }
	}
	picture = GFX_rus_day_after
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.33.a
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = clashes_peace
			has_country_flag = fight_nationalists
		}
		set_country_flag = socialist_negot
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.33.b
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = clashes_peace
			has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
		}
		set_country_flag = nationalist_negot
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		set_country_flag = plsr_banned
		set_country_flag = nsp_banned
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_political_instability
			add_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 2
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.33.c
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = clashes_army
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_political_power = -100
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes	
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.33.d
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = clashes_peace
			has_country_flag = appease_nationalists
			has_country_flag = appease_socialists 
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Snap Elections
	id = russia.39
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.39" }
	title = russia.39.t
	desc = russia.39.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_call_election
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.39.a
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = snap_elections
		custom_effect_tooltip = snap_elections
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.42
				days = 10
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.43
				days = 13
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.44
				days = 16
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.45
				days = 19
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.46
				days = 22
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.49
				days = 25
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				last_election = "1932.5.5"
				election_frequency = 48
				elections_allowed = yes
			}
			RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
			ALO = {
				country_event = alash.893
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = { #Chernov speaks
	id = russia.42
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.42"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_chernov_speaks
	title = russia.40.t 
	desc = russia.40.d 
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.42.a
		add_stability = 0.01
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.42.b
		add_stability = 0.01
		country_event = rusdeminfo.13
	}
	
}

country_event = { #Unlock Military
	id = russia.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.53" }
	title = russia.53.t
	desc = russia.53.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.53.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_military_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = unlock_military
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = nsp_in_power
						has_idea = RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
					}
					AND = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
						rsdrp_in_power = yes	
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = rusdem.109
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Choose military
	id = russia.54
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.54" }
	title = russia.54.t
	desc = russia.54.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.54.a
		complete_national_focus = RUS_War_Of_Numbers
		set_country_flag = RUS_War_Of_Numbers_chosen
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.54.b
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Extensive_Planning
		set_country_flag = RUS_Extensive_Planning_chosen
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.54.c
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Overwhelming_Firepower
		set_country_flag = RUS_Overwhelming_Firepower_chosen
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.54.e
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Spearhead_Doctrine
		set_country_flag = RUS_Spearhead_Doctrine_chosen
		if = {
			limit = {

					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin

			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes

		}
	}
}

		text = russia.55.d.kerenskydead
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.55.d.kerenskylives
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = russia.55.a
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Investments
	id = russia.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.59" }
	title = russia.59.t
	desc = russia.59.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.59.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_actual_major = yes
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						tag = GER
						tag = JAP
						tag = SOV
						tag = TRM
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.64
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Offer from Russia
	id = russia.64
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.64" }
	title = russia.64.t
	desc = russia.64.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.64.a
		
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = accepted_russian_offer
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.65
				days = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.38000
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.64.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		set_country_flag = declined_russian_offer
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.66
				days = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.38000
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Hidden Event to clear flags
	id = russia.38000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.38000" }
	hidden = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		clr_country_flag = accepted_russian_offer
		clr_country_flag = declined_russian_offer
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = rus_investments_get
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Investing in the future
	id = russia.69
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.69" }
	title = russia.69.t
	desc = russia.69.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.69.a
		set_country_flag = future_invest
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.69.b
		set_country_flag = future_invest
		add_stability = 0.08
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.69.c
		set_country_flag = future_invest
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_one_random_military_factory = yes
		add_one_random_military_factory = yes
		add_one_random_military_factory = yes		
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.69.e
		set_country_flag = future_invest
		add_one_random_civilian_factory = yes
		random_owned_controlled_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = ROOT
				NOT = {
					free_building_slots = {
						building = infrastructure
						size < 5
					}
					region = 147
					state = 580
					state = 581
					state = 262
					state = 397
					state = 644
				}
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = infrastructure
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.06
	}
}

				target = RUS

			idea = rus_autarky
			days = 1095
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.71
				days = 1095
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {

country_event = {
	id = russia.101
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.101"}
	title = russia.101.t
	desc = russia.101.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.101.a		
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_neostolypinist_reforms }
			swap_ideas = { 
				remove_idea = RUS_neostolypinist_reforms
				add_idea = RUS_socialization_of_land
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_national_agrarian_fund }
			swap_ideas = { 
				remove_idea = RUS_national_agrarian_fund
				add_idea = RUS_socialization_of_land
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_socialization_of_land
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_Rural_Obschinas_tooltip
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_state_category = four
						has_state_category = three
						has_state_category = two
						has_state_category = one
					}
				}
				add_state_modifier = {
					modifier = {
						local_resources_factor = 0.15
						local_supplies = 0.3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			40 = {
				add_two_random_civilian_factories = yes
			}
			40 = {
				add_two_random_military_factories = yes
			}
			20 = {
				add_one_random_infrastructure = yes
				add_one_random_infrastructure = yes 
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Emergency Committee
	id = russia.105
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.105"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_mission = RUS_Committee_Dealing_With_Terror
			activate_mission = RUS_Terrorist_Attack
			activate_mission = RUS_Getting_Ready_For_Next_Elections
			activate_mission = RUS_Getting_Ready_For_Presidential_Elections
			setup_kerensky_variables = yes
		}
	}
	title = russia.105.t
	desc = russia.105.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.105.a
		add_stability = 0.025
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Committee
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_Kerensky_Committee
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
	}
}

		set_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 0 }
		set_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 0 }

			id = russia.108
			days = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.109
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
	}

		name = russia.108.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_tsereteli
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_kdp

		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
	}

			factor = 10
		}

		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }

	}

country_event = {#Compromise?
	id = russia.109
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.109"}
	title = russia.109.t
	desc = russia.109.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_psr_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_kdp
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_rsdrp
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = -1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 8
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_kdp_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.109.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_menshevik_reform
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_KER_upset_psr
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_kdp_agree = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { rus_ker_rsdrp_agree = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { rus_ker_psr_agree < 0 }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			country_event = {
				id = russia.111
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.110
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Coalition Secured
	id = russia.110
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.110"}
	title = russia.110.t
	desc = russia.110.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.110.a
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rkdp_will_leave_coalition
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rsdrp_will_join_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
			remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 1 } # RSDRP  (Governing)		
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 } # RSDRP  (Governing)		
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_zenzinov }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_hog_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_sec_sde
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_has_chosen_tsereteli }
			remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
			remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_eco_sde
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
			remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
			add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_M_Zenzinov_eco_sde
			add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_sec_sde			
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		set_variable = { rsdrp_mp = Duma_Party_Seats^3 }
		senators_support_calc = yes
		
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = 15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = -15 }
	}
}
country_event = {#Coalition Failed
	id = russia.111
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.111"}
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.kdp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.psr
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = russia.111.t.rsdrp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.kdp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.psr
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russia.111.d.rsdrp
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.111.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_kdp_leaves_negotiations
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_psr_leaves_negotiations
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lkdp_will_leave_coalition
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rkdp_will_leave_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 3 }
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 }
			remove_soclib_from_coalition = yes
			remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
		}
		
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		mp_support_calc = yes
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = -15 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 15 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.111.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_rsdrp_leaves_negotiations
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Find_A_Compromise
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_coalition = -5 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 5 }
	}	
}

			}

		add_manpower = -1

					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
					}
				}

				id = russia.128
				days = 14
				}

				}

				days = 14
				}

		}

country_event = {#Retire
	id = russia.131
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.131"}
	title = russia.131.t
	desc = russia.131.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.131.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		clr_country_flag = PORTRAIT_PICKER_ACTIVE
		set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
		RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.147
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.131.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military
			}
			add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 25 }
			add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = 3 }
			country_event = {
				id = russia.120
				hours = 6
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Appease_Military }
			}
			random_list = {
				45 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russia.141
						days = 1
					}
				}
				15 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russia.142
						days = 1
					}
				}
				40 = {
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.131.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		add_stability = -0.08
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_political_instability1
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = rus_political_instability1
				add_idea = rus_political_instability
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_strength_opposition = -8 }
	}
	
}

country_event = {#Savinkov arrested
	id = russia.133
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.133"}
	title = russia.133.t
	desc = russia.133.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.133.a
		add_manpower = -1
		add_political_power = -100
		set_country_flag = savinkov_dead
	}
}
country_event = {#State of Emergency
	id = russia.120
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.120"}
	title = russia.120.t
	desc = russia.120.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.120.a
		hidden_effect = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_liberal
				elections_allowed = no
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
	}
}
country_event = {#Purge the leftists
	id = russia.134
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.134" }
	title = russia.134.t
	desc = russia.134.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.134.a #Thus unto all enemies of the state!
		add_stability = 0.08
		add_manpower = -20000
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Boris Kamkov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Kamkov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
		}
		set_country_flag = leftists_purged
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.118
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.135
				days = 60
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { coalition_target = token:syndicalist }
				has_coalition_with_target = yes
			}
			set_temp_variable = { coalition_partner_var = token:syndicalist }
			remove_from_coalition = yes
		}
	}
}

			}

country_event = { #Purge them all?
	id = russia.138
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.138" }
	title = russia.138.t
	desc = russia.138.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		name = russia.138.a
		add_stability = 0.04
		add_manpower = -3000
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.05
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.139
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		name = russia.138.b
		add_stability = -0.04
		add_manpower = -20000
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_sec_npo
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.139
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

	}

country_event = {#Elections
	id = russia.121
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.121"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_1937_election = yes }	
		set_country_flag = rus_elections_1937_over
	}	
	title = russia.121.t
	desc = russia.121.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.121.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		add_ideas = RUS_Irakliy_G_Tsereteli_hog_sde
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_M_Nikitin_for_sde
			RUS_Boris_I_Nikolayevsky_eco_sde
			RUS_Fyodor_I_Dan_sec_sde
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_democrat_party
			long_name = RUS_social_democrat_party_long
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_rsdrp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_kdp_victory_in_elections = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_vns_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_kdp_vns_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		add_ideas = RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Mikhail_A_Taube_for_sco
			RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco
			RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_sco
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		clr_country_flag = snap_elections
		country_event = russia.1210
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_psr_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_rrdo_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_psr_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_dembloc_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.121
				days = 1825
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.121.f
		trigger = {
			RUS_nrpr_victory_in_elections = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = unlock_economy
		clr_country_flag = disable_duma
		hidden_effect = { RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes }
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
			RUS_Aleksandr_Antonov_eco_npo
			RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_democracy		
		add_stability = 0.1
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
				days = 600
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_nrpr_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party
			long_name = RUS_mutual_socdems_party_long
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_liberal
			name = RUS_left_kadets_party
			long_name = RUS_left_kadets_party_long
		}
		country_event = russia.1210
	}		
}
country_event = { #Retire
	id = russia.1210
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1210"}
	title = russia.1210.t
	desc = russia.1210.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1210.a
		add_stability = -0.06
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		clr_country_flag = PORTRAIT_PICKER_ACTIVE
		set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_large = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		clr_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_LIVES
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		set_country_flag = unlock_military
		set_country_flag = RUS_KRSKY_DEATH
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = { country_event = rusdem.62 }
	}
}

country_event = {#Kerensky arrested
	id = russia.141
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.141"}
	title = russia.141.t
	desc = russia.141.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.141.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_country_flag = kornilov_supported_us
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		clr_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		add_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
		
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Viktor Chernov"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Chernov.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = social_liberal_subtype
					traits = { RUS_savvy_politician  }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
				name = RUS_social_liberal_party
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { date < 1936.7.7 }
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.200
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.50
					days = 5
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
	}		
	
	option = {
		name = russia.141.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_country_flag = kornilov_supported_us
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		clr_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		activate_mission = RUS_form_coalition
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rkdp_will_leave_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 }
			remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "The Senate"
			desc = "POLITICS_SENATE_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_The_Senate.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = social_liberal_subtype
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.1
			days = 7
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.16
				days = 15
			}
			#country_event = {
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 70
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.522
				days = 85
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
				name = RUS_social_liberal_party
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
	}
