country_event = {#Kornilov coups Kerensky
	id = russia.143
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.143"}
	title = russia.141.t
	desc = russia.143.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.141.a
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_DICT
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		add_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
		
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Viktor Chernov"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Viktor_Chernov.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = social_liberal_subtype
					traits = { RUS_savvy_politician  }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_liberal
				long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
				name = RUS_social_liberal_party
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { date < 1936.7.7 }
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.200
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.50
					days = 5
				}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		}
	}
}

			base = 20
		}

				days = 10

				days = 13
			}

			}

				id = russia.45
				days = 19
			}

				days = 22

				days = 25

			}

				days = 10
			}

				days = 20
			}

				days = 50
			}

				days = 50

country_event = {#Kerensky
	id = russia.149
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.149"}
	title = russia.149.t
	desc = russia.149.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russia.149.a
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.150
				days = 15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked }
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = unlock_economy
			}
			clr_country_flag = unlock_economy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = unlock_military }
			}
			set_country_flag = unlock_military
		}
		add_stability = 0.075
		army_experience = 50
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_russian_army
		country_event = russia.54
	}
}

				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype

country_event = { #Kerensky Retires?
	id = russia.153
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.153"}
	title = russia.153.t
	desc = russia.153.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_subject = no
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Alexandr Kerensky"
		}
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Senate }
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Soc_Lib_Dictator }
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Appease_Military }
		has_country_flag = democratic_block_coalition
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.153.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = sorokin_psr_candidate
		country_event = {
			id = russia.154
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.153.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}		
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = kerensky_psr_candidate
	}	
}

###Terror
country_event = {
	id = rusd.998 #Hidden event to fire unrest events
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.999"
	}

	option = { #Political Murder
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_murder }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_murder days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.1
	}
	option = { #Bombing
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_bombing }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_bombing days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.3
	}
	option = { #Peasant unrest
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_peasant_unrest }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peasant_unrest days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -5 }
		country_event = rusd.4
	}
	option = { #Agitation in the countryside
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_agitation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_agitation days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -2 }
		country_event = rusd.5
	}
	option = { #Workers' demonstration
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_demonstration }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_demonstration days = 50 value = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -2 }
		country_event = rusd.7
	}
	option = { #Workers' strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
				has_country_flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -4 }
		country_event = rusd.8
	}
	option = { #General strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general_malus
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = -10 }
		country_event = rusd.13
	}
	option = { #nothing
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 7
		}
		add_to_variable = { kerensky_endurance_regime = 6 }
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = rusd.999 #Hidden event to fire unrest events
	hidden = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.999"
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 15
				random = 300
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Political Murder
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_murder }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_murder days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.1
	}
	option = { #Bombing
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_bombing }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_political_bombing days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.3
	}
	option = { #Peasant unrest
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_peasant_unrest }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_peasant_unrest days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.4
	}
	option = { #Agitation in the countryside
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_agitation }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_agitation days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.5
	}
	option = { #Workers' demonstration
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_demonstration }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 3
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_demonstration days = 50 value = 1 }
		country_event = rusd.7
	}
	option = { #Workers' strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
				has_country_flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
		}
		country_event = rusd.8
	}
	option = { #General strike
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general
				has_idea = rus_fulfilled_strike_general_malus
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		country_event = rusd.13
	}
	option = { #nothing
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 7
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Political Murder
	id = rusd.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.1" }
	title = rusd.1.t
	desc = rusd.1.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.1.a
		add_stability = -0.04
	}
}

country_event = { #Bombing
	id = rusd.3
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.3" }
	title = rusd.3.t
	desc = rusd.3.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.1.a
		add_stability = -0.03
	}
}

country_event = { #Peasant unrest
	id = rusd.4
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.4" }
	title = rusd.4.t
	desc = rusd.4.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.4.a
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned }
			RUS_increase_plsr_pop_small = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop_small = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Agitation in the countryside
	id = rusd.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.5" }
	title = rusd.5.t
	desc = rusd.5.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.5.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop_small = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_stability < -0.1
					NOT = { has_idea = rus_negot_peasants }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.6
					days = 60
					random_hours = 720
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.5.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_stability < 0.2
					NOT = { has_idea = rus_negot_peasants }
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.6
					days = 60
					random_hours = 720
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Major peasant unrest
	id = rusd.6
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.6" }
	title = rusd.6.t
	desc = rusd.6.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.6.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.6.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop_small = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_negot_peasants
			days = 150
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.6.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_stability = 0.03
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_negot_peasants
			days = 365
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Workers' strike
	id = rusd.8
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.8" }
	title = rusd.8.t
	desc = rusd.8.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.8.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
			days = 120
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.8.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
		}
		add_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.9
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.8.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
		add_stability = -0.04
	}
}

country_event = { #Negotiating with the strikers
	id = rusd.9
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.9" }
	title = rusd.9.t
	desc = rusd.9.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.9.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.10
				days = 25
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.9.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = -0.01
		remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
			days = 60
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes days = 120 value = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.9.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_fulfilled_strike
			days = 90
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes days = 120 value = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Harsh measures
	id = rusd.10
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.10" }
	title = rusd.10.t
	desc = rusd.10.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.10.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		set_country_flag = { flag = RUS_disable_minor_strikes days = 120 value = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.10.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.11
				days = 100
				random = 2400
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Workers give up
	id = rusd.11
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.11" }
	title = rusd.11.t
	desc = rusd.11.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.11.a
		add_stability = 0.06
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.12
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Factories return to work
	id = rusd.12
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.12" }
	title = rusd.12.t
	desc = rusd.12.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.12.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike_big
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_general_strike_big
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_general_strike
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_general_strike
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = rus_minor_strike
			}
			remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #General strike
	id = rusd.13
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.13" }
	title = rusd.13.t
	desc = rusd.13.d

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_idea = rus_political_instability
			has_idea = rus_political_instability1
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.13.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_minor_strike }
			remove_ideas = rus_minor_strike
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_general_strike
				days = 100
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = rus_general_strike
				days = 100
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.03
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.999
				days = 15
				random = 600
			}
		}
	}
}
###Democratic Russia
country_event = { #Acting
	id = rusdem.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.1" }
	title = rusdem.1.t
	desc = rusdem.1.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_rus_romanov_take_power
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.1.a
		add_stability = 0.02
		hidden_effect = { RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes }
		custom_effect_tooltip = acting_president_tt
		RUS_increase_vns_pop = yes
	}
} 
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.201
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.201" }
	title = rusdem.201.t 
	desc = rusdem.201.d 
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.201.a
		add_stability = 0.07
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop_large = yes
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_clear_all_preelection_coalitions = yes
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.202
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.202" }
	title = rusdem.202.t 
	desc = rusdem.202.d 
		trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_early_elections }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941 }
		if = {
			limit = { vns_in_power = yes }
			AND = {
				check_variable = { party_popularity@authoritarian_democrat = 0 }
				check_variable = { party_popularity@social_conservative = 0 }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				kdp_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = kdp_united
			}
			AND = {
				check_variable = { party_popularity@social_liberal = 0 }
				check_variable = { party_popularity@market_liberal = 0 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			check_variable = { party_popularity@ruling_party = 0 }
		}
		has_country_flag = rus_election_1936
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 12
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.202.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		set_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.201
			days = 5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.203
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.203" }
	title = rusdem.203.t 
	desc = rusdem.203.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_savinkov_broke

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		OR = {
			AND = {
				date > 1937.6.6
				NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
			}
			AND = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Solidarist_Withdrawal
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Seek_Support_Among_Other_Radicals
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Spiridonova_Denounced_NRPR
			}
			has_country_flag = EUR_democracy
		}
		psr_in_power = no
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_President_Kerensky }	
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_christian_dem }	
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.203.a
		trigger = {
			has_government = national_populist
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_war_support = -0.1
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		clr_country_flag = savinkov_coup
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.383
				days = 3
			}
		}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
		subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
		RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.203.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		set_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
			clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_solidarist_party
				long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.204
				months = 2
			}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
		subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
		RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
					set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
				}
			}
		}		
	}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.204
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.204" }
	title = rusdem.204.t 
	desc = rusdem.204.d 
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solidarist_logo

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.204.a		
		RUS_increase_nsnp_pop = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #resign!
	id = rusdem.205
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.205" }
	title = rusdem.205.t 
	desc = rusdem.205.d 
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		rsdrp_in_power = no
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		OR = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^3 < 1 }
			AND = {
				psr_in_power = yes
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_dissolved }
		has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.205.a
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_dissolved
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				name = RUS_social_rev_party
				long_name = RUS_social_rev_party_long
			}
		}
	}
}
	
country_event = { #Opposition laws
	id = rusdem.2070
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2070" }
	title = rusdem.2070.t 
	desc = rusdem.2070.d 
		is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = snap_elections
			has_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941
			has_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
			has_country_flag = RUS_senate_elections_preparations
		} 
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.2070.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_law_in_progress = 1 }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.2070
				days = 90
				random_days = 30
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.2070
				days = 365
				random_days = 120
			}
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 100
						NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 3 } }
						NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 4 } }
					}
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							psr_in_power = yes
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^3 = 1 }
							has_country_flag = psr_banned
							check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 < 30 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 4 }					
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.207
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							vns_in_power = yes
							has_country_flag = vns_banned
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^41 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^41 = 4 }
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.208						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							rsdrp_in_power = yes
							has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^24 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^24 = 4 }	
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.212						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_socialist_government = yes
							has_government = market_liberal
							vns_in_power = yes
							ep_in_power = yes
							RUS_russian_monarch = yes
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^5 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^5 = 4 }
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Towards_Greatest_Aim
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.209						
				}
				20 = {
					modifier = {
						factor = 0
						OR = {
							has_government = social_democrat
							has_government = social_liberal
							has_government = national_populist
							RUS_russian_monarch = yes
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^21 = 4 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^14 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^28 = 3 }
							check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^28 = 4 }
							has_completed_focus = RUS_Monarchy_Referendum
						}
					}
					country_event = rusdem.210					
				}
			}	
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR tries to socialize land
	id = rusdem.207
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.207" }
	title = rusdem.207.t 
	desc = rusdem.207.d 
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			psr_in_power = yes
			has_country_flag = psr_banned
			has_socialist_government = yes
			check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^4 < 30 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 3 }
			check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 4 }
		}
	}
			
	option = {
		name = rusdem.207.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				psr_in_power = no
				NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^3 = 1 } }
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_President_Kerensky }	
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_LAW_OPPOSITION_VOTES
		}
		set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 2 }
		set_variable = { RUS_law_level = 1 }
		set_variable = { RUS_law_in_progress = 1 }
		Get_initial_RUS_LAW_PSR_SOCIALIZATION_OF_LAND = yes
		activate_mission = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL_DEADLINE
	}
}

country_event = { #Snap elections 1936
	id = rusdem.2
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.2"
		log = "----logging: RUSSIAN DUMA ELECTIONS CONCLUDED ON [GetDateText]"
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_run_election = yes	
			set_country_flag = rus_election_1936
			clr_country_flag = snap_elections
			RUS_run_senate_election = yes
			set_country_flag = RUS_elections_senate_1936
			clr_country_flag = RUS_senate_elections_preparations
			launch_russian_flavour = yes
			set_variable = { RUS_political_campaigns_days = 45 }
			set_variable = { RUS_political_campaigns_cost = 30 }			
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.12
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.60
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.61
				days = 3
			}	
			if = {
				limit = {
					ALO = { ALO_has_russian_influence = yes }
				}
				ALO = {
					country_event = {
						id = alash.889
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
			launch_russian_flavour = yes
			RUS_reduce_german_influence = yes
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked }
				clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }
				clr_country_flag = disable_duma
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
				remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
				remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
			}
			RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		}	
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.2.d 
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date > 1936.05.01
		date < 1936.05.15
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = { # PLSR Victory
		name = rusdem.2.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.2
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = syndicalist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		RUS_setup_plsr_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_plsr_nsp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.18
					days = 5
	}
			}
		} 
	}
	option = { # NSP victory
		name = rusdem.2.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_nsp_victory_in_elections = yes
				AND = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					is_ai = yes
				}
				AND = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					is_ai = yes
				}
		}
			}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
			}
		}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
		}
		}
	}
		add_stability = -0.1
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"

			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes

	option = { #RSDRP victory
		name = rusdem.2.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
			RUS_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
				AND = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}
					is_ai = yes
				}
				AND = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
					}
					is_ai = yes
				}
		}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		RUS_setup_rsdrp_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 2 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 100 }
			set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = var:RUS_socdem_pop
			}
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_rsdrp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.16
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		}
	option = { #PSR victory
		name = rusdem.2.e
		trigger = {
				OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
			RUS_psr_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_rrdo_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_psr_victory_in_elections = yes

					}

					}
					is_ai = yes

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
		}

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
			}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
			}
		}
			}
		}

			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"

			set_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 2 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 100 }
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = var:RUS_socdem_pop
			}
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_psr_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {

					days = 5
				}
			}

				RUS_kdp_vns_victory_in_elections = yes

			limit = { has_country_flag = VNS_aristocratic }

				text = {
					set_politics = {

			}
		}

					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}

		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Antonov_eco_npo

					days = 5

country_event = { #Candidate from PLSR/NSP
	id = rusdem.3
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.3"}
	title = rusdem.3.t
	desc = rusdem.3.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.3.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			set_country_flag = plsr_votes_for_socialist
			set_country_flag = nsp_votes_for_socialist
		}
		set_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
	}
}
country_event = { #Candidate from Socialists
	id = rusdem.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.4"}
	title = rusdem.4.t
	desc = rusdem.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_wide_popular_front_coalition }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_popular_front_coalition }
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.3.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.1
				has_country_flag = socialist_negot
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			set_country_flag = plsr_votes_for_socialist
			set_country_flag = nsp_votes_for_socialist
		}
		set_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
		set_country_flag = Socialist_candidate_exists
	}
}

					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
		set_country_flag = Liberal_candidate_exists
	}
}
country_event = { #Candidate from VNS
	id = rusdem.10
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.10"}
	title = rusdem.10.t
	desc = rusdem.10.d

	fire_only_once = yes

		tag = RUS
		date < 1936.05.05
		has_country_flag = snap_elections

			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_DPROM
			}	
		}
	}

					}
				}
			}

country_event = { #Senate Appoints President
	id = rusdem.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.12"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1160
			}
			log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.12.t
	desc = rusdem.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
				has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
			}
			RUS_setup_president_avksentiev = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
			}
			RUS_setup_president_chernov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
				has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = RUS_psr_kdp_coalition
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = chernov_psr_candidate
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_candidate
					has_country_flag = avksentiev_psr_kdp_candidate				
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PROGRESSIVES
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = tereschenko_psr_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_tereschenko = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
					has_country_flag = maklakov_vns_kdp_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_maklakov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_romanov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
				}
			}
			RUS_setup_president_yusupov = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.12.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate
				has_country_flag = ariadna_ep_candidate
			}
			vns_in_power = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = vernadsky_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_vernadskiy = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = ariadna_ep_candidate		
			}
			RUS_setup_president_tyrkova = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				rus_senate_duma_conflict_available = yes
			}
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.13
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_senate_reformed }
				}
				remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			}
		}
	}	
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.13.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION

					}

					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REFORM
					}
					has_game_rule = {

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_NRPR_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_DISABLED
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_RCW
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUSSIAN_CIVIL_WAR_GUARANTEED
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RKDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_MONARCHY
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_VNS_OLIGARCHS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_EURASIAN_UNION
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_senate_duma_conflict_duma_side_tt
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
				days = 180
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_chosen_duma_side
			activate_mission = RUS_Senate_Makes_Its_Move
			RUS_setup_senate_duma_conflict_variables = yes
		}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.13.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
					}
					has_game_rule = {

						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
					}

					}

country_event = { #Senate-Duma Conflict
	id = rusdem.20
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.20"}
	title = rusdem.20.t
	desc = rusdem.20.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = disable_duma }
		ep_in_power = no
		has_a_ep_president = no
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		add_stability = 0.07
		remove_all_ministers = yes 
		#country_event = {
		#	id = rusdem.24
		#	days = 30
		#}
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_clear_all_preelection_coalitions = yes
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.20.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Felix Yusupov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 13
		}
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI 
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.154
			days = 3
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = rusdem.21
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.21"}
	immediate = { log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years" }
	title = rusdem.21.t
	desc = rusdem.21.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.21.a
		setup_ruling_party_president = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		set_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict }
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
	}
}

			OR = {

	}

country_event = { #Senate elections 1937
	id = rusdem.26
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.26"
		hidden_effect = { 
			RUS_run_senate_election = yes
		}	
		set_country_flag = RUS_elections_senate_1936
		clr_country_flag = RUS_senate_elections_preparations
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.26
				days = 1460
			}
		}		
	}
	title = rusdem.26.t 
	desc = rusdem.26.d 
		trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted }
		NOT = {
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
				RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
				RUS_abakumov_in_power = yes
				RUS_gorgulov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted
			}	
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #
		name = rusdem.26.a

			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_mli
			set_variable = { RUS_lkdp_minister_for = token:RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_mli }
		}
	}

country_event = { #Elections 1941
	id = rusdem.29
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.29"
		log = "----logging: RUSSIAN DUMA ELECTIONS CONCLUDED ON [GetDateText]"
		hidden_effect = { 
			RUS_run_election = yes
			RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
			RUS_run_senate_election = yes
			clr_country_flag = disable_duma					
			clr_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis					
			clr_country_flag = RUS_early_elections					
			clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941 }
				set_country_flag = rus_elections_1941_over
				clr_country_flag = RUS_elections_duma_1941
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_elections_senate_1936
			clr_country_flag = RUS_senate_elections_preparations
		}
	}
	title = rusdem.2.t 
	desc = rusdem.2.d 
	fire_only_once = no 
		trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = snap_elections }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #NSP victory
		name = rusdem.2.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_nsp_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_setup_nsp_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_plsr_nsp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.17
					days = 5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_denikin_in_power = yes }
				RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
		} 
	}
	option = { #RSDRP victory
		name = rusdem.2.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_setup_rsdrp_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 2 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 100 }
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = var:RUS_socdem_pop
			}
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_rsdrp_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.16
					days = 5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_denikin_in_power = yes }
				RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
		} 
		RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
	}
	option = { #PSR victory
		name = rusdem.2.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_wide_popular_front_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_psr_rsdrp_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_rrdo_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_psr_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 10000
				OR = {
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR_NRPR
				}
			}
		}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_setup_psr_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = party_popularity@social_democrat }
			divide_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 2 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_socdem_pop = 100 }
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = social_democrat
				popularity = var:RUS_socdem_pop
			}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_psr_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.15
					days = 5
				}
			}

				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
		}

	}

		name = rusdem.2.f

					days = 5

					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.14
					days = 5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_denikin_in_power = yes }
				RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
		} 
	}
	option = { #conservatives ministers
		name = rusdem.2.i
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_vns_victory_in_elections = yes
				RUS_kdp_vns_victory_in_elections = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = VNS_aristocratic }
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 60
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		}
		else = {
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_conservative
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
			add_authdem_to_coalition = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		RUS_setup_vns_government = yes
		hidden_effect = {
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.13
					days = 5
				}
			}
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russia_liberal_conservative_democratic_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_denikin_in_power = yes }
				RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
			}
	}
	}
	option = { #NRPR
		name = rusdem.2.k
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
					RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
				}
			}
			RUS_nrpr_victory_in_elections = yes
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Antonov_eco_npo
		add_ideas = RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 1 }	
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_russia_nrpr_democratic_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.19
					days = 5
	}
					}
				}
			}
	option = { #NSNP
		name = rusdem.2.l
		trigger = {
			RUS_nsnp_victory_in_elections = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_christian_dem }
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
			add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
		}
		else = {
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 60
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_Viktor_M_Baydalakov_hog_npo
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_N_Tolstoy_for_npo
			RUS_Arkadiy_P_Stolypin_eco_npo
			RUS_Viktor_S_Abakumov_sec_npo
		}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^11 = 1 }
		set_country_leader_ideology = solidarism_subtype
		hidden_effect = {
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russia_nsnp_democratic_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
			if = {
				limit = { RUS_denikin_in_power = yes }
				RUS_recheck_president_subideology = yes
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party
					long_name = RUS_authoritarian_democrat_party_long
				}
				set_country_flag = rus_elections_1941_over
			}
	}
}
}

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.50
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.50"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_run_presidential_elections = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_president_elections_campaign
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1160
			}
		}
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
	}
	title = rusdem.50.t
	desc = rusdem.50.d
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.50.a

country_event = { #presidential general elections
	id = rusdem.66
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.66"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_KER
				}
				set_country_flag = psr_wins_president
			}
			clr_country_flag = RUS_president_elections_campaign
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.62
				days = 1160
			}
		}
		log = "[ROOT.GetName]: Presidential Elections concluded on [GetDateText]. Next elections in 4 years"
	}
	title = rusdem.63.t
	desc = rusdem.66.d
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				plsr_in_power = yes
				nsp_in_power = yes
				rsdrp_in_power = yes
				psr_in_power = yes
			}
			has_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		}
		RUS_setup_president_kamkov = yes
		clr_country_flag = plsr_wins_president
		clr_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.50.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				plsr_in_power = yes
				nsp_in_power = yes
				rsdrp_in_power = yes
				psr_in_power = yes
			}
			has_country_flag = shteinberg_plsr_candidate
		}
		RUS_setup_president_shteinberg = yes

country_event = { #RSDRP-PSR
	id = rusdem.51
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.51"}
	title = rusdem.51.t
	desc = rusdem.51.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.a
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = kamkov_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.51.b
		set_country_flag = PLSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = shteinberg_plsr_candidate
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

	id = rusdem.53
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.53"}
	title = rusdem.53.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.53.d.united
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.53.d.intern
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.53.d.moderate
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_dissolved }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.53.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
		}
		set_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = lozovsky_rsdrp_candidate
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.53.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists }
		}
		set_country_flag = RSDRP_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = gvozdev_rsdrp_candidate
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
	}

	id = rusdem.65
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.65"}
	title = rusdem.65.t
	desc = rusdem.65.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_dissolved }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.65.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_socdems_rpr }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_soclibs_rrdo }
		}
		set_country_flag = PSR_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = gershtein_psr_candidate

			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_soclibs_rrdo }

			base = 10
		}

			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_socdems_rpr }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_soclibs_rrdo }

	id = rusdem.55
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.55"}
	title = rusdem.55.t
	desc = rusdem.55.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = lkdp_banned }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = rkdp_banned }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusdem.55.e
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER } }
		set_country_flag = LKDP_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = pletnyov_kdp_candidate

		set_country_flag = RKDP_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = maklakov_kdp_candidate
		RUS_increase_rkdp_pop_small = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #RSDRP-PSR
	id = rusdem.56
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.56"}
	title = rusdem.56.t
	desc = rusdem.56.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = vns_banned }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.56.a
		set_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic }
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_eco = token:RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_eco = token:RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco }
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.56.b
		set_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = yusupov_vns_candidate
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic }
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_hog = token:RUS_Georgiy_P_Ignatiev_hog_sco }
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_sec = token:RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_sco }
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.56.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^14 = 3 }
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^15 = 3 }
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^34 = 3 }
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = VNS_candidate_exists
		set_country_flag = wrangel_vns_candidate
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.03
		}
	}
}

				has_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt
				has_country_flag = nrpr_banned

			}
		}
	}

		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no		
	}

		set_country_flag = vergun_nsnp_candidate
		RUS_increase_nsnp_pop_small = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.58.c
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_NRPR_is_bankrupt

			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored

		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
	}
}

			Get_initial_RUS_LAW_IMPEACH_PRESIDENT = yes
			activate_mission = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL_DEADLINE
		}
	}

country_event = { #Important thing to ask
	id = rusdem.109
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.109"}
	title = rusdem.109.t
	desc = rusdem.109.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_LEFT_REPUBLIC
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_will_go_socialist
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.109.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PEACEFUL_REVOLUTION
				}
			}						
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = we_wont_go_socialist
		set_country_flag = RUS_decided_to_stay_democratic
	}
}

	picture = GFX_event_russia_milyukov
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		has_elected_government = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Pavel_N_Milyukov_dead }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.121.a
		RUS_increase_kdp_pop = yes	
	}	
}

			}
		}

			}

country_event = { #Army Mutiny
	id = rusdem.304
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.304" }
	title = rusdem.304.t
	desc = rusdem.304.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = rus_election_1936
		has_country_flag = rus_president_elections_1936_over
		OR = {
			plsr_in_power = yes
			nsp_in_power = yes
			AND = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
				rsdrp_in_power = yes
			}
			lpsr_in_power = yes
		}
		RUS_is_eurasia = no					
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 7
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.304.a
		add_war_support = -0.1
		add_ideas = RUS_army_mutiny
		if = {
			limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Combat_Army_Mutiny_tt
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.329
				days = 3
			}
		}		
	}
}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.317
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.317"}
	title = rusdem.317.t
	desc = rusdem.317.d
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.319
				days = 3
				random_hours = 72
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.317.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.318
				days = 3
				random_hours = 72
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = -0.02
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments }
			}
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				days = 60
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_1
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
			}
			effect_tooltip = {
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
					add_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_ideas = RUS_from_foreign_payments_2
				add_timed_idea = {
					idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
					days = 60
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
			}
			modify_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_from_foreign_payments_3
				days = 30
			}
		}			
	}
}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.322
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.322"}
	title = rusdem.322.t
	desc = rusdem.322.d
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.322.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier} }
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_Foreign_Concessions_modifier }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_open_foreign_concession_tt
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_trade_opinion_factor = 0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_consumer_goods_factor = -0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_political_power_gain = -0.02 }
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits }
				}
				add_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits
			}
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
	}
}

			}
		}

				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}

				id = rusdem.326
				days = 3
			}

			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.325
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
