country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.325
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.325"}
	title = rusdem.325.t
	desc = rusdem.325.d
		is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.325.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.2
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.324
					days = 365
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_prolong_foreign_concession_tt
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_trade_opinion_factor = 0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_consumer_goods_factor = -0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_political_power_gain = -0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_party_popularity_stability_factor = -0.02 }
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.325.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.8
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_close_foreign_concession_tt
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_construction_speed = -0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factory_output = -0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_trade_opinion_factor = -0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_consumer_goods_factor = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_political_power_gain = 0.02 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_NEP_party_popularity_stability_factor = 0.02 }
		FROM = { 
			effect_tooltip = { remove_ideas = RUS_foreign_profits }
		}
		force_update_dynamic_modifier = yes
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.327
				days = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_foreign_factories = 0 }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.328
				days = 10
				random_days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #RCW
	id = rusdem.330
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.330"}
	title = rusdem.330.t
	desc = rusdem.330.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.330.a
		add_stability = -0.03
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		kill_ideology_leader = paternal_autocrat
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Anton Denikin"
			desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 401
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 401 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_cos_ade
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_I_Yegorov_cos_syn
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 400
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 400 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #NSP
	id = rusdem.344
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.344"}
	title = rusdem.344.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.344.d.rus
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.344.d.sov
		trigger = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 23
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.345
				days = 2
			}
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 16
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = syndicalist
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Mikhail_Tomskiy_hog_rso
			RUS_Aleksandra_M_Kollontai_for_syn
			RUS_Aleksandr_Shlyapnikov_eco_syn
			RUS_Yuri_Lutovinov_sec_syn
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_tomsky
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = syndicalist
					name = SOV_snspp_party
					long_name = SOV_snspp_party_long
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tomsky
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = syndicalist
					name = SOV_rnsp_syndie_party
					long_name = SOV_rnsp_syndie_party_long
				}
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tomsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype 
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.345
			days = 2
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
			add_tot_to_coalition = yes
			add_radsoc_to_coalition = yes
		}
				
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.344.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_rykov = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		if = {

			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = SOV_rnsp_centralist_party
				long_name = SOV_rnsp_centralist_party_long
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Rykov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Rykov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"

			traits = { SOV_partisan_of_nep }
		}

			id = rusdem.345
			days = 2
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 16
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_hog_rso
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Matvey_Skobelev_sec_sde

				has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
			}

		}
		if = {

				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sergey_Kirov.png"

			}

				id = rusdem.345
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			base = 23
		}

			}

			NOT = { has_government = syndicalist }
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.347
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #NRPR
	id = rusdem.360
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.360"}
	title = rusdem.360.t
	desc = rusdem.360.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_solidarist_logo

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.360.a
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_nsnp_pop_large = yes 
		RUS_bop_low_increase_effect_10 = yes
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
		subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
		RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.4 }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0.6 }
			}
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Solidarist_Withdrawal
	}
}

	id = rusdem.375
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.375"}
	title = rusdem.375.t
	desc = rusdem.375.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_rus_savinkoc_event
	option = {
		name = rusdem.375.a
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Boris Savinkov"
				desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_SAVINKOV_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov_President.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = savinkovism_subtype
				traits = { vozhd }
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_plsr_will_join_coalition
			hidden_effect = { add_synd_to_coalition = yes }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF_1 }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_psr_will_join_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
				add_socdem_to_coalition = yes 
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
					name = RUS_social_liberal_party
		}
	}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			reset_russian_leaders = yes
			set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
			set_country_flag = disable_duma
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution }
				remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
					}
			add_stability = 0.15
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict }
				remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
					}
			load_base_russian_tree = yes
			set_country_flag = make_savinkov_tree_visible
			mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
					country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
				}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
						days = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Provisional Government
	id = rusdem.383
	title = rusdem.383.t
	desc = rusdem.383.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_SAVI }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.383.a
		add_stability = 0.15
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution }
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF_1 }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF_1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = market_liberal
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 1
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = provisional_government
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict }
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		restore_all_presidential_candidates = yes
		clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = RUS_solidarist_party
			long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.204
			months = 1
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.21
			months = 2
		}
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kornilov decides fate of russia
	id = rusdem.386
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.386"}
	title = rusdem.386.t
	desc = rusdem.386.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.386.a
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
			RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
			RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
			RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
	}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution }
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
			}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_third_russian_revolution }
			remove_ideas = RUS_third_russian_revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict }
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			RUS_decrease_plsr_pop_large = yes
			}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF_1 }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF_1
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			RUS_decrease_psr_pop_large = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Dmitry Odinets" ruling_only = yes } }
				reset_russian_leaders = yes
			}
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
			multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
			round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
			round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
			RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
			RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
		}
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes
			clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_solidarist_party
				long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
	}
}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.50
				days = 5
	}
}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.386.b
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_National_Revolution }
			remove_ideas = RUS_National_Revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_third_russian_revolution }
			remove_ideas = RUS_third_russian_revolution
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			RUS_decrease_plsr_pop_large = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_RRF_1 }
			remove_ideas = RUS_RRF_1
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			RUS_decrease_psr_pop_large = yes
		}
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		set_country_flag = provisional_government
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_senate_duma_conflict }
			remove_ideas = RUS_senate_duma_conflict
		}
		set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
		clr_country_flag = NRPR_candidate_exists
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_leader = { name = "Dmitry Odinets" ruling_only = yes } }
			restore_all_presidential_candidates = yes
		RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.21
					days = 110
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
		multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
		round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
		round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
		subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
		subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
		RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		effect_tooltip = { RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes }
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_state = {
				add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
				multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
				set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
			}
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes
			RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			name = RUS_solidarist_party
			long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.204
			months = 1
		}
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #3RCW
	id = rusdem.388
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.388"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	title = rusdem.388.t
	desc = rusdem.388.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.388.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_cos_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_socialist_government = no }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
				remove_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
				add_unit_leader_trait = SOV_bolshevik_officer
				set_unit_leader_flag = SOV_french_clique
				set_nationality = FRA
		}
			}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_trait = hidden_sympathies }
				remove_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
				set_nationality = TRM
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
						has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Georgiy_K_Zhukov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Vasiliy_I_Chuykov_dead 
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_D_Bonch_Bruyevich_dead 
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_F_Vatutin_dead 
		set_country_flag = Pyetr_N_Vrangel_dead 
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Ivan_S_Konev_dead 
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Rodzyanko_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_P_Arkhangelskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Lavrentiy_Kornilov_dead
		set_country_flag = Konstantin_P_Voskoboinik_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Evgeniy_K_Miller_dead
		set_country_flag = Igor_I_Sikorskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vyacheslav_Tkachov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_I_Verkhovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Vasiliy_Kanin_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"

		}

		}
	}

	id = rusdem.414
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.414"}
	title = rusdem.414.t
	desc = rusdem.414.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.a
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_poll_vote > RUS_rkdp_percentage_poll_vote }
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_secured
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_LKDP }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_PP }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_RKDP }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.414.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_poll_vote < RUS_rkdp_percentage_poll_vote }
				check_variable = { RUS_lkdp_percentage_poll_vote = RUS_rkdp_percentage_poll_vote }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Get_Along_With_Liberals_coalition_failed
		add_political_power = -15
	}	
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.416
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.416"}
	title = rusdem.416.t
	desc = rusdem.416.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.416.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_nsp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 3 }
				remove_radsoc_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rsdrp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^4 = 3 }
				remove_socdem_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lkdp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^5 = 3 }
				remove_soclib_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^6 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_pp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^6 = 3 }
				remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_rkdp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^7 = 3 }
				remove_marlib_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_large = yes
		add_political_power = 50
		add_stability = 0.12
		RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop_small = yes
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_soc_land }
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.417
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.417"}
	title = rusdem.417.t
	desc = rusdem.417.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.417.a
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_plsr_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_synd_from_coalition = yes
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 3 } # NSP  (Opposition)		
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop_large = yes
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = -0.12
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop_small = yes	
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_psr_political_crisis
			days = 90
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_NSP }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_RSDRP }
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = RUS_soc_land_blocked }
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.418
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.418"}
	title = rusdem.418.t
	desc = rusdem.418.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.418.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Lev Gershtein"
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_MPSR
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.420
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.418.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_leader = {
					ruling_only = yes
					name = "Lev Gershtein"
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_PSR
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.419
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.420
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.420"}
	title = rusdem.420.t
	desc = rusdem.420.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.420.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_I_Ivanov_eco_rso
			RUS_Kost_S_Burevoy_sec_rso
		}
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Move_Left
		set_country_flag = RUS_political_crisis
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.421
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.421"}
	title = rusdem.421.t
	desc = rusdem.421.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.421.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Viktor Chernov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Lev Gershtein"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Nikolay Avksentiev"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_large = yes
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_social_democrat_party
			long_name = RUS_social_democrat_party_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		hidden_effect = {
		country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.422
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.422"}
	title = rusdem.422.t
	desc = rusdem.422.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.422.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		RUS_increase_plsr_pop_large = yes
		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop = yes
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_PLSR }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } }
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_plsr_will_join_coalition
				hidden_effect = {
					add_synd_to_coalition = yes
					set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } # PLSR  (Governing)		
					mp_support_calc = yes
					senators_support_calc = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.427
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.427"}
	title = rusdem.427.t
	desc = rusdem.427.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.427.a
		RUS_clear_all_coalitions = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_nrpr_will_join_coalition
		hidden_effect = {
			add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 1 } # NRPR  (Governing)		
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop_large = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_large = yes
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
			RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sde
			RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.428
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.428"}
	title = rusdem.428.t
	desc = rusdem.428.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.428.a
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc = "La Resistance" }
			if = {
				limit = { has_intelligence_agency = yes }
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_done_agency_upgrade = upgrade_anti_partisan }
		}
		upgrade_intelligence_agency = upgrade_anti_partisan 
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_done_agency_upgrade = upgrade_commando_training }
					}
		upgrade_intelligence_agency = upgrade_commando_training  
	}
}
		}
		else = {
			add_command_power = 15
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.429
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.429"}
	title = rusdem.429.t
	desc = rusdem.429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.429.a
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 403 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 416 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = rusdem.430
					days = 100
					random = 50
					random_days = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.429.b
		trigger = {
			MON = {
				has_country_flag = MON_soyombo_in_power_flag
				is_subject_of = RUS
			}
		}
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_wrangel_officer
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
				}
			}
			set_nationality = MON
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Get_Along_With_NRPR
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 403 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 416 }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				unit_leader_event = {
					id = rusdem.430
					days = 100
					random = 50
					random_days = 10
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = {
	id = rusdem.430
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.430" }
	title = rusdem.430.t
	desc = rusdem.430.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_military_planning

	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		RUS = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusdem.430.a
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_unit_leader = 402
				}
				random_unit_leader = {
					limit = { has_id = 402 }
					retire = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
				}
				remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Anton Denikin"
					desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = junta_subtype
				}
			
			}
		}		
	}
}
country_event = { #PSR
	id = rusdem.431
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.431"}
	title = rusdem.431.t
	desc = rusdem.431.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.431.a
		RUS_increase_nrpr_pop = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_socdems_rpr
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			name = RUS_rpr_party
			long_name = RUS_rpr_party_long
		}
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_minister_for = token:RUS_Ilya_I_Fondaminskiy_for_sde }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_minister_eco = token:RUS_Vadim_V_Rudnev_eco_sde }
		set_variable = { RUS_psr_minister_sec = token:RUS_Emma_Dikgof_Derental_sec_npo }	
		RUS_psr_rpr = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^12 = 3 } # NRPR  (Opposition)		
		}		
	}
}

	title = rusdem.452.t
	desc = rusdem.452.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.452.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSRPI
				}
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde
			RUS_Andrey_Vyshinsky_for_sde
			RUS_Nikolay_Sukhanov_eco_sde
			RUS_Vyacheslav_P_Volgin_sec_sde
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = syndie_social_democrat_subtype
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_minister_hog = token:RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_minister_for = token:RUS_Andrey_Vyshinsky_for_sde }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_minister_eco = token:RUS_Nikolay_Sukhanov_eco_sde }
		set_variable = { RUS_rsdrp_minister_sec = token:RUS_Vyacheslav_P_Volgin_sec_sde }
		set_country_flag = soc_dems_are_socialists
		set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_psr_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^3 = 3 }
				remove_socdem_from_coalition = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.452.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_RSDRP
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_plsr_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_synd_from_coalition = yes
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 3 } # PLSR  (Opposition)		
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 } }
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_nsp_will_leave_coalition
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_radsoc_from_coalition = yes
				set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 3 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Solomon Lozovsky"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.453
				days = 7
			}
		}
		mp_support_calc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}	
}

country_event = { #RSDRP
	id = rusdem.461
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.461"}
	title = rusdem.461.t
	desc = rusdem.461.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.461.a
		add_ideas = RUS_revolutionary_democracy
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^1 = 1 }
						has_government = syndicalist
					}
				}
			}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_PLSR }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^2 = 1 }
						has_government = radical_socialist
					}
				}
			}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_NSP }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					OR = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^4 = 1 }
						rsdrp_in_power = yes
					}
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_coalition_with_RSDRP }
		}
		remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_I_Nikolayevsky_eco_sde
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
	}
}

country_event = { #RSDRP
	id = rusdem.466
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.466"}
	title = rusdem.466.t
	desc = rusdem.466.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.466.a
		set_variable = { var = senate_total value = 0 }
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_General_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i
			
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i
			
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i
			
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
		}		
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
}

		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }

		}
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}

country_event = { #LKDP
	id = rusdem.501
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.501"}
	title = rusdem.501.t
	desc = rusdem.501.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.501.a

country_event = { #LKDP
	id = rusdem.502
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.502"}
	title = rusdem.502.t
	desc = rusdem.502.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.502.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = kdp_united }
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_state_category = zero
							has_state_category = one
							has_state_category = two
							has_state_category = three
							has_state_category = four
							has_state_category = five
						}
					}
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_condition_pop = 0.035 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_pp_condition_pop = 0.035 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_rkdp_condition_pop = 0.035 }
				}
			}
			else = {
				custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_lkdp_pop_tt
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							has_state_category = zero
							has_state_category = one
							has_state_category = two
							has_state_category = three
							has_state_category = four
							has_state_category = five
						}
					}
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_vks_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_plsr_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsp_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_psr_condition_pop = -0.05 }
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_lkdp_condition_pop = 0.1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	option = {
		name = rusdem.507.a
		add_stability = 0.03
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_2
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_2
				add_idea = RUS_New_Tactics_3
			}
		}
		unlock_decision_tooltip = RUS_LAW_JUDICIAL_REFORM_initialize
		set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^37 = 1 }
	}
}
country_event = { #LKDP
	id = rusdem.508
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.508"}
	title = rusdem.508.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.508.d.senatereform
		trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { law_id = 31 }
			RUS_has_law_accepted = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.508.d.nosenatereform
		trigger = {
			set_temp_variable = { law_id = 31 }
			RUS_has_law_accepted = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.508.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				set_temp_variable = { law_id = 31 }
				RUS_has_law_accepted = yes
			}
			add_stability = 0.03
			RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
			}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.01
			RUS_increase_lkdp_pop = yes
		}
	}
}

		RUS_setup_progressive_government = yes

			ideology = market_liberal
			name = RUS_rkdp_progressive_party
			long_name = RUS_right_kadets_party_long
		}

			limit = { has_government = market_liberal }
			set_country_leader_ideology = marlib_national_liberalism_subtype
		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_lkdp_will_join_coalition

			add_soclib_to_coalition = yes
			remove_soccon_from_coalition = yes
			remove_authdem_from_coalition = yes

			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Status^8 = 3 }
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
		}		
	}

country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.526
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.526"}
	title = rusdem.526.t
	desc = rusdem.526.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.526.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Dmitry Romanov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
		set_country_flag = VNS_aristocratic
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Aristocrats_Triumphant
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.526.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Dmitry Romanov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Felix Yusupov"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_sco
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_hog = token:RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_hog_sco }
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_sco }
				remove_ideas = RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_sco
				add_ideas = RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_sco
				set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_sec = token:RUS_Mikhail_Rodzyanko_sec_sco }
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_P_Ignatiev_hog_sco
			set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_hog = token:RUS_Georgiy_P_Ignatiev_hog_sco }
		}
		RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
		set_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau
		set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_eco = token:RUS_Aleksey_I_Putilov_eco_pau }
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Oligarchs_Triumphant
	} 
}

country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.535
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.535"}
	title = rusdem.535.t
	desc = rusdem.535.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 30
		}		
		unlock_decision_tooltip = RUS_LAW_DESTROY_LOCAL_PARLIAMENTS_initialize
		set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^33 = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		add_political_power = 50
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.535.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_jewish_autonomy
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_jewish_autonomy
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				any_owned_state = {
					has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_siberian_autonomous_republic }
			}
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_russification_policies
		set_country_flag = vns_national_conservative
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = social_conservative
				vns_in_power = yes
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = national_conservative_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = authoritarian_democrat
				vns_in_power = yes
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = authdem_national_conservative_subtype
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #VNS
	id = rusdem.536
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.536"}
	title = rusdem.536.t
	desc = rusdem.536.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_FNG_railway_construction_2
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.536.a
		
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				infrastructure > 1
				infrastructure < 4
			}
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_supplies = 0.15
					state_production_speed_infrastructure_factor = 0.1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		add_to_variable = { RUS_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy = -0.2 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_monarchy_referendum_legitimacy_tt
		add_to_variable = { RUS_monarchy_referendum_legitimacy_bonus = -0.2 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.562.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		add_stability = -0.12
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA_NO
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_ANA
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_2_YEAR_DEADLINE_FLAG
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_NICK_VISIBLE
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.557
			days = 1
		}
		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.562.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_VRA_TSAR
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}

		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_monarchy_candidate_legitimacy_tt

country_event = { #Monarchy Referendum
	id = rusdem.568
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.568"}
	title = rusdem.568.t
	desc = rusdem.568.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusdem.568.a
		add_stability = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Referendum_Fails
		remove_ideas = RUS_socialists_protest_the_referendum
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = market_liberal
			popularity = 0
		}
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.512
				days = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				vns_in_power = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.527
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Restoration of republic
	id = rusdem.580
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.580"}
	title = rusdem.580.t
	desc = rusdem.580.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.580.a
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party_long
			name = RUS_paternal_autocrat_party
		}
		drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_country_flag = disable_duma
		RUS_calculate_polling_averages = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_early_elections
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_vns_rnsma_exists }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_vns_rnsma_exists
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = social_conservative
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				name = RUS_social_conservative_party
				long_name = RUS_social_conservative_party_long
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = rnsma_evolves }
			clr_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
			clr_country_flag = nsnp_banned
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				name = RUS_solidarist_party
				long_name = RUS_solidarist_party_long
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.204
				days = 30
			}
			set_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 }
			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 }
			multiply_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			multiply_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 = 0.4 }
			round_variable = Duma_Party_Seats^11
			round_variable = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11
			round_variable = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11
			subtract_from_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 = Duma_Party_Seats^11 }
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_General_Seats^11 }
			subtract_from_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^12 = Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^11 }
			RUS_Get_Lower_House_Array = yes
			RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
			remove_add_presidential_senators = yes
			mp_support_calc = yes
			senators_support_calc = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				RUS_decrease_nrpr_pop_large = yes
				every_owned_state = {
					add_to_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = RUS_state_nrpr_popularity }
					multiply_variable = { RUS_state_nsnp_popularity = 0.7 }
					set_variable = { RUS_state_nrpr_popularity = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_three_months
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.29
				days = 90
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Tsar flavor
	id = rusdem.581
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.581"}
	title = rusdem.581.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.kirillovichs
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Kirill I"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Vladimir III"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.581.d.others
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Kirill I"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vladimir III"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr IV"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Anastasia I"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_event_russia_conflict_of_romanovs
	option = {
		name = rusdem.581.a
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = -0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = -0.1 }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Kirill I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Vladimir III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.583
					days = 60
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Kirill I"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Vladimir III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
						has_country_leader = {
							name = "Dmitry III"
							ruling_only = yes
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.582
					days = 15
				}
			}			
		}
	}
}

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Vsevolod I"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.585.a
		add_stability = 0.07
		add_political_power = 50
		add_to_variable = { popular_support_monarchy = 0.075 }
		add_to_variable = { bourgeois_support_monarchy = 0.05 }
		add_to_variable = { army_support_monarchy = 0.03 }
		add_to_variable = { clergy_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		add_to_variable = { workers_support_monarchy = 0.08 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = SRD
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = SRD
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = ITA
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ITA
				modifier = RUS_royal_wedding
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.590
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.590"}
	title = rusdem.590.t
	desc = rusdem.590.d
		trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = DKB
			tag = KUB
			tag = KLY
			tag = MON
			tag = TRM
		}
		is_ai = no
		is_subject = no
		RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = KUB
					has_government = market_liberal
				}
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = TRM
					OR = {
						has_government = social_democrat
						ep_in_power = yes
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					tag = MON
					MON_sternberg_in_power = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}	
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusdem.591
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.590.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}	
		add_political_power = 50
		set_country_flag = @ROOT_refused_tsar
	}
}

country_event = { #Tsar is back
	id = rusdem.592
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.592"}
	title = rusdem.592.t
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.const
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Symbol_Of_Russian_Might }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusdem.592.d.semiconst
		trigger = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism }
	}	
	is_triggered_only = yes
		option = {
		name = rusdem.592.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^15 = 50 }
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 50 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_presidential_senate_seats_removed
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i

			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		final_senators_recalc = yes		
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_50
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 50 }
		add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^15 = 50 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_presidential_senate_seats_removed
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i

			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_regional_total = 25 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_increase_total_regional_senators_by_25
		add_to_variable = { senators_election_total = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_General_Seats^15 = 25 }
		add_to_variable = { Senate_Party_Regional_Seats^15 = 25 }
		set_country_flag = RUS_presidential_senate_seats_removed
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i

			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.592.f
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Tsar_Prussian_Constitutionalism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		for_each_loop = {
			array = Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats
			value = seats
			index = i

			set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^i = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^8 = 33 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^9 = 7 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^6 = 5 }
		set_variable = { Senate_Party_Presidential_Seats^5 = 5 }
		
		final_senators_recalc = yes
		RUS_Get_Senate_Elections_Array = yes
		senators_support_calc = yes
	}	
}
country_event = { #Tsar
	id = rusdem.593
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.593"}
	title = rusdem.593.t
	desc = rusdem.593.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 65
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = psr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PSR will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "RSDRP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			}
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "PLSR and NSP will be banned"
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
			}
			set_country_flag = nrpr_banned
			custom_effect_tooltip = "NRPR will be banned"
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_popular_glorious_empire_tooltip
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_decrease_workers_glorious_empire_tooltip
		add_to_variable = { RUS.popular_support_monarchy = -0.25 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS.workers_support_monarchy = -0.5 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.593.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates }
				}
				set_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_moderates
				country_event = {
					id = rusdem.595
					days = 2
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.594
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}	
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.596"}
	title = rusdem.596.t
	desc = rusdem.596.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Pavel II"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.596.a
		add_political_power = 25
		hidden_effect = {
			get_current_government_type = yes
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_democrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_liberal }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = market_liberal }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = social_conservative }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = paternal_autocrat }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = national_populist }
			set_country_leader_portrait = {	portrait = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pavel_Romanov_18.png." }
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #NSNP
	id = rusdem.604
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.604"}
	title = rusdem.604.t
	desc = rusdem.604.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
		option = {
		name = rusdem.604.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_solidarist_christian_dem
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
			elections_allowed = yes
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			name = RUS_rhdp_party
			long_name = RUS_rhdp_party_long
		}
		set_country_leader_ideology = autdem_christian_democracy_subtype
		add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_new_authdem = party_popularity_100@authoritarian_democrat }
			set_temp_variable = { RUS_new_natpop = party_popularity_100@national_populist }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_new_authdem = RUS_new_natpop }

			set_temp_variable = { sum = 100 }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@totalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@syndicalist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_democrat }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@market_liberal }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@social_conservative }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = RUS_new_authdem }
			subtract_from_temp_variable = { sum = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat }
			
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_new_authdem = sum } #avoid rounding errors

			set_popularities = {
				totalist = party_popularity_100@totalist
				syndicalist = party_popularity_100@syndicalist
				radical_socialist = party_popularity_100@radical_socialist
				social_democrat = party_popularity_100@social_democrat
				social_liberal = party_popularity_100@social_liberal
				market_liberal = party_popularity_100@market_liberal
				social_conservative = party_popularity_100@social_conservative
				authoritarian_democrat = RUS_new_authdem
				paternal_autocrat = party_popularity_100@paternal_autocrat
				national_populist = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #NSNP
	id = rusdem.607

	title = rusdem.607.t
	desc = rusdem.607.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusdem.607.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		}
		set_country_flag = psr_banned
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.608
			days = 7
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.607.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		}
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_small = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.608
			days = 7
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.607.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }
			clr_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed
			set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		}
		set_country_flag = psr_banned
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.608
			days = 7
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.607.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = bolsheviks_allowed }

		}
		set_country_flag = rsdrp_banned
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_small = yes
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.608
			days = 7
		}
	}	
}

	id = rusdem.62
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdem.62" }
	immediate = {
		RUS_clear_all_preelection_candidates = yes
	}
		
	title = rusdem.62.t
	desc = rusdem.61.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		russia_is_democratic = yes
		RUS_russian_monarch = no
		RUS_denikin_in_power = no
	}
	hidden = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.a #appointed by government
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^14 = 3 }
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdem.63
			days = 300
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.c #appointed by population
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^15 = 3 }
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^34 = 3 }
				has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_president_elections_campaign
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 7
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.54
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 25
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 35
			}
			country_event = { #nrpr primaries/nsnp primaries
				id = rusdem.58
				days = 37
			}
			#country_event = { #rovs primaries
			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 80
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.50
				days = 300
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusdem.61.e #appointed by senate
		trigger = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^15 = 3 } }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_ABOLISH_SENATE_accepted }
			NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^14 = 3 } }
			NOT = { check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^34 = 3 } }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_LAW_SENATE_NSP_REFORM_accepted }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { #nsp primaries
				id = rusdem.52
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = { #rsdrp primaries
				id = rusdem.53
				days = 20
			}
			country_event = { #psr primaries
				id = rusdem.65
				days = 30
			}
			country_event = { #kdp primaries
				id = rusdem.55
				days = 40
			}
			country_event = { #vns primaries
				id = rusdem.56
				days = 50
			}
			country_event = { #ep primaries
				id = rusdem.57
				days = 60
			}

				id = rusdem.58
				days = 70
			}

			#	id = rusdem.59
			#	days = 80
			#}
			country_event = {
				id = rusdem.66
				days = 300

		}
	}

country_event = { #RNSMA coup
	id = rusd.19
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.19" }
	title = rusd.19.t
	desc = rusd.19.d

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.19.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vladimir Purishkevich"
				desc = "POLITICS_VLADIMIR_PURISHKEVICH_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Vladimir_Purishkevich.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = legionarism_subtype 
				traits = {}
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_npo
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else = {
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Markov"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Markov.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = legionarism_subtype 
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_E_Markov_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_npo
				RUS_Nikolay_P_Vladimir_sec_pau
			}
		}
		
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.154
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Kornilov coup
	id = rusd.23
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.23"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kornilov
	title = rusd.24.t 
	desc = rusd.24.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = rusd.24.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_kornilov_coup
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_hog_pau
			RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
			RUS_Ivan_P_Romanovskiy_eco_pau
			RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.3
		}
		
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_TERROR
		clr_country_flag = rus_general_strike_expands
		clr_country_flag = RUS_Okhrannoye_Otdeleniye_locked
		remove_ideas = RUS_scars_of_russian_revolution
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability1}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability1
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_political_instability}
			remove_ideas = rus_political_instability
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = authoritarian_democrat
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_conservative
			popularity = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { date < 1936.7.7 }
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.200
					days = 2
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.50
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		hidden_effect = {
			load_oob = SOV_naval
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17892 }
				remove_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 17893 }
				remove_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 497 }
				remove_unit_leader_trait = hidden_sympathies
				set_nationality = ROOT
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russia.1946.a
		create_navy_leader = {
			name = "Arseny Golovko"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Arseniy_Golovko.png"
			traits = { spotter }
			skill = 3
			attack_skill = 3
			defense_skill = 2
			maneuvering_skill = 2
			coordination_skill = 3
		}
		create_navy_leader = {
			name = "Filipp Ivanov"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Filipp_Ivanov.png"
			traits = { ironside }
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 2
			maneuvering_skill = 2
			coordination_skill = 2
		}
		create_navy_leader = {
			name = "Gordey Levchenko"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Gordey_Levchenko.png"
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 2
			defense_skill = 2
			maneuvering_skill = 2
			coordination_skill = 2
		}

country_event = { #Revolution
	id = rusd.29
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.29"}
	title = rusd.21.t 
	desc = rusd.21.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.21.a
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		if = {
			limit = { rsdrp_in_power = yes }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = social_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde
				RUS_Andrey_Vyshinsky_for_sde
				RUS_Boris_I_Nikolayevsky_eco_sde
				RUS_Fyodor_I_Dan_sec_sde
			}
			set_country_flag = popular_front_coalition
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_government = syndicalist }
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = syndicalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
				RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
				RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
				RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
			}			
		}
		else = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = radical_socialist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
				RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
				RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso
				RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
		}
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_nationalist_resistance_1
			RUS_democrat_resistance_1
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_must_deal_with_opposition
		set_country_flag = peaceful_revolution_military_tree
		add_stability = 0.05
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russia.1923
				days = 7
				random_days = 7
			}
			setup_soviet_russia = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.1 
				days = 6
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.5
					days = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					country_exists = ALO 
				}
				ALO = { country_event = alash.890 }
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = rusd.31.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		tag = FIN
		SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			SOV = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.32
					days = 5
					random_days = 15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.31.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.025
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.33
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.33" }
	title = rusd.33.t
	desc = rusd.33.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.33.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -35
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		KAR = { give_military_access = FIN }
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
			}
			add_to_war = {
				targeted_alliance = KAR
				enemy = FROM
				hostility_reason = FIN_heimosodat
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1
		add_ideas = KAR_finnish_intervention
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.33.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 35
				has_authoritarian_government = no
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_stability = -0.05
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		KAR = { save_event_target_as = volunteer_target }
		send_volunteers_to_TARGET = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #Status of the Orthodox Church
	id = rusd.35
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.35"}
	title = rusd.35.t
	desc = rusd.35.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_orthodox
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = {
			has_idea = RUS_state_religion
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular_constitutionally
		}
		check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^44 = 0 }
		has_socialist_government = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.35.a
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = social_liberal
			}				
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_left_democratic_government = yes
				}
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }			
			unlock_decision_tooltip = RUS_LAW_STATE_RELIGION_initialize
			set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^44 = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = RUS_state_religion
			RUS_increase_pp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop_small = yes
			RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
			RUS_increase_ep_pop_small = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.72
					days = 30
					random = 2160
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.36
					days = 40
					random = 2160
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = ties_with_church
					}
					remove_ideas = ties_with_church
				}
			}
			set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^44 = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.35.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
					has_country_flag = RUS_PUR
					has_idea = RUS_Patriarch_Sergius_hog_pau
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				vns_in_power = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -60
				ep_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.72
				days = 30
				random = 2160
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.37
				days = 20
				random = 960
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.38
				days = 60
				random = 1440
			}
		}
	}
}
