country_event = { #The patriarch criticises the government
	id = rusd.38
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.38" }
	title = rusd.38.t
	desc = rusd.38.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.38.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -10
				OR = {
					vns_in_power = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.06
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.38.b
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
			has_dictatorship_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				add = 5
				OR = {
					vns_in_power = yes
					ep_in_power = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.38.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular_constitutionally }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 35
				OR = {
					vns_in_power = yes
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					RUS_russian_monarch = yes
				}
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			unlock_decision_tooltip = RUS_LAW_STATE_RELIGION_initialize
			set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^44 = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = -0.1
			clr_country_flag = RUS_is_secular		
			add_ideas = RUS_state_religion
			RUS_increase_pp_pop = yes
			RUS_increase_rkdp_pop_small = yes
			RUS_increase_vns_pop_small = yes
			RUS_increase_ep_pop_small = yes
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.72
					days = 30
					random = 2160
				}
				country_event = {
					id = rusd.36
					days = 40
					random = 2160
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = ties_with_church
					}
					remove_ideas = ties_with_church
				}
			}
			set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^44 = 3 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #The patriarch criticises the government
	id = rusd.39
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.39" }
	title = rusd.39.t
	desc = rusd.39.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.39.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
		}
		else = {
			add_stability = 0.05
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		set_country_flag = RUS_is_secular_constitutionally
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_country_flag = nsp_banned }
			}
			RUS_increase_nsp_pop_small = yes
		}
		RUS_increase_psr_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_increase_lkdp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_pp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_rkdp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_vns_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_ep_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_nsnp_pop_small = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.47
				days = 2
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.37
				days = 20
				random = 960
			}
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.39.b
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_psr_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop_small = yes
		RUS_decrease_lkdp_pop_small = yes
		if = {
			limit = { 
				AND = {
					check_variable = { RUS_law_level = 1 }
					check_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^5 < Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^5 < 31 }
					}
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = Duma_Party_Seats^5 }
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = 30 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^5 = support_for_bill }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^5 < Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 < 31 }
					}
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^5 }
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = 30 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^5 = support_for_bill }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_LAW_GET_LKDP_DUMA_VOTES_tt
		if = {
			limit = { 
				AND = {
					check_variable = { RUS_law_level = 1 }
					check_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^12 < Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { Duma_Party_Seats^12 < 31 }
					}
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = Duma_Party_Seats^12 }
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = 30 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { CurrentDumaSupportForBill^12 = support_for_bill }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^12 < Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 < 31 }
					}
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = Senate_Party_Total_Seats^12 }
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { support_for_bill = 30 }
				}
				add_to_variable = { CurrentSenateSupportForBill^12 = support_for_bill }
			}
		}
		count_votes_for_bill_sum = yes			
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_LAW_GET_NRPR_DUMA_VOTES_tt			
	}
}

	id = rusd.47

	desc = rusd.47.d

		add_political_power = 25
		add_stability = 0.05

		clear_law_country_flag = yes

			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_LAW_SENATE_LEVEL_DEADLINE
			}
			remove_mission = RUS_LAW_SENATE_LEVEL_DEADLINE
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL_DEADLINE
			}
			remove_mission = RUS_LAW_DUMA_LEVEL_DEADLINE
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_LAW_MONARCH_DECIDES_DEADLINE
			}
			remove_mission = RUS_LAW_MONARCH_DECIDES_DEADLINE
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				has_active_mission = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_DECIDES_DEADLINE
			}
			remove_mission = RUS_LAW_PRESIDENT_DECIDES_DEADLINE
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { #Reorg of Cossack Hosts
	id = rusd.48
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.48" }
	title = rusd.48.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				psr_in_power = yes
				has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusd.48.d.srs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_right_democratic_government = yes
				has_authoritarian_government = yes
			}
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		text = rusd.48.d.rovs
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = {
			psr_in_power = no
			has_right_democratic_government = no
			has_authoritarian_government = no
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo }
			RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
		}
		text = rusd.48.d.dem
	}
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved
	}
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_1
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes	

	option = { #More funds to the Hosts!
		name = rusd.48.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					psr_in_power = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					rsdrp_in_power = yes
					RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
					has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { russia_is_democratic = yes }
			unlock_decision_tooltip = RUS_LAW_COSSACK_HOSTS_initialize
			set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^45 = 1 }
		}
		else = {
			RUS_can_into_cossack_hosts = yes
		}
	}
	option = { #Fine as they are
		name = rusd.48.b
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 100 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					RUS_russian_monarch = yes
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					rsdrp_in_power = yes
					RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
					has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05		
	}
}
country_event = { #Motherland mass
	id = rusd.72
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.72"}
	title = rusd.72.t

	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.secular
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.72.d.orthodox
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.72"
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				75 = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 555
							random = 2880
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.72
							days = 555
							random = 1440
						}
					}
				}
				25 = {
					if = {
						limit = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 555
							random = 1440
						}
					}
					else = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.74
							days = 555
							random = 2880
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.72.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_is_secular }
		}
		add_political_power = 25
	}
}

		}

		}

		}

	}

country_event = { #Kornilov's government
	id = rusd.53
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.53"}
	title = rusd.53.t
	desc = rusd.53.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.025
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				power_balance_value = {
					id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
					value > 0
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 45
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				power_balance_value = {
					id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
					value < 0
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.53.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = kornilov_stays_pm_tooltip
	}

country_event = { #Kornilov's Death
	id = rusd.54
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.54"}
	title = rusd.54.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.savinkov
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
			}
		}
	}
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_kornilov_in_power = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
		NOT = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_kornilov_ruler
		}
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
			has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_savinkov_pm = yes
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Boris Savinkov"
				desc = "POLITICS_BORIS_SAVINKOV_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Boris_Savinkov_President.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = savinkovism_subtype
				traits = { vozhd }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.60
				days = 5
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.1
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = foreign_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksandr_Dikgof_Derental_for_npo
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_Manshteyn_sec_npo
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = national_populist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.35
		}
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_savinkov_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = RUS_vozhdct
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		remove_power_balance = { id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict }
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
		hidden_effect = {
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.66
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.54.e
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		remove_power_balance = { id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict }
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Pyotr Wrangel"
				desc = "POLITICS_PYOTR_VRANGEL_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Pyotr_Wrangel.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"

				traits = { RUS_black_baron }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.66
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	id = rusd.55

	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.savinkov

			has_idea = RUS_Boris_V_Savinkov_hog_npo
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.54.d.denikin

			OR = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
			}
		}
	}

		tag = RUS

		}

	id = rusd.56
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.56"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_death_kornilov
	title = rusd.54.t
	desc = rusd.56.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS_kornilov_in_power = no
		NOT = { has_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.56.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 402
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 402 }
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = {
						ruling_only = yes
						name = "Lavr Kornilov"
					}
					NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
				}
			    }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
		}
	}
}
}

country_event = { #Fate of Russia
	id = rusd.66
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.66"}
	title = rusd.66.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.66.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.67
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = bolsheviks_banned
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.b
		trigger = {
			RUS_denikin_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.69
			days = 2
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { has_country_flag = transamur_monarchy_restored }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = TRM
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.68
				days = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_kornilov_idea = yes
			if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					TRM = {
						NOT = {
							has_country_leader = {
								ruling_only = yes
								name = "Kirill I"
							}
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
			}
			else = { set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI }
		    }
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.66.e
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_russian_junta_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		add_stability = -0.075
		RUS_setup_tsar_wrangel = yes
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Black_Tsar
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_all_ministers_but_hog = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_mli
				RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
				RUS_Aleksandr_P_Balk_sec_pau 
			}
			random_other_country = {
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.4
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
}

			factor = 50
		}

			set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
			set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored

	id = rusd.68
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.68"}

	desc = rusd.68.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.154.a
		set_country_flag = rnsma_evolves
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = RUS_chernosot_party_long
			name = RUS_chernosot_party
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = RUS_tsar_party_long
			name = RUS_tsar_party
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = RTS
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_kirill = yes
			}
			if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_DMI
			}
			RUS_setup_tsar_dmitriy = yes
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.1541
				days = 2
			}			
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Noviyi Kurs
	id = rusd.151
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.151" }
	title = rusd.151.t
	desc = rusd.151.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.151.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DMITRIY_ARISTOCRATIC_REPUBLIC
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_Senate_Warning_tooltip
		add_stability = 0.05
		set_country_flag = DM_Senate_support
		add_ideas = RUS_new_senate_1
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.152
				days = 60
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.184
				days = 150
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.144
				days = 210
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.145
				days = 240
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.146
				days = 240
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.151.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_CENTER_REPUBLIC
				} 
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL

					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DENIKIN
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_denikin
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
			left_side = RUS_denikin_side 
			right_side = RUS_wrangel_side
			set_value = -0.1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_post_assassination
					option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_wrangel
		set_power_balance = {
			id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
			left_side = RUS_denikin_side 
			right_side = RUS_wrangel_side
			set_value = 0.05
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RCW_used_savinkovs_help
					event_target:soviet_russia = { exists = yes }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = {
					id = rcw.205
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.209.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = nrpr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABSOLUTE_MONARCHY
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_select_savinkov
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.56
			days = 2
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Talk to royal
	id = rusd.210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.210" }
	title = rusd.210.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.210.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.210.a
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value < -0.4
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value > 0.4
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					90 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					10 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value < -0.5
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					30 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					70 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					power_balance_value = {
						id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict
						value > 0.5
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					40 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.212
							days = 2
						}
					}
					60 = {
						country_event = {
							id = rusd.211
							days = 2
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.211.t.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.denikin
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.211.d.wrangel
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_denikin_wrangel_choose_monarchy
		set_country_flag = RUS_TSAR_KIR
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
		else = {
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		}
		RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		set_country_flag = RUS_denikin_choose_republic
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.211.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		RUS_increase_denikin = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		set_country_flag = RUS_wrangel_choose_tsar
	}
}

	id = rusd.94

		tag = RUS
		has_country_leader = {
			ruling_only = yes
			name = "Boris II"
		}
	}
	title = rusd.94.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.has_heir
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.94.d.no_heir
		trigger = {
			NOT = {	has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession }
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.94"
		set_country_flag = Boris_Romanov_dead
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.94.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.94.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			has_completed_focus = RUS_A_Clear_Line_Of_Succession
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Kirill Romanov dies
	id = rusd.95

	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.95.t.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.95.d.other
		trigger = {
			RUS_wrangel_in_power = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirill_dead
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.95"
		set_country_flag = Kirill_Romanov_dead
		hidden_effect = {
			TRM = { country_event = tram.5 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_God_Save_the_Tsar }
			RUS_tsar_kirill = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			kill_country_leader = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_tsar_vladimir = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.95.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_monarchy_restored
					RUS_tsar_kirill = no
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Denikin's Death
	id = rusd.96
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.96" }
	title = rusd.96.t
	desc = rusd.96.d.hos

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.96.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_denikin_in_power = no
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau }
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 401
			}
			retire = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.96.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				RUS_denikin_in_power = yes
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Anton_I_Denikin_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				has_id = 401
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
				add_idea = RUS_Abram_Dragomirov_hog_pau
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS_denikin_in_power = yes
			}
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Ivan Romanovsky"
				desc = "POLITICS_IVAN_ROMANOVSKIY_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Ivan_Romanovsky.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = authdem_junta_subtype
			}
		}		
	}
}

	id = rusd.100
	immediate = { 
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.100"

		}
	}

	desc = rusd.100.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.97.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_hog_sli
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_mli
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.100.b
		trigger = {
			has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_hog_sli
		}
		remove_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_hog_sli
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikolay_V_Nekrasov_hog_sli
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Pavel_N_Milyukov_for_sli
			add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_B_Struve_for_mli
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.100.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Pavel Milyukov"
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Dmitriy's death
	id = rusd.103

	title = {
		text = rusd.103.t.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.103.t.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.103.d.not_tsar
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.103"
		set_country_flag = Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_dead
		clr_country_flag = romanov_vns_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_sco
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Dmitri_Pavlovich_Romanov_eco_sco
				add_ideas = RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_country_flag = VNS_oligarchic }
				}
				set_variable = { RUS_vns_minister_eco = token:RUS_Ivan_G_Erdeli_eco_sco }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.103.a
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
		RUS_setup_tsar_pavel = yes
		add_stability = -0.12
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.100.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = yes
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS_setup_acting_president_senate = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.103.c
		trigger = {
			RUS_tsar_dmitriy = no
			RUS_dmitriy_romanov_in_power = no
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = rusd.110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.110" }
	title = rusd.110.t
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.110.d.chairman
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}	

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.110.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Aleksey Rykov"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		}				
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.110.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Andrey_Zhdanov_hog_rso  
		}
		effect_tooltip = { 
			kill_country_leader = yes 
			create_field_marshal = { name = "Andrei Zhdanov" }
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			end_coalition = yes 
			XXA = {
				random_unit_leader = { 
					limit = { has_id = 1941 }
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Andrei Zhdanov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Andrei_Zhdanov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
		}		
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso
		complete_national_focus = SOV_Premier_Zhdanov
		clr_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist
		set_country_flag = SOV_politburo_zhdanovites_exist
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Rykov_Faction }
		SOV_change_politburo_zhdanov = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Rykov_Faction }
		multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_rykov = yes			
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.110.c
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success
		}
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin_hog_rso  
		effect_tooltip = { 
			kill_country_leader = yes 
		}
		set_country_flag = ryutin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Martemyan Ryutin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = market_leninism_subtype
			traits = { SOV_peasant_propagandist }
		}		
		complete_national_focus = SOV_Premier_Ryutin
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.110.e
		trigger = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success
		}
		set_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
			add_ideas = RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin_hog_rso   
		effect_tooltip = { 
			kill_country_leader = yes 
		}
		set_country_flag = kosygin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kosygin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}		
		complete_national_focus = SOV_Premier_Kosygin
	}

country_event = { #1st Women's Division of Death
	id = rusd.128
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.128" }
	title = rusd.128.t
	desc = rusd.128.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_womens_division

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		controls_state = 219
		NOT = {
			has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.a #Allow it
		add_political_power = -40
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_WOMAN_DIVISION_tt
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_template = "Pekhotnaya Diviziya" }
				}
				##### Division Templates #####
				division_template = {
					name = "Pekhotnaya Diviziya"			# Rifle Division
					division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
					regiments = {
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 219 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"1ya Zhenskaya Diviziya Smerti\" division_template = \"Pekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.9"
					owner = ROOT
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "name = \"2ya Zhenskaya Diviziya Smerti\" division_template = \"Pekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.9"
					owner = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		create_corps_commander = {
			name = "Maria Bochkareva"
			portrait_path = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Maria_Bochkareva.png"
			traits = {
				trait_reckless harsh_leader
			}
			skill = 2
			attack_skill = 1
			defense_skill = 3
			planning_skill = 2
			logistics_skill = 1
			female = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_denikin = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_denikin_increase
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusd.128.b #no
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
					has_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
				}
			}
			RUS_increase_wrangel = yes
			custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_wrangel_increase
		}
	}
}

		add_stability = -0.06
		add_ideas = RUS_Vasiliy_V_Shulgin_hog_sco
		clr_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Nikolay_A_Maklakov_eco_pau
				RUS_Felix_F_Yusupov_sec_sco
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.1541.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 100
				RUS_wrangel_in_power_pataut = yes
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.02
		clr_country_flag = RUS_PUR
		add_ideas = RUS_Pyetr_N_Vrangel_hog_pau
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Nikolay_A_Maklakov_eco_pau
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_sec_pau 
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		name = rusd.1541.f
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_ideas = RUS_state_religion		
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Patriarch_Sergius_hog_pau
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		load_base_russian_tree = yes
		set_country_flag = make_absolute_monarchy_tree_visible
		mark_focus_tree_layout_dirty = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ties_with_church }
				remove_ideas = ties_with_church
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau
				RUS_Nikolay_A_Maklakov_eco_pau
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_sec_pau 
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Size of funds discussion
	id = rusd.172
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.172" }
	title = rusd.172.t
	desc = rusd.172.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusd.172.a
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.b
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 0
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = rusd.172.c
		trigger = {
			num_of_civilian_factories_available_for_projects > 1
		}
		add_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
		RUS_zemstvo_focus_events = yes
	}
}

	id = rusd.173
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.173" }
	title = rusd.173.t
	desc = rusd.173.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #civil services
		name = rusd.173.a
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_social = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_zemstva_social_focus
	}
	option = { #industry
		name = rusd.173.b
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Local_Development
		}
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_industry = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUs_zemstva_civilian_focus
	}
	option = { #research
		name = rusd.173.c
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Zemstvo_Research_Initiatives
		}
		RUS_set_zemstvo_result_research = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUs_zemstva_research_focus
	}
}

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.hospital

			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.industrial_research_bonus
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.industrial_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.industrial_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.military_research
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.military_research
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.military_research_bonus
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.military_research_bonus
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusd.174.t.military_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusd.174.d.military_research_failure
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
	}

	### Effects

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = { RUS_pick_zemstvo_states = yes }
	}

	#SOCIAL
	option = { #new hospitals
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #new schools
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
		add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #housing programme
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 0.001 }
		add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed civil investments
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		RUS_calculate_zemstva_variables = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_hospital }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_stability = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_housing }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -0.001 }
			add_war_support = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_schools }
			add_to_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = 25 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { RUS_zemstvo_base_value = -1 }
			add_political_power = RUS_zemstvo_base_value
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#INDUSTRY
	option = { #industrial expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_civilian_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #production increase
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_military_factory = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #infrastructure expansion
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { RUS_zemstvo_add_infrastructure = yes }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #agricultural development
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
					has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
				}
			}
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_2 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_3 = { add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1 }
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #refinery built
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		event_target:RUS_zemstvo_state_1 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 1
			add_building_construction = {
				type = synthetic_refinery
				level = 1
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #failed industrial investment
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_civilian_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_industry
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_infrastructure
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_agriculture
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_synthetics
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 120
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_bad_investment
				days = 60
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	#RESEARCH 

	option = { #industrial research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = industry
				category = electronics
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research breakthrough
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_positive
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #industrial research setback
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_industry_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_civil_research_negative
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research advance
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.6
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.4
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_tech_bonus = {
				name = RUS_zemsvto_research
				bonus = 0.2
				uses = 1
				category = armor
				category = air_equipment
				category = artillery
				category = infantry_tech
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research breakthrough
		name = rusd.174.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure }
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_positive
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes
	}

	option = { #military research setback
		name = rusd.174.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research
				has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_military_research_bonus
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_zemstvo_failure
		}
		if = { # big investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_large_zemstvo_investment }
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 270
			}
		}
		else_if = { # medium investment
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment }
			remove_ideas = RUS_increased_zemstvo_investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 180
			}
		}
		else = { # small investment
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_zemstva_military_research_negative
				days = 90
			}
		}
		RUS_clear_zemstvo_data = yes

country_event = { #Anniversary
	id = rusd.180
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.180"}
	picture = GFX_rus_day_after
	title = rusd.180.t
	desc = rusd.180.d
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		RUS = {
			has_democratic_government = yes
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.180.a
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.180
				days = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Rakhaminov
	id = rusd.181
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusd.181" }
	title = rusd.181.t
	desc = rusd.181.d
	
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rakhmaninov
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		american_civil_war = yes
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusd.181.a
		add_political_power = 15
	}
}
###Socialist events
country_event = { #Unlock political decisions
	id = russoc.1
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.1"}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_revolution
	title = russoc.1.t
	desc = russoc.1.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {#Popular Front decision
		name = russoc.1.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		custom_effect_tooltip = unlock_congress_tt
		set_country_flag = unlock_congress_sov
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk }
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1 }
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk_1
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso }
				}
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
					long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Maria Spiridonova"
				desc = "POLITICS_MARIA_SPIRIDONOVA_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Maria_Spiridonova.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
				female = yes
				traits = { RUS_valkrye_of_revolution }
			}

			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
				desc = "POLITICS_NIKOLAI_BUKHARIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Bukharin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
				traits = { RUS_ex_bolshevik  }
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.2
				days = 4
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.141
				days = 288
				random_days = 600
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.156
				days = 88
				random_days = 250
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.108
				days = 110
				random_days = 40
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.109
				days = 180
				random_days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.110
				days = 80
				random_days = 20
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.111
				days = 230
				random_days = 30
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusd.109
				days = 590
				random_days = 120
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #Socialist congress
	id = russoc.2
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.2"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_idea = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso }
				}
				set_country_flag = psr_banned
			}
			set_country_flag = rkp_banned 
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					original_tag = ALO
					ALO_has_russian_influence = yes
					ALO_bolsheviks_in_power = yes
				}
				country_event = alash.669
			}
		}
	}			
	title = russoc.2.t
	desc = russoc.2.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.2.a
		SOV_setup_soviet_congress = yes
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}
country_event = { #Nationalization of Banks?
	id = russoc.4
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.4"}
	title = russoc.4.t
	desc = russoc.4.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.4.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS }
				}
			}
		}
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_rkp = yes
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_plsr = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_modify_constitution_modifier
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_political_power_factor = 0.05
			tooltip = pp_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_consumer_goods_factor = 0.15
			tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russoc.5 days = 2 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.4.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }
				}
			}
		} 
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_psr = yes
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_nsp = yes
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_rsdrp = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_modify_constitution_modifier
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_political_power_factor = 0.02
			tooltip = pp_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_consumer_goods_factor = 0.10
			tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = russoc.5 days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS }
				}
			}
		}
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_rkp = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_left_communists = yes
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				original_tag = ALO
				ALO_has_russian_influence = yes
				ALO_bolsheviks_in_power = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = ALO_soviet_republic_congress }
				custom_effect_tooltip = russoc_7_alo_will_hate_this
				hidden_effect = {
					ALO = {
						country_event = alash.667
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				hidden_effect = {
					ALO = {
						country_event = alash.666
					}
				}
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_modify_constitution_modifier
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_political_power_factor = -0.20
			tooltip = pp_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_stability_factor = -0.10
			tooltip = stability_tooltip
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.7.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_soviet_federation
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_psr = yes
		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_nsp = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ALO = { 
						NOT = { has_country_flag = ALO_soviet_republic_congress }
						ALO_has_russian_influence = yes
						ALO_bolsheviks_in_power = yes
					}
				}
				ALO = {
					country_event = alash.666
				}
			}
		}		
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_modify_constitution_modifier
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_political_power_factor = 0.10
			tooltip = pp_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_stability_factor = 0.10
			tooltip = stability_tooltip
		}
	}
}

		}

		SOV_soviet_congress_increase_psr = yes

		SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes

		}

		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = -0.05
			tooltip = production_factory_max_efficiency_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			SOV_soviet_constitution_consumer_goods_factor = 0.10
			tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.8.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR }

country_event = {#Foreign Policy
	id = russoc.9
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.9"}
	title = russoc.9.t
	desc = russoc.9.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_internationale_question
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.9.b
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { country_exists = INT } }
			save_global_event_target_as = KR_internationale_leader
			set_global_flag = FRA_created_phalanstere
			FRA_add_to_phalanstere = yes
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				create_faction = Third_International
				else = {
					set_faction_name = Third_International
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = no }
				create_faction = fourth_internationale
				else = {
					set_faction_name = fourth_internationale
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = FRA_created_phalanstere }
				FRA_add_to_phalanstere = yes
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			INT = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction_with = INT
					NOT = {
						tag = INT
						tag = FIN
						tag = EST
						tag = LAT
						tag = LIT
						tag = WHR
						tag = UKR
						tag = POL
					}
				}
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					INT = {
						any_allied_country = {
							OR = {
								tag = FIN
								tag = EST
								tag = LAT
								tag = LIT
								tag = WHR
								tag = UKR
								tag = POL
								tag = GEO
								tag = BUL
								tag = ARM
								tag = ABK
								tag = PER
							}
							is_subject = no
						}
					}
				}
				custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction_with = INT
						OR = {
							tag = FIN
							tag = EST
							tag = LAT
							tag = LIT
							tag = WHR
							tag = UKR
							tag = POL
							tag = GEO
							tag = BUL
							tag = ARM
							tag = ABK
							tag = PER
						}
					}
					country_event = russoc.114
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = {#Constitution
	id = russoc.11
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.11"}
	title = russoc.11.t
	desc = russoc.11.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.11.a
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_political_power = 50
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = SOV_soviet_constitution }
		custom_effect_tooltip = elections_in_two_months
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_plsr }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_psr }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_nsp }
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_rsdrp }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.12
				days = 60
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = {#Results
	id = russoc.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.12"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			SOV_run_election = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			set_country_flag = soviet_congress_end
			clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_ongoing
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_plsr }
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
				}
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_psr }
			}
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_nsp }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_boost_rsdrp }
			#country_event = {
			#	id = russoc.39
			#	days = 1360
			#}
		}
	}
	title = russoc.12.t
	desc = russoc.12.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { SOV_plsr_votes > SOV_nsp_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_plsr_votes > SOV_psr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_plsr_votes > SOV_rsdrp_votes } 
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
					}
					
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = syndicalist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 48
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
			RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.154
				days = 180
				random_days = 60
			}			
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
			OR = {
				AND = {					
					check_variable = { SOV_psr_votes > SOV_nsp_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_psr_votes > SOV_plsr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_psr_votes > SOV_rsdrp_votes } 
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR }
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 36
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			long_name = RUS_social_liberal_party_long
			name = RUS_social_liberal_party
		}
		set_country_flag = psr_victorous
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_K_Volsky_hog_rso
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Ivan_N_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_I_Ivanov_eco_rso
			RUS_Kost_S_Burevoy_sec_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Vladimir Volsky"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Vladimir Volsky"
				desc = "POLITICS_VOLSKY_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Vladimir_Volsky.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = narodism_subtype
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.154
				days = 180
				random_days = 60
			}	
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.158
				days = 60
				random_days = 20
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					check_variable = { SOV_nsp_votes > SOV_psr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_nsp_votes > SOV_plsr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_nsp_votes > SOV_rsdrp_votes } 
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					OR = {
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
						has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = radical_socialist
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 36
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
			RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_sec_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Bukharin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
				traits = { RUS_ex_bolshevik }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.154
				days = 180
				random_days = 60
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = SOV_kamenev_party
				long_name = SOV_kamenev_party_long
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
				long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.12.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {					
					check_variable = { SOV_rsdrp_votes > SOV_psr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_rsdrp_votes > SOV_plsr_votes } 
					check_variable = { SOV_rsdrp_votes > SOV_nsp_votes } 
				}
				AND = {
					is_ai = yes
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
			factor = 1000
			has_game_rule = {
					rule = SOV_path
					option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS
				}
			}
		}
		meta_effect = {
			text = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
					election_frequency = 36
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
			}
			CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
		}
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde
			RUS_Andrey_Vyshinsky_for_sde
			RUS_Nikolay_Sukhanov_eco_sde
			RUS_Vyacheslav_P_Volgin_sec_sde
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Solomon Lozovskiy"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Solomon_Lozovsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = syndie_social_democrat_subtype
		}
	}
}
