country_event = { #Russia wants to join the Internationale
	id = russoc.100
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.100" }
	title = russoc.100.t
	desc = russoc.100.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.100.a
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
			set_country_flag = was_in_faction_with_RUS
		}
		FROM = { dismantle_faction = yes }
		add_to_faction = FROM
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = was_in_faction_with_RUS }
			ROOT = { add_to_faction = PREV }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.100.b
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.101
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.23"}
	title = russoc.23.t
	desc = russoc.23.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				has_state_category = one
				has_state_category = two 
				has_state_category = three
				has_state_category = four
				has_state_category = five
			}
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_resources = 0.15
					local_supplies = 0.15
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_political_power = -50
	}	
}
country_event = { #Famine
	id = russoc.24
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.24"}
	title = russoc.24.t
	desc = russoc.24.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.24.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = RUS.RUS_starting_states_array
			add_state_modifier = {
				modifier = {
					local_manpower = 0.3
					local_resources = 0.15
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { has_resistance = yes }
			add_compliance = 5
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Alliance_With_Left_SRs
			}
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = RUS_Eurasian_Bolsheviks_1
				add_idea = RUS_Eurasian_Bolsheviks_2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.23.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = 0.1
		add_political_power = 100
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_3 = yes
	}	
}
country_event = { #Profintern
	id = russoc.25
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.25"}
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_political_power = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_factories = 0 }
			set_variable = { RUS_profintern_socdem_bonus = 0.02 }
		}
	}
	title = russoc.25.t
	desc = russoc.25.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_profintern
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.25.a
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = SOV_profintern_leader_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = SOV_profintern_leader }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_political_power = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_profintern_factories = 1 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_socialist_government = yes
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
				NOT = { 
					is_in_faction_with = ENT 
					tag = AUS
					is_subject_of = AUS
					is_in_faction_with = AUS
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.26
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Profintern
	id = russoc.26
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.26"}
	title = russoc.26.t
	desc = russoc.26.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
		picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_profintern
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.26.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.27
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.26.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_government = totalist
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					original_tag = UKR
					tag = TRK
				}
			}
		}
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_political_power = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0 }
		set_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_given_factories = 0 }
		set_variable = { RUS_profintern_socdem_bonus = 0.02 }
		add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = SOV_profintern_member_modifier }
		hidden_effect = { add_ideas = SOV_profintern_member }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_political_power = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_max_efficiency = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_construction_speed = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_factory_output = 0.01 }
		add_to_variable = { ROOT.RUS_profintern_given_factories = 1 }
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.28
				days = 3
				random_days = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Chekist
	id = russoc.37
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.37"}
	title = russoc.37.t
	desc = russoc.37.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_sr_coup
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.37.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }					
			}
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Iosif_M_Ostrovsky_eco_syn
		SOV_increase_chekist = yes
		SOV_decrease_legalist = yes
		set_temp_variable = { syn_pop = party_popularity@syndicalist }
		multiply_temp_variable = { syn_pop = 100 }
		set_political_party = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = syn_pop
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = -0.25
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Yakov Fishman"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_SOV_Yakov_Fishman.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = socialist_security_state_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = RUS_fishman_party
			long_name = RUS_fishman_party_long
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 430 }
			retire = yes
		}
		add_ideas = SOV_fishman_councils
		hidden_effect = {
            remove_ideas ={
				RUS_councils
				peasant_councils
				SOV_decentralized_syndicates
			}
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.37.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
			}
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
			RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
			RUS_Vladimir_E_Trutovskiy_sec_syn
		}
		SOV_decrease_chekist = yes
		hidden_effect = { SOV_decrease_chekist = yes }
		SOV_increase_legalist = yes		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Vladimir Trutovsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_SOV_Vladimir_Trutovsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 430 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
		unlock_national_focus = SOV_Left_SR_Countercoup
	}	
}

country_event = { #Soviet elections
	id = russoc.39
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.39"}
	title = russoc.39.t
	desc = russoc.39.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
		trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		NOT = { has_government = totalist }
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rkp_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = syndicalist
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Premier_Volsky
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Introduce_NEP
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_nsp_union_with_rsdrp }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
}
country_event = {#Results
	id = russoc.40
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.40"}
	immediate = {
		SOV_run_election = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.41
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	title = russoc.40.t
	desc = russoc.40.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		NOT = { has_government = totalist }
		NOT = {
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				ruling_only = yes
			}
			has_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksandr Yegorov"
				ruling_only = yes
		}
	}	
		russian_civil_war = no
	}	
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = plsr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = syndicalist
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = SOV_plsr_victory value = 1 days = 100 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = syndicalist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = psr_banned }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Premier_Volsky
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = SOV_psr_victory value = 1 days = 100 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_completed_focus = SOV_Introduce_NEP
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = SOV_nsp_victory value = 1 days = 100 }
		if = {
			limit = {

					name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = syndicalist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = {
				ideology = radical_socialist
				popularity = 0.12
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.39.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = rsdrp_banned }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_nsp_union_with_rsdrp }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 19
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				has_government = social_democrat
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = { flag = SOV_rsdrp_victory value = 1 days = 100 }
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.12
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.41.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = SOV_plsr_victory
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Left_SR_Countercoup }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			country_event = russia.2018
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Maria Spiridonova"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Maria Spiridonova"

				female = yes
				traits = { RUS_valkrye_of_revolution }
			}

				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = syndicalist
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 36
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
				RUS_Vladimir_A_Karelin_for_syn
				RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn

			popularity = 0.05
		}

			has_country_flag = SOV_rsdrp_victory
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Solomon Lozovsky"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Solomon Lozovsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Solomon_Lozovsky.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = syndie_social_democrat_subtype
			}
			meta_effect = {
				text = {
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_democrat
						last_election = "[CURRENT_DATE]"
						election_frequency = 36
						elections_allowed = yes
					}
				}
				CURRENT_DATE = "[?global.date.GetDateStringNoHour]"
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Rafail_Abramovich_hog_sde
				RUS_Andrey_Vyshinsky_for_sde
				RUS_Nikolay_Sukhanov_eco_sde
				RUS_Vyacheslav_P_Volgin_sec_sde
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = SOV_union_formed 
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.05
		}
	}

country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.43
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.43"}
	title = russoc.43.t
	desc = russoc.43.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.43.a
		add_stability = -0.25
		hidden_effect = {
			random_list = {
				65 = {
					modifier = {
						add = 35
						202 = { NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT } }
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.44
						days = 15
					}
				}
				35 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				45 = {
					modifier = {
						add = 35
						11 = { NOT = { is_core_of = ROOT } }
					}
					random_list = {
						20 = {
							set_country_flag = latvia_will_revolt
						}
						80 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						40 = {
							set_country_flag = lithuania_will_revolt
						}
						60 = {
						}
					}					
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.45
						days = 20
						random_days = 20
					}
				}
				55 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				50 = {
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.46
						days = 25
					}
				}
				50 = {
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				80 = {
					random_list = {
						80 = {
							set_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
						}
						20 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						40 = {
							set_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
						}
						60 = {
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						30 = {
							set_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
						}
						70 = {
						}
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.47
						days = 30
					}
				}
				20 = {
				}
			}
		}				
	}
}
country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.44
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.44"}
	title = russoc.44.t
	desc = russoc.44.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.44.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					state = 792
					state = 201
					state = 199
					state = 1228
					state = 198
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			add_to_array = { global.RUS_integration_state_array = PREV }
			add_core_of = UKR
			transfer_state_to = UKR
		}
		UKR = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Oleksander Shumsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Oleksander_Shumsky.png" 
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = UKR
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.44.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = no
				OR = {
					is_core_of = UKR
					is_core_of = WSU
					is_core_of = GAL
					is_east_galicia = yes
				}
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = UKR
			transfer_state_to = UKR
		}
		UKR = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Oleksander Shumsky"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/UKR/Portrait_UKR_Oleksander_Shumsky.png" 
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_communism_subtype
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.48
				days = 2
			}
		}		
	}	
}
country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.45
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.45"}
	title = russoc.45.t
	desc = russoc.45.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.45.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = lithuania_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 11
						state = 96
					}
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = LIT
				transfer_state_to = LIT
			}
			LIT = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Augustinas Voldemaras"
					desc = "POLITICS_VOLDEMARAS_DESC"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/LIT/Portrait_LIT_Augustinas_Voldemaras_KX.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = national_populist_subtype
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = LIT
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = latvia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 1091
						state = 190
					}
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = LAT
				transfer_state_to = LIT
			}
			LAT = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = national_populist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = national_populist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = LAT
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}		
	}		
}

country_event = { #Dissolution
	id = russoc.47
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.47"}
	title = russoc.47.t
	desc = russoc.47.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.47.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = GEO
			transfer_state_to = GEO
		}
		GEO = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}			
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = GEO
			type = annex_everything
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ARM
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = ARM
				transfer_state_to = ARM
			}
			ARM = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = totalist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = totalist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = ARM
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = MTR
					NOT = { is_core_of = AZE }
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = MTR
				transfer_state_to = MTR
			}
			MTR = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = MTR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = AZE
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = AZE
				AZE = { transfer_state = PREV }
				transfer_state_to = AZE
			}
			AZE = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = AZE
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.47.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_core_of = GEO
			}
			remove_core_of = ROOT
			add_core_of = GEO
			transfer_state_to = GEO
		}
		GEO = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = totalist
				elections_allowed = no
			}			
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = totalist
				popularity = 30
			}
			clear_all_relations = yes
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.48
				days = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = armenia_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ARM
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = ARM
				transfer_state_to = ARM
			}
			ARM = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = totalist
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = totalist
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
				country_event = {
					id = russoc.48
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mtr_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = MTR
					NOT = { is_core_of = AZE }
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = MTR
				transfer_state_to = MTR
			}
			MTR = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = paternal_autocrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = MTR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = azeri_will_revolt
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = AZE
				}
				remove_core_of = ROOT
				add_core_of = AZE
				transfer_state_to = AZE
			}
			AZE = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = social_democrat
					popularity = 30
				}
				clear_all_relations = yes
			}
			declare_war_on = {
				target = AZE
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}		
}
country_event = { #Troika
	id = russoc.48
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.48"}
	title = russoc.48.t
	desc = russoc.48.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.48.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.2
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.48.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					is_russian_majority_in_ukraine = yes
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		get_current_government_type = yes
		FROM = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomous_state = kr_nominal_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
		}
		restore_previous_government_type = yes				
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.51
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.51"}
	title = russoc.51.t
	desc = russoc.51.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bolshevik_question
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.51.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_CHEKA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PLSR_LEGALIST }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_NSP }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_PSR }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_MENSHEVIKS }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
				}
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_plsr_pop = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop = yes
		remove_radsoc_from_coalition = yes
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Isaak_Z_Shteinberg_eco_syn
		hidden_effect = {			
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.53
				days = 15
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rcw.490
				days = 30
			}			
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.51.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_BOLSHEVIKS }
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.50
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}	
}

			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_red_junta_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			}
			set_politics = { ruling_party = radical_socialist }
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_politburo_dissolved
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = RUS_yegorov_party
			long_name = RUS_yegorov_party_long

			limit = {

				has_unit_leader = 1955
			}

				id = russoc.62
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {			
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.63
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}	
}

		text = russoc.63.d
		trigger = {
			has_unit_leader = 1954
			has_unit_leader = 1955
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.63.d2
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				has_unit_leader = 1954
				has_unit_leader = 1955
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes

		name = russoc.63.a

			retire_country_leader = yes 
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_french_clique
						has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_british_clique
					}
				}
				retire = yes
			}
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = syndicalist }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.20 }
		remove_ideas = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
		RUS_remove_nep = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_french_clique
						has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_british_clique
					}
				}
				set_nationality = XXA
			}
		}
	}	
}
	
country_event = { #
	id = russoc.64
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.64"}
	title = russoc.64.t
	desc = russoc.64.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_yegorov
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.64.a
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 449 }		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
				}
			}
		}

		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Georgy Zhukov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_SOV_Georgy_Zhukov.png"

			RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso

			ideology = totalist
			long_name = RUS_red_army_party_long
			name = RUS_red_army_party
		}

		set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_dissolved 
		set_country_flag = zhukov_rules_alone

				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp }				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_psp_party_long
					name = SOV_psp_party
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_rkp }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = RUS_totalist_party_long
					name = RUS_totalist_party
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_kamenev_party_long
					name = SOV_kamenev_party
				}
			}
			else = {				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
					name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
				}
			}	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.64.b
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 1954 }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { retire_country_leader = yes }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tukhachevsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = internationalism_subtype
			traits = { red_napoleon }
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Mikhail_Tukhachevskiy_hog_tot
			RUS_Iona_Yakir_for_tot
			RUS_Ieronim_Uborevich_eco_tot
			RUS_Vitaliy_Primakov_sec_tot
		}
		set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_tukhachevsky
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			long_name = SOV_tukh_party_long
			name = SOV_tukh_party
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = totalist }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.20 }
		RUS_remove_nep = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
			set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_dissolved 
			set_country_flag = tukhachevsky_power
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.159
				days = 180
				random_days = 600
			}		
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp }				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_psp_party_long
					name = SOV_psp_party
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_rkp }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = RUS_totalist_party_long
					name = RUS_totalist_party
				}
			}

				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_kamenev_party_long
					name = SOV_kamenev_party
				}
			}

					long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
					name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
				}
			}	
		}

		trigger = {

		}

			modifier = {

					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }

		RUS_remove_nep = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.159
				days = 180
				random_days = 600
			}		
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp }				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_psp_party_long
					name = SOV_psp_party
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_rkp }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = RUS_totalist_party_long
					name = RUS_totalist_party
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_kamenev_party_long
					name = SOV_kamenev_party
				}
			}
			else = {				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = RUS_radical_socialist_party_long
					name = RUS_radical_socialist_party
				}
			}	
		} 
	}	
}

	id = russoc.65
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.65"}
	title = russoc.65.t
	desc = russoc.65.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vasilevsky
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.60.a
		add_ideas = SOV_specter_of_red_thermidor
		activate_mission = SOV_deal_with_red_thermidor_left_sr
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_idea = RUS_Restored_Cheka 
					has_idea = RUS_Restored_Cheka_lar
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_case_of_british_clique }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_case_of_italian_clique }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_deal_with_mensheviks }
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_deal_with_bukharinist_generals }
	}	
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.66
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.66"}
	title = russoc.66.t
	desc = russoc.66.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_frunze
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.66.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = SOV_specter_of_red_thermidor }
			remove_ideas = SOV_specter_of_red_thermidor
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Georgiy_K_Zhukov_hog_tot
			RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso
			RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_eco_rso
			RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksandr Vasilevsky"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksandr_Vasilevskiy.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_red_junta_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_government = radical_socialist }
			}
			set_politics = { ruling_party = radical_socialist }
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = RUS_yegorov_party
			long_name = RUS_yegorov_party_long
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_unit_leader = 447
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.67
				days = 2
			}
		}
		else = {			
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.69
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}	
}

		name = russoc.67.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 90
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.69
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.67.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = { 
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_ZHUKOV }
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.68
			days = 2
		}
	}	
}
	
country_event = { #
	id = russoc.68
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.68"}
	title = russoc.68.t
	desc = russoc.68.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vasilevsky
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.68.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = SOV_specter_of_red_thermidor }
			remove_ideas = SOV_specter_of_red_thermidor
		}
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_Vasilevsky_dead
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 607 }
			retire = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 449 }
			retire = yes
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = syndicalist }
		add_popularity = { ideology = syndicalist popularity = 0.20 }
		remove_ideas = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Maria_A_Spiridonova_hog_syn
		RUS_remove_nep = yes
	}	
}

		text = russoc.69.d
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 447 }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.69.d2
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_unit_leader = 447 }
		}
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vasilevsky
		
	option = {
		name = russoc.64.a
		trigger = { has_unit_leader = 449 }		
		ai_chance = {
			base = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_TUKHA }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }
				}
			}
		}

			name = "Georgy Zhukov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Portrait_SOV_Georgy_Zhukov.png"

			ideology = red_junta_subtype
		}

			ideology = totalist
			long_name = RUS_red_army_party_long
			name = RUS_red_army_party
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = totalist }
		add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.20 }
		clr_country_flag = SOV_Troika_power_struggle
		set_country_flag = SOV_Troika_dissolved 
		set_country_flag = zhukov_rules_alone
		RUS_remove_nep = yes
		hidden_effect = {		
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp }				
				set_party_name = {
					ideology = radical_socialist
					long_name = SOV_psp_party_long
					name = SOV_psp_party

			}

					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_path option = RULE_OPTION_SOV_PATH_FRUNZE }

country_event = { #Socialist Victory in the Civil War (GER)
	id = russoc.103
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.103 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.103.t
	desc = russoc.103.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1
	fire_only_once = yes
	#trigger = {
	#	tag = GER
	#	soviets_exist = yes
	#	SOV = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur } }
	#}
	#mean_time_to_happen = {
	#	days = 5
	#}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russoc.103.a #Offer protection to all threatened nations
		ai_chance = { base = 85 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = POL
					tag = FIN
					tag = DKB
					tag = KUB
					tag = GEO
				}
				at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = yes
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				has_socialist_government = no
				NOT = {
					has_government = national_populist
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.119
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.103.b #We don't fear the Russians
		ai_chance = { base = 15 }
		add_political_power = -50
	}
}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Collectivization
	
	trigger = {
		tag = SOV
		has_idea = SOV_mass_collectivization
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.106.a
		add_stability = -0.05
	}
}

country_event = { #Rename for Russian Cities
	id = russoc.112
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.112" }
	title = russoc.112.t
	desc = russoc.112.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Grigory Zinoviev"
			}
			has_country_leader = {
				ruling_only = yes
				name = "Sovnarkom"
			}
			has_country_flag = bolsheviks_victorous
			has_country_flag = zhukov_invites_bolsheviks
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Bolsheviks_In_Power
			nsp_in_power = yes
			has_country_flag = right_communists_victorous
		}
		has_socialist_government = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.112.a
		set_country_flag = soviet_speaking_tag
		set_province_name = { id = 6174 name = "Leningrad" }
		195 = { 
			set_state_flag = renamed_state_leningrad 
			set_state_name = "Leningrad"
		}
		set_province_name = { id = 392 name = "Ulyanovsk" }
		250 = { set_state_name = "Ulyanovsk" }
		set_province_name = { id = 6245 name = "Bakunin" }
		247 = { set_state_name = "Bakunin" }
		set_province_name = { id = 11523 name = "Engels" }
		401 = { set_state_name = "Engels" }
		set_province_name = { id = 11375 name = "Gorky" }
		252 = { set_state_name = "Gorky" }
		set_province_name = { id = 1821 name = "Sverdlovsk" }
		653 = { set_state_name = "Sverdlovsk" }
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_controlled_state = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Eastern Front of the Internationale
	id = russoc.114
	title = russoc.114.t
	desc = russoc.114.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.114 option russoc.114.a"
		name = russoc.114.a #Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		SOV = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.114 option russoc.114.claims"
		name = russoc.114.claims #Yes, but for all of our claims
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.1150 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.114 option russoc.114.b"
		name = russoc.114.b #We'd rather stay with France
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
	}
}

country_event = { # An Invitation to the Internationale
	id = russoc.115
	title = russoc.115.t

	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.guaranteed
		trigger = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.115.d.invited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	trigger = {
		FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.115 option russoc.115.a"
		name = russoc.115.a #Yes, let's join forces
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			}
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		else = {
			var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = russoc.116 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.115 option russoc.115.claims"
		name = russoc.115.claims #Yes, but for all of our claims
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.1150 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.115 option russoc.115.b"
		name = russoc.115.b #We shouldn't provoke Germany...
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.117 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = russoc.1150
	title = russoc.1150.t
	desc = russoc.1150.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1150 option russoc.1150.a"
		name = russoc.1150.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = FROM }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				every_core_state = {
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
					remove_core_of = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.1151 }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1150 option russoc.1150.b"
		name = russoc.1150.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 1
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.1152 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = russoc.1151
	title = russoc.1151.t
	desc = russoc.1151.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1151 option russoc.1151.a"
		name = russoc.1151.a
		leave_faction = yes
		set_global_flag = TEMPORARY_DISABLED_FACTION_POPUP
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
		}
		every_core_state = {
			remove_claim_by = FROM
			remove_core_of = FROM
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1151 option russoc.1151.b"
		name = russoc.1151.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		var:FROM.faction_leader = { country_event = russoc.1153 }
	}
}

	id = russoc.1152
	title = russoc.1152.t
	desc = russoc.1152.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1152 option russoc.1152.a"
		name = russoc.1152.a
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = { country_event = russoc.1154 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1152 option russoc.1152.b"
		name = russoc.1152.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		add_political_power = 20
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # FROM Seeks Membership in the Internationale
	id = russoc.1153
	title = russoc.116.t

	desc = {
		text = russoc.116.d.guaranteed
		trigger = {
			FROM = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.116.d.invited
		trigger = {
			FROM = { NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = RUS } }
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_Young_Pioneers

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1153 option russoc.116.a"
		name = russoc.116.a #Welcome, comrades
		add_to_faction = FROM
		hidden_effect = {
			RUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					if = {
						limit = { is_claimed_by = RUS }
						remove_claim_by = RUS
					}
					if = {
						limit = { is_core_of = RUS }
						remove_core_of = RUS
					}
				}
				country_event = russoc.1180
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.1153 option russoc.116.b"
		name = russoc.116.b #No, we don't need them
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { country_event = russoc.118 }
	}
}

country_event = { #German Protection? (POL/FIN/DKB/GEO/AZE/KUB/MTR/KLY)
	id = russoc.119
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.119 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = russoc.119.t
	desc = russoc.119.d

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.119.a #Accept
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = DKB
				don_is_pro_german = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = KUB
				KUB_has_chernomortsy = no
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = FIN
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = KLY
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		GER = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.120
				days = 1
				random = 24
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.b #Ask for a guarantee only
		trigger = {
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 4
				tag = MTR
				NOT = { has_government = paternal_autocrat }
			}
		}
		GER = { give_guarantee = ROOT }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					tag = DKB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = KLY
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = KUB
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = MTR
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					tag = MTR
				}
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						tag = AZE
						has_war = no
						is_subject = no
						is_in_faction = no
					}
					country_event = {
						id = russoc.119
						days = 2
						random = 48
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russoc.119.c #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				tag = POL
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Bukharin's death
	id = russoc.121
	title = russoc.121.t
	desc = russoc.121.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bukharin_smoke
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
		has_country_leader = {
			name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
			ruling_only = yes
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.121.a
		set_country_flag = Nikolay_I_Bukharin_dead
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Congress of Soviets"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sovnarkom.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.125
				days = 180
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Bukharinists
	id = russoc.123
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.123"}
	title = russoc.123.t
	desc = russoc.123.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_aleksey_kosygin
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.123.a
		set_country_flag = SOV_kosygin_is_in_politburo
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.123.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
	}

			base = 33
		}
		set_country_flag = kosygin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kosygin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin_hog_rso  
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.125.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 34
		}
		set_country_flag = ryutin_victorous
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Martemyan Ryutin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = market_leninism_subtype
			traits = { SOV_peasant_propagandist }
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin_hog_rso  
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.125.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 33
		}
		set_country_flag = natsynd_victorous
		clr_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_on_with_nep
		set_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep
		uncomplete_national_focus = {
			focus = SOV_Go_On_With_NEP
			uncomplete_children = yes
			refund_political_power = no
		}
		complete_national_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = totalist
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.07
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = totalist
			name = SOV_natsynd_party
			long_name = SOV_natsynd_party_long
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kuznetsov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kuznetsov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = natsynd_subtype
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_Kuznetsov_hog_rso 
	}
}

country_event = { #Kirov Humanism
	id = russoc.144
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.144"}
	title = russoc.144.t
	desc = russoc.144.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kirovchad
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.144.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			popularity = 0.06
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = RUS_vi_congress_internationalists 
					has_country_flag = SOV_nsp_union_with_rsdrp 
				}
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = social_democrat
					elections_allowed = yes
				}
				create_country_leader = {
					name = "Sergey Kirov"
					picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sergey_Kirov_gigachad.png"
					expire = "1.1.1"
					ideology = socdem_democratic_socialism_subtype
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_nsp_rkp_united }
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = radical_socialist
						name = SOV_kamenev_party
						long_name = SOV_kamenev_party_long
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_party_name = {
						ideology = social_democrat
						name = SOV_rnsp_socdem_party
						long_name = SOV_rnsp_socdem_party_long
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
					}
					set_country_leader_ideology = socdem_humanistic_capitalism_subtype
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
					has_government = radical_socialist
				}
				set_country_leader_ideology = radsoc_humanistic_capitalism_subtype
			}
		}
	}
}

### NEP Crisis ###
country_event = { #
	id = russoc.160
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.160"}
	title = russoc.160.t
	desc = russoc.160.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_New_Economic_Policy_modifier} }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_price_control
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.160.a
		RUS_nep_increase_market = yes
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_production_speed_buildings_factor = -0.1
			tooltip = construction_speed_tooltip
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.162
				days = 170
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.160.b
		set_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^19 = 3 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_nep_increase_state
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_nep_increase_worker
		add_to_variable = { RUS_nep_market = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_nep_state = 1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_nep_peasant = -1 }
		add_to_variable = { RUS_nep_worker = 1 }
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_modify_nep	
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_consumer_goods_factor = 0.08
			tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_monthly_population = -0.03
			tooltip = monthly_population_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_local_resources_factor = -0.02
			tooltip = local_resources_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_line_change_production_efficiency_factor = 0.01
			tooltip = line_change_production_efficiency_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_industrial_capacity_factory = 0.04
			tooltip = industrial_capacity_factory_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_production_factory_max_efficiency_factor = 0.03
			tooltip = production_factory_max_efficiency_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = {
			RUS_NEP_production_factory_efficiency_gain_factor = 0.06
			tooltip = production_factory_efficiency_gain_factor_tooltip
		}		
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.161
				days = 170
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = russoc.161
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.161"}
	title = russoc.161.t
	desc = russoc.161.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_New_Economic_Policy_modifier} }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_scissors
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.161.a
		set_country_flag = RUS_nep_crisis		
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_modify_nep
		add_to_variable = { 
			RUS_NEP_production_factory_efficiency_gain_factor = -0.15
			tooltip = production_factory_efficiency_gain_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = { 
			RUS_NEP_local_resources_factor = -0.15
			tooltip = local_resources_factor_tooltip
		}
		add_to_variable = { 
			RUS_NEP_consumer_goods_factor = 0.15 
			tooltip = consumer_goods_factor_tooltip
		}		
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_reduce_costs_of_industrial_production }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_subsidize_essential_goods }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_ensure_grain_procurement }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_promote_consumer_cooperatives }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_establish_commodity_exchanges }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_offer_low_interest_loans }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_subsidize_public_services }
		activate_mission = RUS_deal_with_crisis
	}	
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.172"}

	desc = russoc.172.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_event_sokolnikov
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.172.a
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Grigory_Sokolnikov_eco_rso		
		set_country_flag = SOV_sokolnikov_is_bukharinist		
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_old_guard_exists }
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_sokolnikov_will_leave_old_guard
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
			SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 1 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
		RUS_nep_increase_market = yes
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { 
					has_war_with = ROOT 
					has_war_with = INT
				}
				is_subject = no
				is_actual_major = yes
				OR = {
					is_embargoing = ROOT
					has_country_flag = embargoed_@ROOT
				}
				NOT = { has_idea = RUS_foreign_profits } 
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.203
				days = 7
				random_days = 10
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { 
				id = russoc.206
				days = 70
				random_days = 20
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = russoc.207
				days = 120
				random_days = 40
			}
		}
	}	
}

			NOT = { has_country_flag = Anatoly_Lunacharsky_dead }

		}
	}

		text = russoc.173.d2
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Anatoly_Lunacharsky_dead
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Aleksandr_Bogdanov_dead }
		}
	}

		text = russoc.173.d3
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = Anatoly_Lunacharsky_dead
			has_country_flag = Aleksandr_Bogdanov_dead
		}

		setup_cultural_revolution_proletkult = yes
	}
	option = {

			has_country_flag = Anatoly_Lunacharsky_dead
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = SOV_Prolektult }
		setup_cultural_revolution_proletkult = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.173.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Aleksandr_Bogdanov_dead }
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
		custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = SOV_Prolektult }
		setup_cultural_revolution_proletkult = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.173.c
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_exist }
			set_country_flag = SOV_proletkult_will_support_workers_opposition
			clr_country_flag = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_proletkult_will_support_workers_opposition
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
			custom_effect_tooltip = SOV_proletkult_will_support_bukharinists
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
		effect_tooltip = { unlock_national_focus = SOV_Prolektult }
		setup_cultural_revolution_proletkult = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.174
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.174"}
	title = russoc.174.t
	desc = russoc.174.d	
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shlyapnikov
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.174.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_old_guard_exists }
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
			multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 0.7 }
			SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
			multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -0.3 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
		else = {
			SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky = yes
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
			multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 0.7 }
			SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
			multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -0.3 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
}

	option = {
		name = russoc.176.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = SOV_rkp_in_politburo
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_left_communists = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.176.b
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.176.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_bukharin_banned }
				has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist
				has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_zhdanovites_exist
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_bukharin_banned }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist }
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_rykov = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_zhdanovites_exist }
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_zhdanov = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.176.c
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_bukharin_banned }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist }
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_bukharin_banned
					has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {				
				has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_bukharin_banned
				has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_rykovites_exist
			}
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_rykov = yes
			
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #
	id = russoc.177
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.177"}
	title = russoc.177.t
	desc = russoc.177.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_event_zinoviev2
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.177.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KUZNETSOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_SHLYAPNIKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_TOMSKY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_BUKHARIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KOSYGIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYUTIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_ZHDANOV }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_rkp_in_politburo
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 4 }
		SOV_change_politburo_left_communists = yes
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.176
			days = 2
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.177.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KAMENEV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_SOKOLNIKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KIROV }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
			SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
			SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
		}
		else_if = {
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
			SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.176
			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {		
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.198
				days = 30
				random_days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.178
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.178"}
	title = russoc.178.t
	desc = russoc.178.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_party_congress
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.178.a
		set_country_flag = SOV_congress_party_new_type	
		SOV_politburo_old_guard = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
		multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 0.7 }
		SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = Politburo_Bukharin_Faction }
		multiply_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -0.3 }
		add_to_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 2 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		country_event = { 
			id = russoc.169
			days = 5
		}
		#TODO: later add this
		#activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = SOV_introduce_general_secretary }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.184
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.184"}
	title = russoc.184.t
	desc = russoc.184.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_rykov
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.184.a
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			RUS_Aleksandr_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Vasily_Shmidt_eco_rso
			RUS_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Rykov"
			desc = "POLITICS_ALEKSEY_RYKOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Rykov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype 
			traits = { SOV_partisan_of_nep }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_rykov = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.185
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.185"}
	title = russoc.185.t
	desc = {
		text = russoc.185.d
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.185.d2
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky
		}
	}
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_workers_opposition

		name = russoc.185.a
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
		}

		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success
		remove_all_ministers = yes

			RUS_Aleksandr_Shlyapnikov_hog_syn
			RUS_Aleksandra_M_Kollontai_for_syn
			RUS_Gavriil_Myasnikov_eco_syn
			RUS_Yuri_Lutovinov_sec_syn
		}

			name = "Aleksandr Shlyapnikov"
			desc = "POLITICS_ALEXANDER_SHLIAPNIKOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksandr_Shliapnikov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_syndicalist_subtype
			traits = { trade_union_boss }
		}

		SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.185.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Mikhail_Tomskiy_hog_rso
			RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_for_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep }
			add_ideas = { RUS_Timofey_V_Sapronov_eco_rso }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = { RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso }
		}
		add_ideas = { RUS_Nikolay_Uglanov_sec_rso }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Tomsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_MIKHAIL_TOMSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Tomsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.186
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.186"}
	title = russoc.186.t
	desc = russoc.186.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_SOV_event_zinoviev4
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.186.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_kamenev_is_bukharinist }
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success

		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = { RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso }
		}
		add_ideas = { 
			RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_eco_rso 
			RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso 
		}
		create_country_leader = {

		}

			name = "Grigory Sokolnikov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Grigori_Sokolnikov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes	
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.186.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = { RUS_Sergey_M_Kirov_hog_rso }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_united_opposition_exist }
			add_ideas = { RUS_Grigoriy_Y_Zinoviev_for_tot }			
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_kamenev_is_bukharinist } }
			add_ideas = { RUS_Lev_Kamenev_for_rso }			
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = { RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = SOV_decided_to_go_down_with_nep }
			add_ideas = { RUS_Timofey_V_Sapronov_eco_rso }
		}
		else = {
			add_ideas = { RUS_Grigory_Sokolnikov_eco_rso }
		}
		add_ideas = { RUS_Georgiy_M_Malenkov_sec_rso }
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Sergey Kirov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Sergey_Kirov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype 
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_old_guard = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
}
