country_event = { #
	id = russoc.188
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.188"}
	title = russoc.188.t
	desc = {
		text = russoc.188.d
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead }
				has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo
				has_country_flag = SOV_kosygin_is_in_politburo
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.188.d2
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_kosygin_is_in_politburo }
		}
	}
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_bukharin_speech
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.188.a
		trigger = { has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KOSYGIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_ZHDANOV }
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success		
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin_hog_rso
			RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_Uglanov_sec_rso
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Martemyan Ryutin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = market_leninism_subtype 
			traits = { SOV_peasant_propagandist }
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.188.b
		trigger = { has_country_flag = SOV_kosygin_is_in_politburo }
		ai_chance = {
			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYUTIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYKOV }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_ZHDANOV }
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success	
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin_hog_rso
			RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso
			RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin_sec_rso
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kosygin"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kosygin.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.188.c
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYUTIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KOSYGIN }
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success			
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Aleksey_I_Rykov_hog_rso
			RUS_Aleksandr_Smirnov_for_rso
			RUS_Vasily_Shmidt_eco_rso
			RUS_Andrey_Zhdanov_sec_rso
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Rykov"
			desc = "POLITICS_ALEKSEY_RYKOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Rykov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype 
			traits = { SOV_partisan_of_nep }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Down_With_Nep }
			}
			set_country_leader_ideology = bukharinist_subtype
		}
		SOV_politburo_rykovites = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.188.e
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_kosygin_is_in_politburo }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_RYUTIN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KOSYGIN }
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = SOV_congress_elections_after_nep_success			
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			RUS_Nikolay_I_Bukharin_hog_rso
			RUS_Valerian_V_Osinskiy_for_rso
			RUS_Nikolay_D_Kondratiev_eco_rso
			RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin_sec_rso
		}
		if = {
			limit = { SOV_bukharin_in_power = no }			
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Nikolay Bukharin"
				desc = "POLITICS_NIKOLAI_BUKHARIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Nikolay_Bukharin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = bukharinist_subtype 
				traits = { RUS_ex_bolshevik  }
			}
		}
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.192
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.192"}
	title = russoc.192.t
	desc = russoc.192.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_shlyapnikov
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.192.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KUZNETSOV }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_politburo_dissolved		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksandr Shlyapnikov"
			desc = "POLITICS_ALEXANDER_SHLIAPNIKOV_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksandr_Shliapnikov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = syndicalist_subtype
			traits = { trade_union_boss }
		}
		SOV_turn_nsp_into_syndicalist = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Negotiate_With_New_Life }
			set_country_leader_ideology = centralized_syndicalism_subtype
			add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.193
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.192.b
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_KUZNETSOV }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = SOV_politburo_dissolved
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksandra Kollontai"
			desc = "POLITICS_ALEXANDRA_KOLLONTAI_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksandra_Kollontai.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = feminist_syndicalist_subtype 
		}
		SOV_turn_nsp_into_syndicalist = yes
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Negotiate_With_New_Life }
			add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.193
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.192.c
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 30
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = SOV_politburo_struggle option = SOV_PATH_NSP_SHLYAPNIKOV }
			}
		}
		trigger = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_kuznetsov_petrograd }
		set_country_flag = SOV_politburo_dissolved		
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Aleksey Kuznetsov"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Kuznetsov.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = syn_natsynd_subtype
		}
		SOV_turn_nsp_into_syndicalist = yes
		set_country_flag = natsynd_victorous
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Aleksey_Kuznetsov_hog_rso 
		add_to_variable = { SOV_bolshevik_party_congress_number = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = SOV_Negotiate_With_New_Life }
			add_socdem_to_coalition = yes
		}
		country_event = {
			id = russoc.193
			days = 4
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.193
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.193"}
	title = russoc.193.t
	desc = russoc.193.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.193.a	
		set_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Isaak Shteinberg"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Isaak_Steinberg.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = radsoc_anarcho_syndicalist_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = radical_socialist
			name = RUS_syndicalist_party
			long_name = RUS_syndicalist_party_long
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.193.b
		set_country_flag = RUS_nsp_is_psp
		if = {
			limit = { 
				SOV_kuznetsov_in_power = yes
				has_country_flag = SOV_ryutin_is_in_politburo
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Martemyan Ryutin"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Martemyan_Ryutin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = market_leninism_subtype 
				traits = { SOV_peasant_propagandist }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				NOT = { has_country_flag = Aleksey_Rykov_dead }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Aleksey Rykov"
				desc = "POLITICS_ALEKSEY_RYKOV_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Aleksey_Rykov.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype 
				traits = { SOV_partisan_of_nep }
			}
		}
		else = {			
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Lev Kamenev"
				desc = "POLITICS_LEV_KAMENEV_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/SOV/Lev_Kamenev.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = radsoc_communism_subtype
			}
		}		
	}
}

	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.194"}

	desc = russoc.194.d
		
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = {
			has_idea = RUS_Restored_Cheka 
			has_idea = RUS_Restored_Cheka_lar
		}
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_vchk

		name = russoc.194.a

		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
	}

		name = russoc.194.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = -25
		set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = -1 }
		SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes		
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = RUS_Restored_Cheka_lar }
			remove_ideas = RUS_Restored_Cheka_lar
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_Restored_Cheka
		}
	}
}

		RUS_increase_nsp_pop = yes

			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_exist
				NOT = { has_country_flag = SOV_politburo_workers_opposition_tomsky }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
			SOV_change_politburo_workers_opposition = yes
		}
		else = {
			set_temp_variable = { politburo_change = 3 }
			SOV_change_politburo_bukharin = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russoc.203
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.203" }
	title = russoc.203.t
	desc = russoc.203.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.203.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { ic_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.4 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.204
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.203.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 75			
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_authoritarian_government = yes
					has_government = social_conservative
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				has_government = market_liberal
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.15
				OR = {
					has_government = social_democrat
					has_government = social_liberal
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { ic_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio < 0.4 } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_owner_neighbor_of = FROM
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = FROM }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_faction_leader = no
				is_in_faction = yes
				faction_leader = { 
					OR = {
						is_embargoing = FROM
						has_country_flag = embargoed_@FROM
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			clear_embargo_FROM = yes
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				clear_embargo_FROM = yes
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.205
				days = 2
				random_days = 5
			}
		}
	}
}

		}

			target = FROM

			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement  
		}
	}

country_event = { #
	id = russoc.300
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.300"}
	title = russoc.300.t
	desc = russoc.300.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = russoc.300.a		
		add_ideas = RUS_Left_SR_Arrogance
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = rus_minor_strike
			days = 90
		}
		set_politics = { ruling_party = syndicalist elections_allowed = no }		
		RUS_decrease_nsp_pop_large = yes
		RUS_decrease_rsdrp_pop_large = yes
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line
		hidden_effect = {
			set_variable = { SOV_nsp_votes = 0 } 
			set_variable = { SOV_rsdrp_votes = 0 } 
			add_to_variable = { SOV_plsr_votes = SOV_psr_votes }
			set_variable = { SOV_psr_votes = 0 }
			set_variable = { SOV_total_votes = SOV_plsr_votes } 
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.65
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}	
}

##########################
### PUPPET INTEGRATION ###

country_event = { #FROM requests our integration
	id = russoc.500
	title = russoc.500.t

	desc = {
		text = russoc.500.d.integration_level_1
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.500.d.integration_level_2
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.500.d.integration_final
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.500 option russoc.500.a"
		name = russoc.500.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				FROM = { ROOT = { set_temp_variable = { acceptance = mtth:SOV_integration_acceptance_chance } } }
				always = yes
				add = var:acceptance
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { activate_mission = SOV_subject_integration_timer }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.500 option russoc.500.b"
		name = russoc.500.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				FROM = { ROOT = { set_temp_variable = { refusal = mtth:SOV_integration_refusal_chance } } }
				always = yes
				add = var:refusal
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { remove_mission = SOV_subject_integration_timer }
		set_country_flag = @FROM_revolted_against_SOV
		create_wargoal = {
			target = FROM
			type = topple_government
		}
		SOV_break_puppet_effect = yes
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				create_wargoal = {
					target = ROOT
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = russoc.503 hours = 8 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Overlord increases integration
	id = russoc.501
	title = russoc.501.t

	desc = {
		text = russoc.501.d.integration_level_1
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.501.d.integration_level_2
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.501.d.integration_final
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		save_event_target_as = target
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.501 option russoc.501.a"
		name = russoc.501.a
		hidden_effect = { overlord = { country_event = russoc.502 } }
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
				overlord = {
					add_collaboration = { target = ROOT value = 0.05 }
					SOV_integrate_TARGET_effect = yes
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_equal }
				overlord = {
					add_collaboration = { target = ROOT value = 0.05 }
					set_autonomy = {
						target = event_target:target
						autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic
						end_wars = no
					}
				}
			}
			else = {
				overlord = {
					add_collaboration = { target = ROOT value = 0.05 }
					set_autonomy = {
						target = event_target:target
						autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_equal
						end_wars = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Increased Integration of FROM
	id = russoc.502
	title = russoc.502.t

	desc = {
		text = russoc.502.d.integration_level_1
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
			NOT = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.502.d.integration_level_2
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal }
	}
	desc = {
		text = russoc.502.d.integration_final
		trigger = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		FROM = { save_event_target_as = target }
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russoc.502 option russoc.502.a"
		name = russoc.502.a
		add_collaboration = { target = FROM value = 0.05 }
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { has_autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic } }
			SOV_integrate_TARGET_effect = yes
		}
		else = {
			FROM = { get_current_government_type = yes }
			if = {
				limit = { FROM = { has_autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal } }
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_soviet_republic
					end_wars = no
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = FROM
					autonomy_state = kr_soviet_republic_not_equal
					end_wars = no
				}
			}
			FROM = { restore_previous_government_type = yes }
		}
	}
}

			FROM = { SOV_break_puppet_effect = yes }

	}
}


country_event = { #Demand submission
	id = russoc.504
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russoc.504"}
	title = russoc.504.t
	desc = russoc.504.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russoc.504.a #Attack
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							tag = UZB
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
						AND = {
							tag = TRK
							has_country_leader = { name = "Nazir Toraqulov" ruling_only = yes }
						}
						AND = {
							tag = KHI
							has_government = social_democrat
							has_country_flag = KHI_hsp_created
						}
						AND = {
							tag = KYR
							has_socialist_government = yes
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = { SOV_puppet_ROOT_effect = yes }
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.505
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russoc.504.b #Attack
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		add_war_support = 0.1
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = russoc.506
				days = 4
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.102
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.102"}
	title = rusfor.102.t
	desc = rusfor.102.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.102.a
		set_autonomy = {
			target = FROM
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tag = DKB
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = authoritarian_democrat
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					tag = KUB
				}
			}
			FROM = {
				set_cosmetic_tag = KUB_RUS
				hidden_effect = {
					set_political_party = {
						ideology = social_conservative
						popularity = 60
					}
					set_politics = {
						ruling_party = social_conservative
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.117
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.117"}
	title = rusfor.117.t
	desc = rusfor.117.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.a
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		country_event = rusfor.119
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_caucasus }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 15
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia
			}
		}
		country_event = rusfor.127
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_eastern_europe }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 12
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_transamur
			}			
		}
		country_event = rusfor.132
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.e
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_transamur }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_caucasus
			}
		}
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.142 }
	}
	option = { #
		name = rusfor.117.f
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_caucasus
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_eastern_europe
			has_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_transamur
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10000
		}
		country_event = rusfor.147
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.148 }
	}	
}
country_event = { #Kerensky Germany
	id = rusfor.118
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.118"}
	title = rusfor.118.t
	desc = rusfor.118.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.118.a
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_war_support = 0.15
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		unlock_national_focus = RUS_Negotiations_Fail
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = GER
				}
				leave_faction = yes
			}
		}
		country_event = russia.55
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk }
		remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk_1
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_KER_blocks_transamur
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
		add_named_threat = { 
			threat = 7
			name = "Russia Repudiated Minsk Treaty!"
		}		
	}	
}

	desc = rusfor.123.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.123.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 70
		}
		add_war_support = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Join_The_Reichspakt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				GER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_central_asia
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.125
				hours = 2
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.117
			days = 1
		}
	}

			modifier = {
				factor = 0

			}
		}

			days = 2
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.126
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.138.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 60
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_eastern_white_ruthenia
		hidden_effect = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.135
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = rusfor.138.b

			base = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT

		}

			FROM = {

					id = rusfor.126

			base = 70
		}
		add_war_support = -0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Join_The_Reichspakt
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				}
				GER = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_eastern_ukraine_war
		set_country_flag = RUS_KER_discussed_eastern_europe
		country_event = {
			id = rusfor.117

country_event = { #Kerensky Germany
	id = rusfor.147
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.147"}
	title = rusfor.147.t
	desc = rusfor.147.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #
		name = rusfor.147.a
		
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Try_To_Change_Terms
		swap_ideas = {
			remove_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
			add_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_renegotiated
		}
		add_stability = 0.15
		add_war_support = 0.1
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = RUS_brestlitovsk
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = GER
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}	
}

		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = RUS
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = RUS
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
		}
	}		
}





### FOREIGN POLICY ###
country_event = { #alliance name
	id = rusfor.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1" }
	title = rusfor.1.t
	desc = rusfor.1.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.a
		trigger = { has_democratic_government = yes }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				OR = {
					ep_in_power = yes
					check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			set_faction_name = russian_cis
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = russian_cis
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					ep_in_power = yes
					check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				ep_in_power = yes
				check_variable = { Duma_Bill_Status^9 = 1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			set_faction_name = eurasian_bloc
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = eurasian_bloc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			set_faction_name = moscow_accord
		}
		else = {
			create_faction = moscow_accord
		}		
	}
}
	
	
country_event = { #Security of the Eastern border OTT
	id = rusfor.2
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.2" }
	title = rusfor.2.t
	desc = rusfor.2.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = TUR
		is_subject = no
		has_war = no
		RUS = { is_subject = no }
		OR = {
			231 = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						tag = RUS
						is_subject_of = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = rus_negotiations
		}	
		country_exists = EGY
		NOT = {
			is_in_faction_with = EGY
			has_subject = EGY
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.a #Send the Prince!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		add_political_power = -20
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.3
				days = 2
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.2.b #No deals with the Russians!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = 20
	}
}

		}
	}

		name = rusfor.3.b #Include armenia in deal

			factor = 55
		}
		trigger = {
			FROM = { has_subject = ARM }
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		TUR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.5
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.3.c #No
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia wants armenia
	id = rusfor.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.5" }
	title = rusfor.5.t
	desc = rusfor.5.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.a #abandon armenia
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
		}
		ARM = {
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_ideas = arm_ottoman_occupation
			hidden_effect = {
				set_politics = {
					ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
					elections_allowed = no
				}
				set_political_party = {
					ideology = authoritarian_democrat
					popularity = 0
				}
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ARM
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		add_political_power = -10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.6
				days = 1
				random = 48
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.5.b #we won't give up on armenia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
		}
		add_political_power = -20
	}
}

country_event = { #Great Patriotic War
	id = rusfor.47
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.47" }
	title = rusfor.47.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_FRA
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.democratic_GER
		trigger = {
			has_elected_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.47.d.authoritarian_GER
		trigger = {
			has_authoritarian_government = yes
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		OR = {
			has_war_with = FRA
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.a #We will march through Avenue des Champs-Elysées!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = FRA
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.47.b #We will march under Brandenburg Gate!
		trigger = {
			has_war_with = GER
		}
		add_stability = 0.2
		add_war_support = 0.25
		increase_conscription = yes
	}
}

country_event = { #A New 1812
	id = rusfor.51
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.51"}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.51.t.1812
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 252
				controls_state = 255
			}
		}
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.51.t.1328
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 205
				controls_state = 242
				controls_state = 246
			}
		}
	}
	desc = rusfor.51.d

	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		is_subject = no
		has_war = yes
		NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		controls_state = 219
		OR = {
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 252
				controls_state = 255
			}
			NOT = {
				controls_state = 205
				controls_state = 242
				controls_state = 246
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.51.a #There is nowhere to retreat, Moscow is behind us!
		add_political_power = -40
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = infantry_equipment
			amount = 5000
			producer = RUS
		}
		add_manpower = 30000
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_template = "Pekhotnaya Diviziya" }
				}
				##### Division Templates #####
				division_template = {
					name = "Pekhotnaya Diviziya"			# Rifle Division
					division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
					regiments = {
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						infantry = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
					support = {
						recon = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_template = "Diviziya Opolcheniya" }
				}
				division_template = {
					name = "Diviziya Opolcheniya"			# Militia Division
					division_names_group = RUS_MIL_01
					regiments = {
						militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 1 y = 2 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 0 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 1 }
						militia = { x = 2 y = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 219 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Diviziya Opolcheniya\" start_experience_factor = 0.0 start_equipment_factor = 0.8"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 4
				}
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Pekhotnaya Diviziya\" start_experience_factor = 0.0 start_equipment_factor = 0.8"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 11
				}
			}
		}
		219 = {
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 3391
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 6414
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 9348
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 3259
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 11282
				instant_build = yes
			}
			add_building_construction = {
				type = bunker
				level = 3
				province = 6380
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia offers us an alliance
	id = rusfor.52
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.52" }
	title = rusfor.52.t
	desc = rusfor.52.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_FORPOL option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_FORPOL option = LAT_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY 	}
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		GER = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { gives_military_access_to = ROOT }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { gives_military_access_to = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
			#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
			if = {
				limit = { is_faction_leader = yes }
				every_other_country = {
					limit = {
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
						is_subject = no
						NOT = {
							tag = ITA
						}
					}
					remove_from_tech_sharing_group = balkan_research
					#remove_ideas = SER_balkan_research_idea
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.54
						days = 3
						random_hours = 72
					}
				}
				dismantle_faction = yes
			}
			FROM = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_allied_@ROOT
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.53
					days = 3
					random_hours = 72
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			effect_tooltip = { FROM = { SOV_puppet_ROOT_effect = yes } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.b
		trigger = {
			FROM = {
				any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = LAT
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_FORPOL option = LAT_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = LAT_FORPOL option = LAT_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = EST
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_NEUTRALITY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_GERMANY }
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_UKRAINE }
					has_game_rule = { rule = EST_FORPOL option = EST_FORPOL_SCANDI }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = GRE
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = GRE_foreign_policy
					option = GRE_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ITA
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ITA_FORPOL
					option = ITA_FORPOL_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = POL_foreign_policy
					option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BUL
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = BUL_foreign_policy
					option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ROM
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ROM_foreign_policy
					option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ALB
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ALB_foreign_policy
					option = ALB_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.58 days = 1 } }
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			custom_effect_tooltip = if_FROM_agrees
			effect_tooltip = { FROM = { SOV_puppet_ROOT_effect = yes } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.52.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				OR = {
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = no }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = no }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_socialist_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_socialist_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_democratic_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_democratic_government = no }
					}
					AND = {
						ROOT = { has_authoritarian_government = yes }
						FROM = { has_authoritarian_government = no }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = GRE
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = GRE_foreign_policy
					option = GRE_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ITA
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ITA_FORPOL
					option = ITA_FORPOL_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = POL
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = POL_foreign_policy
					option = POL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = BUL
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = BUL_foreign_policy
					option = BUL_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ROM
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ROM_foreign_policy
					option = ROM_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ALB
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = ALB_foreign_policy
					option = ALB_FOREIGN_POLICY_RUSSIA
				}
			}
		}

					days = 3

				}
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Country responds
	id = rusfor.53
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.53" }

	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.53.t.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.accept
		trigger = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.53.d.refuse
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.a
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		}
		clr_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM
		
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored 
				FROM = { is_possible_autonomous_soviet_republic_tag = yes }
			}
			SOV_puppet_FROM_effect = yes
		}
		else = {
		add_to_faction = FROM
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = EST
						tag = LAT
						tag = LIT
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_will_liberate_baltic
		}
	}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.53.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_allied_@FROM }
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = EST
						tag = LAT
						tag = LIT
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = RUS_will_annex_baltic
		}
	}
}

		trigger = {
			FROM = { tag = ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.55.d.other
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				FROM = { tag = ROM }
			}
		}
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	option = {
		name = rusfor.55.a

			factor = 100

				factor = 0
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				FROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
				FROM = { owns_state = 1222 } #Bessarabia
			}
		}
		add_to_faction = FROM
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					FROM = { tag = ROM }
				}
				GER = {
					embargo_FROM = yes
					FROM = { embargo_PREV = yes }
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.55.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				FROM = {
					any_owned_state = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {

				id = rusfor.56

			}

	}

country_event = { #Country wants their claims back
	id = rusfor.58
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.58 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.58.t
	desc = rusfor.58.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_faction_leader = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				has_socialist_government = no
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
				SOV_puppet_FROM_effect = yes
			}
			else = {
			add_to_faction = FROM
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = ROOT }
					remove_claim_by = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.59 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.58.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 40
				RUS_savinkov_in_power = yes
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_alliance_refused_@FROM
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.60 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia accepts
	id = rusfor.59
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.59 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.59.t
	desc = rusfor.59.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy1

	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		NOT = { has_war_with = FROM }
		FROM = { is_faction_leader = yes }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.59.a
		FROM = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
				SOV_puppet_ROOT_effect = yes
			}
			else = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes }
				if = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
					remove_claim_by = FROM
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = FROM }
				remove_claim_by = FROM
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia offers alliance
	id = rusfor.70
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.70 FROM = [From.GetName]" }
	title = rusfor.70.t
	desc = rusfor.70.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_FIN_parliament_house

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.70.a #Agree
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				FIN = { 
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = FIN_mannerheim_victory
				}
				RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
				add = 100
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		effect_tooltip = { RUS = { add_to_faction = FIN } }
		FROM = { country_event = { id = rusfor.53 hours = 8 } }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.70.b #No
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				FIN = { has_left_democratic_government = yes }
				RUS = { has_elected_government = yes }
				add = -100
			}
			modifier = {
				FIN = { 
					has_government = authoritarian_democrat
					has_country_flag = FIN_mannerheim_victory
				}
				RUS = { RUS_russian_monarch = yes }
				add = -100
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.71 hours = 8 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Turkestan Integration
	id = rusfor.499
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.499"}
	title = rusfor.499.t
	desc = rusfor.499.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.499.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
			add_command_power = 15
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
			add_command_power = 15
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_alash = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_steppe_generalgov }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.499.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored 
				has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved
			}
		}
		406 = { add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_URL_modifier } }
		URL = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 68668 }
				set_nationality = RUS 
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 68664 }
				set_nationality = RUS 
			}
		}
		1208 = { add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_ORE_modifier } }
		ORE = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 68667 }
				set_nationality = RUS 
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 68662 }
				set_nationality = RUS 
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 30
			add_compliance = -15
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = 571 decision = RUS_restore_the_siberian_cossack_host }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.499.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_conservative_government = yes
					RUS_is_absolute_monarchy = yes
					AND = { 
						has_government = national_populist
						RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_alash = yes }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_alash_autonomy }
			if = {
				limit = { has_resistance = yes }
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 10
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.499.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		trigger = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_alash = yes }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_alash_autonomy }
			if = {
				limit = { has_resistance = yes }
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Turkestan Integration
	id = rusfor.500
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.500"}
	title = rusfor.500.t
	desc = rusfor.500.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.500.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.05 }
			add_command_power = 15
		}
		else = {
			add_popularity = { ideology = paternal_autocrat popularity = 0.05 }
			add_command_power = 15
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_turkestan_generalgov }
			add_resistance = 25
			add_compliance = -10
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.502 days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.514 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.500.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored 
				has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = SMR_cossack_dissolved }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = 589 decision = RUS_restore_the_semirechye_cossack_host }
		}
		else = {
			589 = { add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_cossack_host_SMR_modifier } }
			SMR = {
				every_unit_leader = {
					set_nationality = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 30
			add_compliance = -15
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.502 days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.514 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.500.c
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_conservative_government = yes
					RUS_is_absolute_monarchy = yes
					AND = { 
						has_government = national_populist
						RUS_savinkov_in_power = no
					}
				}
			}
		}
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_turkestan = yes }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_turkestan_autonomy }
			if = {
				limit = { has_resistance = yes }
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 10
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.501 days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.514 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.500.e
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		trigger = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { is_turkestan = yes }
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = RUS_turkestan_autonomy }
			if = {
				limit = { has_resistance = yes }
				add_resistance = -10
				add_compliance = 10
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = UZB decision = RUS_sovietization_of_turkestan }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = KHI decision = RUS_sovietization_of_turkestan }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = TRK decision = RUS_sovietization_of_turkestan }
		hidden_effect = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.501 days = 60 }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.514 days = 20 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Turkestan Integration
	id = rusfor.501
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.501"}
	title = rusfor.501.t
	desc = rusfor.501.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_socialist_government = yes
			has_left_democratic_government = yes
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.501.a
		add_stability = 0.05
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 15
			add_compliance = -10
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.501.b
		set_global_flag = RUS_started_delimitation_of_central_asia
		unlock_decision_category_tooltip = RUS_delimitation_of_central_asia
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 20
			add_compliance = -15
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_create_uzbekistan }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_create_tajik_republic }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_create_kyrgyzia_autonomy }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_create_kyrgyzia }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_create_turkmen_autonomy }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_give_shimkent_to_kazakhs }
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_give_tashkent_to_kazakhs }
		hidden_effect = {
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROOT decision = RUS_finish_delimitation }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.501.c
		trigger = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				is_turkestan = yes 
				has_resistance = yes
			}
			add_resistance = 10
			add_compliance = -5
		}		
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany's Reaction on Russian plans in Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1000" }
	title = rusfor.1000.t
	desc = rusfor.1000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus } 
	}
		

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.a #Threaten Russia and invite the endangered nations into the Völkerbund!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					NOT = { 
						AND = {
							has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
							has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_NOT_CARE }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					UKR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
					GEO = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
					TUR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				DKB = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						don_is_pro_russian = yes
						is_ally_with = RUS
					}
					don_is_pro_german = no
				}
				KUB = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						KUB_has_bolsheviks = yes
						is_ally_with = RUS
					}
					kuban_is_pro_german = no
				}
				GEO = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						has_socialist_government = yes
						has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty
						is_ally_with = RUS
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -30
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1005
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1000.b #We don't care about the Caucasus.
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				AND = {
					UKR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
					GEO = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
					TUR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
				}
				NOT = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis 
						option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			clear_relations_with_PREV = yes
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1004 days = 2 random = 48 }
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Germany invites DKB/GEO/AZE to the Reichspakt
	id = rusfor.1001
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1001" }
	title = rusfor.1001.t
	desc = rusfor.1001.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.a #Accept
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = no }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						tag = DKB 
						tag = KUB 
						tag = MTR 
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_invited_KLY }
						KLY = {
							exists = yes
							is_subject = no
							is_in_faction = no
							has_socialist_government = no
							NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
							NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
							OR = {
								has_war = no
								AND = {
									has_war = yes
									NOT = {
										any_enemy_country = {
											NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = GER_invited_KLY
					KLY = { country_event = rusfor.1001 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						tag = KUB 
						tag = GEO 
						tag = AZE 
					}
				}				
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_invited_MTR }
						country_exists = MTR
						MTR = {
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = no
							is_ally_of_ROOT = no
							NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
							OR = {
								has_war = no
								AND = {
									has_war = yes
									NOT = {
										any_enemy_country = {
											NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = GER_invited_MTR
					MTR = { country_event = rusfor.1001 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_invited_DAG }
						country_exists = DAG
						DAG = {
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = no
							is_ally_of_ROOT = no
							NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
							OR = {
								has_war = no
								AND = {
									has_war = yes
									NOT = {
										any_enemy_country = {
											NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = GER_invited_DAG
					DAG = { country_event = rusfor.1001 }
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						tag = KUB 
						tag = GEO
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_invited_ABK }
						ABK = {
							is_subject = no
							has_socialist_government = no
							is_ally_of_ROOT = no
							NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
							OR = {
								has_war = no
								AND = {
									has_war = yes
									NOT = {
										any_enemy_country = {
											NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = GER_invited_ABK
					ABK = { country_event = rusfor.1001 }
				}	
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						tag = MTR 
						tag = GEO
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_invited_AZE }
						AZE = {
							is_subject = no
							is_ally_of_ROOT = no
							NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
							OR = {
								has_war = no
								AND = {
									has_war = yes
									NOT = {
										any_enemy_country = {
											NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_global_flag = GER_invited_AZE
					AZE = { country_event = rusfor.1001 }
				}	
			}
			FROM = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1002
					days = 1
					random = 24
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1001.b #Refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #FROM accepts
	id = rusfor.1002
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1002" }
	title = rusfor.1002.t
	desc = rusfor.1002.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1002.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = guarantee
				active = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
			}
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany's Reaction on Russian plans in Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1003
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1003" }
	title = rusfor.1003.t
	desc = rusfor.1003.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_towar
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus } }		

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1003.a		
		if = {
			limit = {  
				country_exists = DKB
				DKB = { 
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					don_is_pro_german = yes
					don_is_pro_russian = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DKB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {  
				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR }
				}
				country_exists = KLY
				KLY = {
					is_subject = no
					is_in_faction = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					NOT = { has_government = social_democrat }
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			KLY = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_KLY
		}
		if = {
			limit = {  
				country_exists = KUB
				KUB = {
					is_subject = no
					KUB_has_bolsheviks = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					kuban_is_pro_german = yes
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			KUB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR }
				}
				country_exists = MTR
				MTR = {
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			MTR = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_MTR
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = DAG
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = DAG }
				}
				country_exists = DAG
				DAG = {
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DAG = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_DAG
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = GEO
				GEO = {
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			GEO = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = AZE
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = AZE }
				}
				AZE = {
					is_subject = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			AZE = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_AZE
		}		
	}
}
country_event = { #Germany withdraws
	id = rusfor.1004
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1004" }
	title = rusfor.1004.t
	desc = rusfor.1004.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1004.a
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = KR_hates_govt }
		if = {
			limit = { tag = GEO }
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 172649 }
				set_nationality = GER
			}
			set_country_flag = GEO_end_treaty
			clr_country_flag = GEO_keep_treaty
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = GEO_kept_pipeline
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = GEO_kept_pipeline
					uncomplete_children = no
					refund_political_power = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_completed_focus = GEO_bailouts
					}
					uncomplete_national_focus = {
						focus = GEO_bailouts
						uncomplete_children = yes
						refund_political_power = yes
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_completed_focus = GEO_german_recovery_model
					}
					uncomplete_national_focus = {
						focus = GEO_german_recovery_model
						uncomplete_children = yes
						refund_political_power = yes
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = GEO_treaty_of_poti_idea2
					}
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = GEO_treaty_of_poti_idea2
						add_idea = GEO_treaty_of_poti_idea
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_idea = GEO_black_monday_2
					}
					swap_ideas = {
						remove_idea = GEO_black_monday_2
						add_idea = GEO_black_monday_hits
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = GEO_join_reichspakt_decision }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = KUB }
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = KUB_Request_German_Help
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = KUB_Request_German_Help
					uncomplete_children = no
					refund_political_power = yes
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
					add_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_ask_for_investments }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_infantry }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_support }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_artillery }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_fighters }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_bombers }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_tank }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_motorized }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_Ask_A_Bailout }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { tag = DKB }
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 6884 }
				set_nationality = GER
			}
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 6885 }
				set_nationality = GER
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = DKB_progerman_politic
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = DKB_progerman_politic
					uncomplete_children = no
					refund_political_power = yes
				}
				complete_national_focus = DKB_progerman_politic
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_completed_focus = DKB_The_Enemy_of_my_Enemy
				}
				uncomplete_national_focus = {
					focus = DKB_The_Enemy_of_my_Enemy
					uncomplete_children = no
					refund_political_power = yes
				}
				complete_national_focus = DKB_Expel_the_German_Admin
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
				}
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
					add_idea = DON_GER_mil_mis
				}
			}
			218 = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = DKB_Rostow_Militarbezirk} }
					remove_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = DKB_Rostow_Militarbezirk }
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {				
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_ask_for_investments }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_infantry }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_support }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_artillery }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_fighters }
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = KUB_buy_bombers }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans threaten Russia
	id = rusfor.1005
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1005" }
	title = rusfor.1005.t
	desc = rusfor.1005.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1005.a #Who cares?
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk 
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT }
			}
		}
		country_event = russia.55
		add_named_threat = { 
			threat = 7
			name = "Russia Repudiated Minsk Treaty!"
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1006
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1005.a2 #Who cares?
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk 
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1006
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1005.b #focus on central asia instead
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				408 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
				810 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
				861 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
				405 = { is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
				NOT = {				
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_REICHSPAKT }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO }
					has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_NOT_CARE }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1003
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia ignored demands
	id = rusfor.1006
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1006" }
	title = rusfor.1006.t
	desc = rusfor.1006.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.a #Cease all contacts between the Völkerbund and Russia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_NOT_CARE }
			}
		}		
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				GER = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_subject_of = GER }
				GER = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = PREV
						autonomy_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1004 days = 2 random = 48 }
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1007
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.b #
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}		
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = {

			}
		}

							NOT = {

									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DKB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {

						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			KLY = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_KLY

					kuban_is_pro_german = yes

							NOT = {

									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			KUB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}

				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = MTR }
				}

					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }

							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

								}

				}
			}
			GEO = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
		}

			limit = { 
				OR = { #for landlocked countries
					is_owner_neighbor_of = AZE
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = AZE }
				}
				AZE = {
					is_subject = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
					OR = {
						has_war = no
						AND = {
							has_war = yes
							NOT = {
								any_enemy_country = {
									NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			AZE = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1001 days = 2 random = 48 }
			}
			set_global_flag = GER_invited_AZE
		}	
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1006.c #Back down, we cannot afford a conflict with Russia.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = RUS_caucasus_crisis option = RUS_CAUCASUS_CRISIS_EMBARGO }
			}
		}
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		add_political_power = -100		
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				GER = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_subject_of = GER }
				GER = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = PREV
						autonomy_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1004 days = 2 random = 48 }
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1008
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1008" }

	desc = rusfor.1008.d
