	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.a
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.b
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1008.c
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = GER
				is_in_faction_with = FRA
				is_in_faction_with = GER
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #What to do with DKB
	id = rusfor.1009
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1009" }
	title = rusfor.1009.t
	desc = rusfor.1009.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_don
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1009.a #
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = {
					is_subject = yes
					NOT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
				}
			}
			var:DKB.overlord = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1010 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				DKB = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
			}
			GER = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1010 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
		else = {
			DKB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1010 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1009.b #Start sending agitators
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
			}
			DKB = {
				is_subject = no
				OR = {
					has_country_leader = { name = "Afrikan Bogaewsky" ruling_only = yes }
					has_country_leader = { name = "Pyotr Krasnov" ruling_only = yes }
					has_country_leader = { name = "Adrian Guselschikov" ruling_only = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}
		DKB = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1013 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian demands DKB
	id = rusfor.1010
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1010" }
	title = rusfor.1010.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1010.d.DKB
		trigger = { original_tag = DKB }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1010.d.DKB_overlord
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = DKB } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1010.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				NOT = { tag = DKB }
				DKB = { 
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = DKB
				OR = {
					don_is_pro_german = yes
					DKB_vlasov_in_power = yes
					has_socialist_government = yes
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved }
				}
				NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_guaranteed = DKB }
			DKB = { 
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1015 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1012 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1010.b #Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1011 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

		trigger = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = DKB } } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Then it is war
		name = rusfor.1011.a

			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				DKB = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = { #Back down
		name = rusfor.1011.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				DKB = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = DKB decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = DKB
				value = -1000
			}
			DKB = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = { 
				country_event = rusfor.1012 
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { original_tag = DKB }
				FROM = { country_event = rusfor.10150 }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { original_tag = KUB }
				FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1284 }
			}
			else = {
				FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1289 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1015.b #resist
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 95 
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		set_temp_variable = { target = FROM }
		clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = ROOT.guarantor_array
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = guarantee
				active = no
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1016 random_hours = 24 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian demands GEO
	id = rusfor.10251
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.10251" }
	title = rusfor.10251.t
	desc = rusfor.10251.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10251.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.04
		FROM = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ROOT
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			GEO = { drop_cosmetic_tag = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.10251.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_stability = 0.08
		FROM = {
			add_to_faction = ROOT
		}
	}
		
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1026.b #Never
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1028
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1026
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1026" }
	title = rusfor.1026.t
	desc = rusfor.1026.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1026.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.08
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1027
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1026.b #Never
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 80
		}
		add_stability = 0.04
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1028
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1028" }

	desc = rusfor.1028.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian coup GEO
	id = rusfor.1029
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1029" }
	title = rusfor.1029.t
	desc = rusfor.1029.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1029.a #The rebels take over the capital!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1030
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1029.b #rebels defeated
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		add_stability = -0.2
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1031
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian coup failed
	id = rusfor.1031
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1031" }
	title = rusfor.1031.t
	desc = rusfor.1031.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1031.a #war
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1031.b #not yet
		trigger = {
			is_ai = no
			FROM = { is_in_faction = yes }
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
	}
}

country_event = { #Status of armenia
	id = rusfor.1038
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1038" }
	title = rusfor.1038.t
	desc = rusfor.1038.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_armenia
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1038.a #Demand their incorporation!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				tag = SOV
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
		}
		ARM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1039
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1038.b #establish control over their government
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		ARM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1045
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1038.e #covert operations
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		ARM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1042
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #GER Russia demands concessions in the Caucasus
	id = rusfor.1048
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1048" }
	title = rusfor.1048.t
	desc = rusfor.1048.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				UKR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1050 days = 3 random = 72 }
		}
		add_political_power = -100		
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					OR = {
						region = 134 #Caucasus
						region = 135 #Kuban
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				GER = {
					diplomatic_relation = {
						country = PREV
						relation = guarantee
						active = no
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_subject_of = GER }
				GER = {
					set_autonomy = {
						target = PREV
						autonomy_state = autonomy_free
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
				leave_faction = yes
			}
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1004 days = 2 random = 48 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1048.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1049
				days = 8
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans refused our demands
	id = rusfor.1049
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1049" }
	title = rusfor.1049.t
	desc = rusfor.1049.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.a #Declare war upon the Völkerbund!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				date < 1939.6.1
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		news_event = worldnews.472
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_other_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = DKB
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZE
					}
					is_in_faction_with = GER
					ROOT = {
						can_declare_war_on = PREV
						is_neighbor_of = PREV
					}
					if = {
						limit = { tag = UKR }
						NOT = { has_global_flag = UKR_secret_collusion_with_russia }
					}
				}
				ROOT = {
					declare_war_on = {
						target = PREV
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
		}
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = FROM.faction_members
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = DKB
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZE
						tag = KUB
						tag = KLY
						tag = MTR
					}
					ROOT = {
						can_declare_war_on = PREV
						is_neighbor_of = PREV
					}
				}
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = ROOT
					value = -1000
				}
				ROOT = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_prepare_for_war_@PREV
					add_ai_strategy = {
						type = prepare_for_war
						id = PREV
						value = -1000
					}
					declare_war_on = {
						target = PREV
						type = annex_everything
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1049.b #Ignore german guarantees
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0			
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				date < 1939.6.1
			}
		}
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = yes
		for_each_scope_loop = {
			array = FROM.faction_members
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_in_europe = yes
						tag = DKB
						tag = GEO
						tag = AZE
						tag = KUB
						tag = KLY
						tag = MTR
					}
					ROOT = {
						can_declare_war_on = PREV
						is_neighbor_of = PREV
					}
				}
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = ROOT
					value = -1000
				}
				ROOT = {
					clr_country_flag = RUS_prepare_for_war_@PREV
					add_ai_strategy = {
						type = prepare_for_war
						id = PREV
						value = -1000
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Signing
	id = rusfor.1050
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1050" }
	title = rusfor.1050.t
	desc = rusfor.1050.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1050.a
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = yes
		clr_country_flag = RUS_GER_blocks_caucasus
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1065
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1065" }
	title = rusfor.1065.t
	desc = rusfor.1065.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.a #Alliance
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.b #Northern Iran and alliance
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.c #Puppet
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1065.e #Northern Iran and puppet
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER
		set_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER
		PER = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1066
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #Russia demands northern iran
	id = rusfor.1066
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1066" }
	title = rusfor.1066.t
	desc = rusfor.1066.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 30
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -25
				FROM = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				has_war = yes
				surrender_progress > 0.1
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							region = 134 #Transcaucasia
							region = 243
							state = 418
							state = 804
							state = 420
							is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER }
				FROM = { add_to_faction = ROOT }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }					
				FROM = { puppet = ROOT }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1067
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1066.b #Never!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 70
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.2
				any_owned_state = { 
					OR = {
						region = 243
						region = 134
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes  }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 10
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1068
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1067
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1067" }
	title = rusfor.1067.t
	desc = rusfor.1067.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1067.a #Hurray!
		add_political_power = 30
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_territory_PER }
			FROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							region = 134 #Transcaucasia
							region = 243
							state = 418
							state = 804
							state = 420
							is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_alliance_PER }
			add_to_faction = FROM
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_demands_puppet_PER }
			puppet = FROM
		}
	}
}

	title = rusfor.1071.t
	desc = rusfor.1071.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_allied_country = {
					is_actual_major = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_guaranteed_by = GER
					is_guaranteed_by = ENT
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		FROM = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				transfer_state = 1000
				transfer_state = 1001
				transfer_state = 1213
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1072
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1071.b #Never! stand up!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1073
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #OTT/TUR accepts
	id = rusfor.1072
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1072" }
	title = rusfor.1072.t
	desc = rusfor.1072.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.a #Hurray!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_subject = ARM
					has_subject = GEO
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
		transfer_state = 1213
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1072.b #Give the land to our puppets!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_subject = ARM
				has_subject = GEO
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = ARM
			}
			ARM = { transfer_state = 1000 }
			remove_state_claim = 1000
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1000
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_subject = GEO
			}
			GEO = { transfer_state = 1001 }
			remove_state_claim = 1001
		}
		else = {
			transfer_state = 1001
		}
	}
}

					NOT = { tag = TRM }
				}

					id = russianews.7
					days = 1
				}

country_event = { #Russian Troops arrive in Vladivostok!
	id = rusfor.1084
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1084" }
	title = rusfor.1084.t
	desc = rusfor.1084.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1084.a #We shall defend Transamur!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 35
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 1 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_political_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 2 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_political_power = -30
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 3 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_political_power = -60
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1084.b #Abandon Transamur to its fate.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 65
		}
		transfer_state = 408
		hidden_effect = {
			TRM = {
				TRM_remove_japanese_influence = yes
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10877
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia is seizing transamur
	id = rusfor.10877
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.10877" }
	title = rusfor.10877.t
	desc = rusfor.10877.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10877.a #:(
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusfor.1087
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.10877.b #resist
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 85
		}
		add_stability = -0.2
		declare_war_on = {
			target = RUS
			type = annex_everything
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 1 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_political_power = -15
				}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 2 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_political_power = -30
				}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 3 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_political_power = -60
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Transamur is Russian!
	id = rusfor.1087
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1087" }
	title = rusfor.1087.t
	desc = rusfor.1087.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1087.a #Put their leaders on trial and incorporate Transamur!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = SIB }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = SIB
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		else = {
			annex_country = {
				target = TRM
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1087.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				FROM = { tag = SIB }
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = SIB
				autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = TRM
				autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
			}
			TRM = { drop_cosmetic_tag = yes }
		}		
	}
}

	desc = rusfor.1088.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1088.a #Call their bluff, send in the troops!
		JAP = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1084
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}

country_event = { #The Russians ask for Transamur
	id = rusfor.1092
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1092" }
	title = rusfor.1092.t
	desc = rusfor.1092.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1092.a #RUSKIE FACTORIES FOR THE CO PROSPERITY GRINDSET
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.35
				RUS = {
					any_enemy_country = {
						OR = {
							is_actual_major = yes
							is_chinese_tag = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
					}
					surrender_progress > 0
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.6
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.8 }
			}
		}
		RUS = { set_country_flag = RUS_allies_JAP_flag }
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1093
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1092.b #Refuse, Transamur is ours!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					is_ai = no 
					same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_eurasia = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					surrender_progress > 0.2
					NOT = {
						controls_state = 525
						controls_state = 527
						controls_state = 536
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_JAPAN
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		TRM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.10877
				days = 7
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #The Russians ask for Transamur, TRM perspective
	id = rusfor.1093
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1093" }
	title = rusfor.1093.t
	desc = rusfor.1093.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1093.a #waaah
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = rusfor.1094
			effect_tooltip = {
				annex_country = {
					target = TRM
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #Pained dolfuss
		name = rusfor.1093.b
		trigger = { is_subject = no }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		add_political_power = 100
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1095 }
		declare_war_on = {
			target = RUS
			type = annex_everything
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 1 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.05
			add_political_power = -15
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 2 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.1
			add_political_power = -30
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { RUS_Speech_About_Peaceful_Unification_amount_var = 3 }
			}
			add_stability = -0.15
			add_political_power = -60
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #We get TRM without a fight
	id = rusfor.1094
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1094" }
	title = rusfor.1094.t
	desc = rusfor.1094.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1094.a #yay, annex
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_negotiated_entry_eco_cps
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = JAP
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		JAP = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		annex_country = {
			target = TRM
			transfer_troops = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1094.b #yay, puppet
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_negotiated_entry_eco_cps
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = JAP
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = no
		}
		JAP = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = TRM
			autonomy_state = kr_occupied_puppet
		}
		TRM = { drop_cosmetic_tag = yes }
	}
}

	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1094" }

			active = no
		}
		JAP = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_negotiated_entry_eco_cp
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties

			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }

country_event = { #The Russians ask to join
	id = rusfor.1096
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1096" }
	title = rusfor.1096.t
	desc = rusfor.1096.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1096.a #Why not
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 98
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.3
				RUS = {
					any_enemy_country = {
						OR = {
							is_actual_major = yes
							is_chinese_tag = yes
						}
						NOT = { has_war_with = JAP }
					}
					surrender_progress > 0
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.5 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.4
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.8 }
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_allies_JAP_flag
			country_event = rusfor.1097
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = RUS
						is_core_of = TRM
					}
					NOT = { is_core_of = JAP }
				}
				transfer_state_to = RUS
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1096.b #Refuse, filthy slavs
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 2
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_chinese_tag = yes
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = {
					is_ai = no 
					same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS_is_eurasia = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					surrender_progress > 0.2
					NOT = {
						controls_state = 525
						controls_state = 527
						controls_state = 536
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				strength_ratio = {
					tag = FROM
					ratio < 1
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = {
					rule = RUS_foreign_policy
					option = RUS_FOREIGN_POLICY_JAPAN
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1098 }
	}
}

country_event = { #We get into CPS
	id = rusfor.1097
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1094" }
	title = rusfor.1097.t
	desc = rusfor.1097.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1097.a #yay
		JAP = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = RUS
							is_core_of = TRM
						}
						NOT = { is_core_of = JAP }
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		add_timed_idea = {
			idea = RUS_co_prosperity_treaty
			days = 600
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_ideas = RUS_co_prosperity_penalties
			add_to_array = { global.asian_economic_sphere = ROOT }
			JAP_recalculate_economic_integration = yes
			add_dynamic_modifier = { modifier = JAP_asian_economic_sphere_member }
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = RUS
				is_subject = no
			}
			RUS = { remove_from_faction = PREV }
			JAP = { add_to_faction = PREV }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #We don't get into CPS
	id = rusfor.1098
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1094" }
	title = rusfor.1098.t
	desc = rusfor.1098.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1098.a #boo
		add_war_support = 0.15
		complete_national_focus = RUS_Assert_Our_Influence_Far_East
	}
}

### Pressure Finland ###
country_event = { #Demands to Finland
	id = rusfor.1110
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1110" }
	title = rusfor.1110.t
	desc = rusfor.1110.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_MON_mongols
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		MON = {
			owns_state = 329
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1110.a #Territorial concessions
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = { is_ally_with = JAP }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_dem_fp option = MON_CONQUER_NOTHING }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_ISOLATION }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva
		hidden_effect = {
			MON = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1111 days = 4 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1110.b #Pro-Russian neutrality
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = MON_dem_fp option = MON_CONQUER_NOTHING } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_ISOLATION } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_KHAN_WARPATH } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_PAN_MONGOL } }
				has_left_democratic_government = no
				NOT = { MON = { is_ally_with = JAP } }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON
		hidden_effect = {
			MON = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1111 days = 4 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1110.c #Join alliance
		trigger = {
			MON = { 
				is_in_faction = no 
				at_peace_or_same_enemies_as_ROOT = yes
				NOT = { 
					has_government = national_populist								
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Genghis Khan II"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}				
			}
			has_global_flag = northwest_conflict_ended
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = MON_anfu_in_power_flag 
						has_country_flag = MON_buddhists_in_power_flag
					}
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance
		hidden_effect = {
			MON = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1111 days = 4 } }
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Russia's Demands #for MON
	id = rusfor.1111
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1111" }
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.1111.t
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON } }
		text = rusfor.1111.t2
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance } }
		text = rusfor.1111.t3
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.1111.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON } }
		text = rusfor.1111.d2
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance } }
		text = rusfor.1111.d3
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_MON_mongols
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1111.a #If they want a fight, they'll get it!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_dem_fp option = MON_CONQUER_NOTHING }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_ISOLATION }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON }
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_PAN_MONGOL }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_QING }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_JAPAN }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_ANFU_EMPIRE }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance }
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_PAN_MONGOL }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_SOYOMBO_TRM }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_SOYOMBO }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = MON_russia_friendship
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1121 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1111.b #Appeal to Transamur
		trigger = {
			RUS = { NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance } }
			TRM = {
				OR = {
					is_owner_neighbor_of = ROOT
					any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = ROOT }
				}
				is_subject = no
				is_in_faction = no
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = MON
					has_war_with = RUS
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 				
					TRM = { TRM_nra_in_power = yes }
				}
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
			else = {
				TRM = { TRM_nra_in_power = no }
				has_socialist_government = no
			}
			NOT = {
				has_government = national_populist
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Genghis Khan II"
					ruling_only = yes
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON }
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_dem_fp option = MON_CONQUER_NOTHING }
					has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_ISOLATION }
				}
			}
		}
		TRM = { country_event = rusfor.1115 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1111.c #Accept the demands
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_SOYOMBO_TRM } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_government = national_populist
					has_country_leader = {
						name = "Genghis Khan II"
						ruling_only = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_alliance } }
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1113 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1112 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 329
							state = 811
							state = 1293
							state = 654
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1114 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Friendship treaty with Russia
	id = rusfor.1112
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1112" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_MON_mongols
	title = rusfor.1112.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1112.d.mongolia
		trigger = { tag = MON }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1112.d.russia
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1112.a #Could have been worse
		trigger = { tag = MON }
		set_country_flag = MON_can_be_invited_to_alliance
		separate_peace_all_wars = yes
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 329
						state = 811
						state = 1293
						state = 654
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = RUS
			}
			RUS = { give_guarantee = MON }
			give_military_access = ROOT			
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_rus_help }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_rus_help
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_rus_help_less }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_rus_help_less
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_russian_eco_aid }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_russian_eco_aid
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = MON_rus_help_more
			}
			set_rule = {
				desc = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON
				can_join_factions = no
				can_not_declare_war = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1112.b #Welcome back
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = yes
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_owned_by = MON
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					state = 811
					state = 1293			
					state = 654			
					state = 329			
				}
				NOT = { state = 330 }
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			ROOT = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes }
		}
		give_guarantee = MON
		MON = {
			give_military_access = ROOT
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_rus_help }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_rus_help
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_rus_help_less }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_rus_help_less
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { has_idea = MON_russian_eco_aid }
				swap_ideas = {
					remove_idea = MON_russian_eco_aid
					add_idea = MON_rus_help_more
				}
			}
			else = {
				add_ideas = MON_rus_help_more
			}
			set_rule = {
				desc = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON
				can_join_factions = no
				can_not_declare_war = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { MON = { country_event = rusfor.1112 } }
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1113
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1113" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_MON_mongols
	title = rusfor.1113.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1113.d.mongolia
		trigger = { tag = MON }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1113.d.russia
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1113.a #Could have been worse
		trigger = { tag = MON }
		clear_all_relations_except_wars = yes		
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					is_owned_by = MON
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						state = 811
						state = 1293			
						state = 654			
						state = 329			
					}
					NOT = { state = 330 }
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			RUS = { add_to_faction = ROOT }	
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1113.b #Welcome back
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = yes
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_owned_by = MON
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					state = 811
					state = 1293			
					state = 654			
					state = 329			
				}
				NOT = { state = 330 }
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			ROOT = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes }
		}
		add_to_faction = MON
		hidden_effect = { MON = { country_event = rusfor.1113 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Mongolia appeals for Transamur help
	id = rusfor.1115
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1115" }
	title = rusfor.1115.t
	desc = rusfor.1115.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_MON_mongols

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1115.a #Make the offer
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_SOYOMBO }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = {
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = MON_anfu_in_power_flag 
						has_country_flag = MON_buddhists_in_power_flag
					}
					has_government = paternal_autocrat
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = MON_transamur_allies
		set_temp_variable = { change_morale = 0.10 }
		RUS_change_siberian_war_morale = yes
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1117 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1115.b #No, they are on their own
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = MON_path option = MON_UNGERN_DIES_SOYOMBO_TRM }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = MON_transamur_refused_mongolia
		set_temp_variable = { change_morale = -0.05 }
		RUS_change_siberian_war_morale = yes
		MON = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1116 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1116

	desc = rusfor.1116.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		owns_state = 329
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1116.a #Refuse the Russians anyway
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = MON_russia_friendship
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.10
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1121 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1116.b #Give in and hand over Tuva
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1112 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 329
							state = 811
							state = 1293
							state = 654
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1114 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Transamur intervenes
	id = rusfor.1117
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1117" }
	title = rusfor.1117.t
	desc = rusfor.1117.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		MON = {
			owns_state = 329
			NOT = { has_war_with = ROOT }
		}
		TRM = {
			exists = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = {
				has_war_with = MON 
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1117.a #We'll accept this compromise
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp = global.siberian_war_chance }
				factor = var:temp
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop_small = yes		
		TRM = { country_event = rusfor.1118 }
		MON = { country_event = rusfor.1118 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1117.b #Refuse and push the demand
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		add_political_power = -25
		add_war_support = 0.05
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_owned_by = MON
				OR = {
					state = 811
					state = 1293			
					state = 654			
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
		}
		TRM = { country_event = rusfor.1119 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Transamur intervenes
	id = rusfor.1118
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1118" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	title = rusfor.1118.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1118.d.mongolia
		trigger = { tag = MON }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1118.d.transamur
		trigger = { tag = TRM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1118.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = MON }
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = TRM modifier = KR_pleased }
			add_political_power = 25
			give_military_access = ROOT
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 25
			give_guarantee = MON
			set_temp_variable = { change_morale = 0.10 }
			RUS_change_siberian_war_morale = yes
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians refuse
	id = rusfor.1119
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1119" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	title = rusfor.1119.t
	desc = rusfor.1119.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1119.a #Do not attack
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 1
		}
		MON = { country_event = rusfor.1120 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1119.b #Attack
		trigger = {
			has_idea = TRM_dream
			if = {
				limit = { russian_civil_war = no }
				OR = {
					GER = { has_war_with = RUS }
					custom_trigger_tooltip = {
						tooltip = RUS_Start_The_Offensive_tooltip
						check_variable = { global.siberian_war_chance > 0.84 }
					}
				}
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = TRM_Form_A_New_Cabinet
					has_completed_focus = TRM_Our_Proud_Varyag_2
					has_completed_focus = TRM_RSDRP_PSR
					has_completed_focus = TRM_KDV
					has_completed_focus = TRM_NDS
					has_completed_focus = TRM_New_Far_Eastern_Republic
					has_completed_focus = TRM_Transbaikal_Union
					has_completed_focus = TRM_Russian_Empire_In_Exile
					has_completed_focus = TRM_spirit_revolution
					has_completed_focus = TRM_Hail_Tsar
					has_completed_focus = TRM_ROVS_Secures_The_Power
					has_country_flag = SOV_restored_in_transamur
				}
			}
			OR = {
				is_owner_neighbor_of = FROM
				any_allied_country = { is_owner_neighbor_of = FROM }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				russian_civil_war = no
				OR = {
					RUS_dont_attack_if_vulnerable_or_preparing = yes
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				AND = {
					russian_civil_war = yes
					FROM = { tag = RUS }
					TRM_nra_game_rule = yes
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				russian_civil_war = yes
			}
		}
		give_guarantee = MON
		MON = { give_military_access = ROOT }
		declare_war_on = {
			target = RUS
			type = annex_everything
		}
		MON = {			
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = take_core_state
				generator = { 329 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = TRM }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = russianews.7
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1120
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1120" }

	desc = rusfor.1120.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.1120.a #Never surrender
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.10
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1122 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1120.b #Give in to Russia's demands
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}		
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty_MON } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1112 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_tuva } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 329
							state = 811
							state = 1293
							state = 654
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
				}
			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1114 days = 1 } }
		}
	}

country_event = { #Mongolia refuses demands
	id = rusfor.1121
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1121" }
	title = rusfor.1121.t
	desc = rusfor.1121.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1121.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = MON
			type = take_claimed_state
			generator = { 811 1293 654 329 }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_defeat_mongolia
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = MON
				value = -1000
			}
			MON = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1121.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				MON = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = MON decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = MON
				value = -1000
			}
			MON = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Mongolia refuses demands
	id = rusfor.1122
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1122" }
	title = rusfor.1122.t
	desc = rusfor.1122.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1122.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				MON = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = MON
			type = take_claimed_state
			generator = { 329 }
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_defeat_mongolia
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = MON
				value = -1000
			}
			MON = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1122.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				set_temp_variable = { temp = global.siberian_war_chance }
				factor = var:temp
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 25
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop_small = yes		
		TRM = { country_event = rusfor.1118 }
		MON = { country_event = rusfor.1118 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian demands ROM
	id = rusfor.1180
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1180" }
	title = rusfor.1180.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1180.d.ROM
		trigger = { original_tag = ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1180.d.ROM_overlord
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = ROM } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			FROM = { can_declare_war_on = ROOT }
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = FROM }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
			NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROOT }
			NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1180.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = ROM
				has_government = national_populist
				has_idea = ROM_great_game
				NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			ROM = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = FROM
							is_claimed_by = FROM
							state = 78 #Bessarabia
						}
					}
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1182 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1180.b #Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_ally_with = FROM }
				leave_faction = yes
				peace_out_non_neighbours_after_leaving_faction = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1181 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Romania refuses!
	id = rusfor.1181
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1181" }
	title = rusfor.1181.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1181.d
		trigger = { NOT = { is_ally_with = FROM } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1181.d.ally
		trigger = { is_ally_with = FROM }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_ROM_guards

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			can_declare_war_on = FROM
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Then it is war
		name = rusfor.1181.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = ROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = { #Back down
		name = rusfor.1181.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = ROM decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
	}
}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.1182
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1182" }
	title = rusfor.1182.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1182.d
		trigger = { NOT = { is_ally_with = FROM } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1182.d.ally
		trigger = { is_ally_with = FROM }
	}

	trigger = {
		ROM = { owns_state = 78 } #Bessarabia
		OR = {
			can_declare_war_on = FROM
			ROM = {
				is_subject = yes
				overlord = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = FROM }
		NOT = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = ROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		name = rusfor.1182.a
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Bessarabia
		ROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = ROOT
						is_claimed_by = ROOT
						state = 78
						state = 1222
						state = 1320
					}
				}
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = ROOT
					relation = non_aggression_pact
				}
			}
			add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_outraged
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					NOT = { original_tag = ROM }
					NOT = { is_ally_with = ROOT }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
				target = FROM
				modifier = KR_hates_govt
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1191
	title = rusfor.1191.t
	desc = rusfor.1191.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_ROM_guards

	is_triggered_only = yes

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1191 option rusfor.1191.a"
		name = rusfor.1191.a #Then it is war
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1191 option rusfor.1191.b"
		name = rusfor.1191.b #Back down
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
	}

country_event = { #Transfer of the territory
	id = rusfor.1192
	title = rusfor.1192.t
	desc = rusfor.1192.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1192 option rusfor.1192.a"
		name = rusfor.1192.a #Another victory for Russian diplomacy!
		remove_decision = RUS_Demand_Armenia
		clr_country_flag = RUS_demanding_armenia
		TUR = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = ROOT
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 230 }
				230 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1213 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = GEO }
					1213 = { transfer_state_to = GEO }
				}
				else = {
					1213 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1000 }
				if = {
					limit = { is_in_faction_with = ARM }
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ARM }
				}
				else = {
					1000 = { transfer_state_to = ROOT }
				}
			}
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = TUR } } }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Vladivostok is Russian!
	id = rusfor.1208
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1208"}
	title = rusfor.1208.t
	desc = rusfor.1208.d
	#picture = GFX_petain_NFA

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.a #We shall seize and convert all of the ships in the harbour!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = -80
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 50
			producer = RUS
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_big
		}		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.b #We shall merely use Transamur's old naval designs.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
		}
		add_political_power = -40
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_small
		}
		add_equipment_to_stockpile = {
			type = convoy_1
			amount = 30
			producer = RUS
		}		
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.c #Sell off Transamur's navy and convert the harbour for civilian purposes.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		408 = {
			add_extra_state_shared_building_slots = 2
			add_building_construction = {
				type = industrial_complex
				level = 2
				instant_build = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1208.e #Sell off Transamur's navy and keep the money.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		add_political_power = 20
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = JAP
			modifier = RUS_vladivostok_sold
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				tag = SOV
			}
			408 = {
				add_building_construction = {
					type = coastal_bunker
					level = 2
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = naval_base
					level = 3
					province = 957
					instant_build = yes
				}
				add_building_construction = {
					type = infrastructure
					level = 2
					instant_build = yes
				}
			}
		}
		add_one_random_military_factory = yes
	}

}

country_event = { #Ultimatum for Galicia AUS owns it
	id = rusfor.1210
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1210" }
	title = rusfor.1210.t
	desc = rusfor.1210.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.a #Accept
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		add_political_power = -100
		if = {
			limit = { has_subject = GAL }
			if = {
				limit = {
					GAL = { owns_state = 73 }
				}
				transfer_state = 73
			}
			set_autonomy = {
				target = GAL
				autonomy_state = autonomy_free
			}
			remove_from_faction = GAL
			GAL = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1222
					days = 6
				}
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FROM
						is_claimed_by = FROM
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROM = { is_in_faction_with = RUS }
						}
					}
				}
				FROM = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1211
				days = 8
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1210.b #refuse
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1212
				days = 6
			}
		}
	}

}

country_event = { #AUS accepts
	id = rusfor.1211
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1211" }
	title = rusfor.1211.t
	desc = rusfor.1211.d

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1211.a #great
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL }
			clr_country_flag = RUS_annex_GAL
			annex_country = {
				target = GAL
				transfer_troops = no
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						AND = {
							is_claimed_by = ROM
							ROOT = { is_in_faction_with = ROM }
						}
					}
				}
				ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

### Pressure Finland ###
country_event = { #Demands to Finland
	id = rusfor.1224
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1224" }
	title = rusfor.1224.t
	desc = rusfor.1224.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			owns_state = 1325
			NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1224.a #Pro-Russian neutrality
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = DEFAULT } }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY } }
				has_left_democratic_government = no
				NOT = { FIN = { is_ally_with = INT } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					any_core_state = { is_owned_by = FIN }
					country_exists = KAR
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1225 days = 4 } }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1224.b #Territorial concessions
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_left_democratic_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ally_with = INT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia
		hidden_effect = {
			FIN = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1225 days = 4 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russia's Demands #for FIN
	id = rusfor.1225
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1225" }
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.1225.t.yya
	}
	title = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
		text = rusfor.1225.t.karelia
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
		text = rusfor.1225.d.yya
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
		text = rusfor.1225.d.karelia
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1225.a #If they want a fight, they'll get it!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = FIN_settle_the_russian_issue
					has_completed_focus = FIN_diplomacy
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1233 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1225.b #Appeal to Germany for diplomatic help
		trigger = {
			GER = {
				exists = yes
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = FIN
					has_war_with = RUS
				}
			}
			has_socialist_government = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_NEUTRALITY }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					FIN_is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_government = social_conservative
					FIN_is_monarchy = yes
				}
			}
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
		}
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.1228 }
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1225.c #Accept the demands
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
				NOT = { has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT } }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1226 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
			effect_tooltip = { 
				1326 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				146 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				1324 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				1325 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { KAR = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				set_temp_variable = { target = KAR }
				clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes
				KAR = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1234 days = 3 } }
			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1227 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Friendship treaty with Russia
	id = rusfor.1226
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1226" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland
	title = rusfor.1226.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1226.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1226.d.russia
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
	}
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		FIN = {
			NOT = { has_idea = RUS_FIN_neutrality }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1226.a #Could have been worse
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
		set_country_flag = FIN_YYA #for future use
		if = {
			limit = { has_completed_focus = FIN_diplomacy }
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = RUS decision = fin_join_russia }	
		}
		effect_tooltip = {
			RUS = { give_guarantee = FIN }
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1226.b #Welcome back
		trigger = { tag = RUS }
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop = yes
		give_guarantee = FIN
		FIN = {
			give_military_access = ROOT
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = docking_rights
				active = yes
			}
			add_ideas = RUS_FIN_neutrality
		}
		hidden_effect = { FIN = { country_event = rusfor.1226 } }
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland caves to demands
	id = rusfor.1227
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1227" }
	title = rusfor.1227.t
	desc = rusfor.1227.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1227.a		
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				is_owned_by = FIN
				OR = {
					is_core_of = ROOT
					state = 1324
					state = 1326			
				}
				NOT = { state = 722 }
			}
			transfer_state_to = ROOT
			add_claim_by = ROOT
			ROOT = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland appeals for German help
	id = rusfor.1228
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1228" }
	title = rusfor.1228.t
	desc = rusfor.1228.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_finland

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1228.a #Make the offer
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				FIN = { FIN_is_monarchy = yes }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1230 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1228.b #No, they are on their own
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.25
				OR = {
					country_exists = EST
					WHR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
					UKR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = no }
				}
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
		FIN = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1229 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		owns_state = 1325
		NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.a #Refuse the Russians anyway
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_completed_focus = FIN_settle_the_russian_issue
					has_completed_focus = FIN_diplomacy
				}
			}
		}
		add_war_support = 0.15
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		RUS = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1233 days = 3 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1229.b #Give in and hand over Vyborg
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_treaty } }
			decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_5 = yes
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1226 days = 1 } }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_demanded_karelia } }

				1326 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				146 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				1324 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
				1325 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { KAR = { is_ally_with = ROOT } }
				set_temp_variable = { target = KAR }
				clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes
				KAR = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1234 days = 3 } }
			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1227 days = 1 } }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germans intervene in dispute
	id = rusfor.1230
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1230" }
	title = rusfor.1230.t
	desc = rusfor.1230.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1230.a #Take it back by force!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = FROM decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		if = {
			limit = {
				KAR = {
					exists = yes
					is_subject_of = ROOT
				}
			}
			activate_targeted_decision = { target = KAR decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		}		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1230.b #Forget about it
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}	
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany arranges compromise
	id = rusfor.1231
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1231" }
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	title = {
		text = rusfor.1231.t.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1231.t.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1231.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1231.d.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1231.a
		if = {
			limit = { tag = FIN }
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = KR_pleased }
			add_political_power = 25
			722 = { transfer_state_to = FIN }
			set_country_flag = FIN_treaty_of_tampere_neutral_status
			set_rule = {
				desc = FIN_treaty_of_tampere_neutral_status
				can_join_factions = no
				can_not_declare_war = yes
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 25
			give_guarantee = FIN
		}
	}
}

		trigger = { tag = FIN }

		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}
