		text = rusfor.1232.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}

		text = rusfor.1232.d.germany

			}
			RUS = { country_event = { id = rusfor.1227 days = 1 } }
		}
	}

		trigger = { tag = GER }
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = RUS modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
	}

country_event = { #Finland refuses demands
	id = rusfor.1233
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1233" }
	title = rusfor.1233.t
	desc = rusfor.1233.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FIN
			type = take_claimed_state
			generator = { 146 1324 1325 1326 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { KAR = { is_ally_with = FIN } }
			declare_war_on = {
				target = KAR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
		activate_mission = RUS_defeat_finland
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = FIN
				value = -1000
			}
			FIN = {
				activate_mission = FIN_survive_russia
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1233.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				FIN = { is_in_faction = yes }
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = FIN decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = FIN
				value = -1000
			}
			FIN = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Karelia alone
	id = rusfor.1234
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1234" }
	title = rusfor.1234.t
	desc = rusfor.1234.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army_1
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.a
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_id = 717908
					has_id = 717910
					has_id = 747912
				}
			}
			set_nationality = FIN
		}
		set_country_flag = KAR_finland_can_coup
		RUS = {
			annex_country = { target = KAR }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = no }
			FIN = { change_tag_from = ROOT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1234.b
		add_war_support = 0.10
		every_unit_leader = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_id = 717908
					has_id = 717910
					has_id = 747912
				}
			}
			set_nationality = FIN
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = KAR_finland_aid }
			remove_ideas = KAR_finland_aid
		}
		set_country_flag = KAR_finland_can_coup
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FIN
			modifier = KR_outraged
		}
		RUS = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = KAR
				type = annex_everything
			}
		}
	}
}


country_event = { #ROM-RUS peace deal
	id = rusfor.1236
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1236" }
	title = rusfor.1236.t
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.victory
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1236.t.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1236.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = ROM
		has_war_with = 219.owner
		owns_state = 78
		owns_state = 1222
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		set_temp_variable = { RUS_enemy_tag = 219.owner }
		var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
			is_russian_tag_that_can_integrate = yes
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		OR = {
			#Romania loses
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = {
				controls_state = 78 #Bessarabia
				controls_state = 1222 # Bujak
				controls_state = 79 #Moldavia
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.15
			#Romania wins
			var:RUS_enemy_tag = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
			controls_state = 202 #Kiev
			controls_state = 226 #Ekaterinoslav
			AND = {
				controls_state = 192 #Odessa
				controls_state = 791 #Podolia
				OR = {
					controls_state = 197 #Kherson
					controls_state = 198 #Vinnitsa
					controls_state = 1245 #Bratslav
					controls_state = 199 #Proskurov
					controls_state = 1241 #Pobuzhie
					controls_state = 1233 #Elisavetgrad
					controls_state = 1232 #Nikolayev
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_ROM_offered_peace days = 90 value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					surrender_progress > 0.15
					NOT = { controls_state = 78 }
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = { flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM days = 60 value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.a #We have no choice; send word to Moscow.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.b #We can still win this!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.c #We prevail!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		var:219.owner = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1237 days = 1 random = 24 }
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1236.d #No, they must be taught a lesson.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}
}

country_event = { #Peace with Romania?
	id = rusfor.1237
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1237" }
	
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1237.t.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1237.d.victory
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	title = {
		text = rusfor.1237.t.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1237.d.defeat
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		has_war_with = FROM
		FROM = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.a #Accept; no point in wasting any more Russian lives.
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1238 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.b #Refuse; they must be taught a lesson!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1239 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.c #Reach out to the Romanians; this humiliation must end.
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1238 }
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1237.b #To hell with them! We will reach Kishinev at all costs!
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
			is_ai = no
		}
		add_stability = -0.15
		FROM = { country_event = rusfor.1239 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Treaty of Chisinau
	id = rusfor.1238
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1238" }
	title = rusfor.1238.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.victory
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1238.d.defeat
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.a #United just to be torn asunder again...
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		}
		78 = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		1320 = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		1222 = {
			if = {
				limit = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
				transfer_state_to = FROM
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { owns_state = 89 } #Stanislawow
			}
			80 = {
				if = {
					limit = { is_owned_by = ROOT }
					transfer_state_to = FROM
				}
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = ROOT
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1238.b 
		trigger = { has_global_flag = RUS_defeated_by_ROM }
		FROM = {
			remove_state_claim = 78 #Bessarabia
			remove_state_claim = 1222
			remove_state_claim = 1320
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = FROM
				relation = non_aggression_pact
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #WHR question
	id = rusfor.1241
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1241"}
	title = rusfor.1241.t
	desc = rusfor.1241.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1241.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BSDP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_SIGISMUND_COUP
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = WHR_situation
						option = WHR_SITUATION_BPSF
					}
				}
			}
		}
		clear_all_relations = yes
		set_cosmetic_tag = WHR_ANDRU
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Stanisłaŭ Bułak-Bałachowič"
			desc = "POLITICS_BULAK_BALACHOWIC_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/WHR/Portrait_WHR_Stanislaw_Bulak_Balachowicz.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_party
			long_name = WHR_paternal_autocrat_party_long
		}
		remove_all_ministers = yes
		add_ideas = {
			WHR_Stanislav_Bulak_Balakhovich_hog_sco
			WHR_Vatslav_Lastovsky_for_pau
			WHR_Mikalaj_Skjalenak_eco_npo
			WHR_Jan_Stankievic_sec_npo
		}
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			popularity = 0.15
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = RUS
				RUS = {
					is_subject = no
					has_socialist_government = no
					has_left_democratic_government = no
					NOT = {
						is_in_faction_with = GER
					}
				}
				NOT = { has_war_with = RUS }
			}
			get_current_government_type = yes
			RUS = {
				set_autonomy = {
					target = WHR
					autonomy_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				}
			}
			restore_previous_government_type = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1242
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1241.b
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				WHR = { has_stability > 0.7 }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1249
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #WHR question
	id = rusfor.1242
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1242"}
	title = rusfor.1242.t
	desc = rusfor.1242.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1242.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
			}
		}
		add_stability = 0.05
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1242.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				WHR = { is_subject_of = ROOT }
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = WHR
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					is_core_of = WHR
					has_resistance = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_resistance = yes }
					add_compliance = 20
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			WHR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1245
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}	
}

country_event = { #Russians are winning
	id = rusfor.1250
	title = rusfor.1250.t
	desc = rusfor.1250.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		RUS = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { country_exists = KAR }
			KAR = { has_socialist_government = no }
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.30
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1325 }
			NOT = { controls_state = 1325 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.20 }
			}
			surrender_progress > 0.40
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1250 option rusfor.1250.a"
		name = rusfor.1250.a #We have no choice
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1251 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1250 option rusfor.1250.b"
		name = rusfor.1250.b #Never! We will fight to the last man!
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				GER = { exists = yes }
			}
		}
		add_war_support = -0.20
		add_stability = -0.10
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland sues for peace
	id = rusfor.1251
	title = rusfor.1251.t
	desc = {
		trigger = { GER = { exists = yes } }
		text = rusfor.1251.d
	}
	desc = {
		trigger = { GER = { exists = no } }
		text = rusfor.1251.d2
	}
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		has_war_with = FIN
		FIN = {
			exists = yes
			has_capitulated = no
			is_in_faction = no
		}
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1251 option rusfor.1251.a"
		name = rusfor.1251.a #Accept their surrender
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ai = yes }
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			remove_targeted_decision = { decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default target = FIN }
			set_truce = { target = FIN days = 365 }
		}
		FIN = {
			effect_tooltip = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
								NOT = { 
									region = 12
									region = 13
								}
							}
							state = 146 #Viipuri
							state = 1324 #Viipuri
							state = 1325 #Viipuri
							state = 1326 #Viipuri
							state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
						}
					}
					ROOT = { transfer_state = PREV }
				}
			}
			country_event = rusfor.1252
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1251 option rusfor.1251.b"
		name = rusfor.1251.b #Refuse - onwards to Helsinki!
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				GER = {
					is_faction_leader = yes
					NOT = {
						has_war_with = FIN
						has_war_with = ROOT
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
						has_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
					}
				}
				GER = { exists = no }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				RUS_russian_monarch = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 10
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FIN = { is_ai = no }
			}
		}
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.1253 }
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians agree to peace
	id = rusfor.1252
	title = rusfor.1252.t
	desc = rusfor.1252.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy3

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1252 option rusfor.1252.a"
		name = rusfor.1252.a
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {					
					AND = {
						is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
						NOT = { 
							region = 12
							region = 13
						}
					}
					state = 146 #Viipuri
					state = 1324 #Viipuri
					state = 1325 #Viipuri
					state = 1326 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}	
			}
			FROM = { 
				transfer_state = PREV
				add_state_claim = PREV
				enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes 
			}
		}
		effect_tooltip = { RUS = { white_peace_with_ROOT = yes } }
		hidden_effect = {
			every_enemy_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_ally_with = RUS
						is_ally_with = INT
					}
				}
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1253 option rusfor.1253.a"
		name = rusfor.1253.a #We have no choice but to fight on
		ai_chance = { base = 20 }
		add_war_support = 0.10
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1253 option rusfor.1253.b"
		name = rusfor.1253.b #Call on the Germans for help
		trigger = {
			russian_civil_war = no
			is_in_faction = no
			OR = {
				FIN_is_monarchy = yes
				has_government = social_conservative
			}
			GER = {
				is_faction_leader = yes
				NOT = {
					has_war_with = FIN
					has_war_with = RUS
					has_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
					has_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
				}
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { base = 80 }
		GER = { country_event = rusfor.1254 }
	}
}

		name = rusfor.1254.a #Do it - Finland is a friend
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				FIN = { FIN_is_monarchy = no }
			}
		}
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_helped_finland
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_sacrifice_influence_FIN
		RUS = { country_event = rusfor.1256 }
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1254 option rusfor.1254.b"
		name = rusfor.1254.b #We don't like them THAT much
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_game_rule = { rule = FIN_foreign_policy option = FIN_FOREIGN_POLICY_REICHSPAKT }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		set_country_flag = RUS_germany_refused_finland
		FIN = {
			add_opinion_modifier = { target = ROOT modifier = KR_disapproves_of_govt }
			country_event = rusfor.1255
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Germany agrees to intervene
	id = rusfor.1257
	picture = GFX_report_event_generic_diplomacy4

	title = {
		text = rusfor.1257.t.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	title = {
		text = rusfor.1257.t.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1257.d.finland
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1257.d.germany
		trigger = { tag = GER }
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1257 option rusfor.1257.a"
		name = rusfor.1257.a
		trigger = { tag = FIN }
		add_opinion_modifier = { target = GER modifier = KR_pleased }
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					state = 1324 #Viipuri
					state = 1326 #Viipuri
					state = 147 #Kuolajarvi
				}
			}
			transfer_state_to = RUS
			add_claim_by = RUS
			RUS = { enable_state_integration_50_compliance = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = KAR
				KAR = { is_ally_of_ROOT = yes }
			}
			set_temp_variable = { target = KAR }
			clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes
		}
		RUS = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1257 option rusfor.1257.b"
		name = rusfor.1257.b
		trigger = { tag = GER }
		add_political_power = 50
	}
}

country_event = { #Finland is winning the war
	id = rusfor.1258
	title = rusfor.1258.t
	desc = rusfor.1258.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		is_valid_peace_target = yes
		FIN = {
			has_war_with = ROOT
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			NOT = { surrender_progress > 0.40 }
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1325 }
				controls_state = 1325
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 146 }
				controls_state = 146
			}
			if = {
				limit = { owns_state = 1326 }
				controls_state = 1326
			}
			controls_state = 195
		}
		surrender_progress > 0.10
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1328 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 1328 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1327 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 1327 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 213 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 213 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 215 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 215 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 216 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 216 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 722 }
			FIN = { controls_state = 722 }
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		days = 1
	}

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1258 option rusfor.1258.a"
		name = rusfor.1258.a
		RUS_decrease_ruling_party_pop = yes
		add_political_power = -150
		FIN = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_claimed_by = RUS }
				remove_claim_by = RUS
			}
		}
		FIN = { country_event = rusfor.1259 }
		effect_tooltip = {			
			if = {
				limit = { 
					country_exists = KAR 
					KAR = { 
						OR = {
							is_ally_with = FIN
							is_guaranteed_by = FIN
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = KAR
							is_claimed_by = KAR
							state = 1274
							state = 216
						}
						NOT = { 
							state = 1327
							state = 213
						}
					}
					KAR = { transfer_state = PREV }
				}
				KAR = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 147
						state = 1326
						state = 1324
						state = 1325
						state = 1328
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 216
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						is_controlled_by = FIN						
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 1327
						state = 1274
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russians sue for peace
	id = rusfor.1259
	title = rusfor.1259.t
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_army2

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1259.d.winning
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1259.d.timeout
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1259 option rusfor.1259.a"
		name = rusfor.1259.a #Unbelievable!
		trigger = {
			RUS = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 100
		RUS = {
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes			
			if = {
				limit = { 
					country_exists = KAR 
					KAR = { 
						OR = {
							is_ally_with = FIN
							is_guaranteed_by = FIN
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core_of = KAR
							is_claimed_by = KAR
							state = 1274
							state = 216
						}
						NOT = { 
							state = 1327
							state = 213
						}
					}
					KAR = { transfer_state = PREV }
				}
				KAR = { separate_peace_all_wars = yes }
				hidden_effect = {
					FIN = {
						country_event = {
							id = kar.39
							days = 5
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						state = 146 #Viipuri
						state = 147
						state = 1326
						state = 1324
						state = 1325
						state = 1328
						state = 215 #Kem
						state = 216
						state = 722 #Petsamo
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core_of = FIN
						is_claimed_by = FIN
						is_controlled_by = FIN						
						state = 213 #Murmansk
						state = 1327
						state = 1274
					}
				}
				FIN = { transfer_state = PREV }
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		log = "[GetLogInfo]: event rusfor.1259 option rusfor.1259.b"
		name = rusfor.1259.b #A great day for Finland
		trigger = {
			RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout }
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		RUS = {
			clr_country_flag = RUS_winter_war_timeout
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
		}
	}
}

		}

			limit = { 
				owns_state = 1293

			limit = { 
				owns_state = 654
				MON = { controls_state = 654 }
			}

			limit = { 
				owns_state = 329
				MON = { controls_state = 329 }
			}
			329 = { 
				remove_claim_by = RUS
				transfer_state_to = MON 
			}
		}

			limit = { 
				controls_state = 811
				MON = { owns_state = 811 }
			}

				controls_state = 1293

			}

		}

				controls_state = 654
				MON = { owns_state = 654 }
			}
			654 = { transfer_state_to = RUS }
		}

					}
				}
			}
		}

			}
		}

			}

			type = annex_everything
		}

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #WHR bonds
	id = rusfor.12677
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.12677"}
	title = rusfor.12677.t
	desc = rusfor.12677.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.12677.a
		trigger = {
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				GER = { has_war_with = FRA }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 10
				WHR = { is_subject = no }
				WHR = { is_in_faction = no }
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.12677.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50 
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		RUS = { add_opinion_modifier = {

			}
		}

			factor = 35
		}

country_event = { #The Ottomans are Collapsing!
	id = rusfor.12810
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.12810" }
	title = rusfor.12810.t
	desc = rusfor.12810.d
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			1000 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = TUR
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
			1001 = {
				OR = {
					is_owned_by = TUR
					is_owned_by = TUR
				}
				is_claim_or_core_of_ROOT = yes
				any_neighbor_state = {
					is_owned_and_controlled_by_ROOT_or_subject = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.a #Seize Greater Armenia!
		TUR = {
			country_event = rusfor.12810
			hidden_effect = {
				every_enemy_country = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							tag = EGY
							tag = PER
						}
					}
					country_event = rusfor.1281
				}
			}
		}
		transfer_state = 1000
		transfer_state = 1001
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.12810.b #It's too risky.
		trigger = { is_ai = no }
	}
}

country_event = { #What to do with KUB
	id = rusfor.1280
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1280" }
	title = rusfor.1280.t
	desc = rusfor.1280.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_kuban
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1280.a #
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				KUB = {
					is_subject = yes
					NOT = { is_subject_of = RUS }
				}
			}
			var:KUB.overlord = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1281 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KUB = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
			}
			GER = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1281 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				KUB = { is_guaranteed_by = UKR }
			}
			UKR = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1281 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
		else = {
			KUB = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1281 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1280.b #Start sending agitators
		trigger = {
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved 
				has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored
			}
			KUB = {
				is_subject = no
				KUB_has_bolsheviks = no
			}
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}
		KUB = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1013 days = 2 random_days = 2 } #warning event
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Russian demands KUB
	id = rusfor.1281
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1281" }
	title = rusfor.1281.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1281.d.KUB
		trigger = { original_tag = KUB }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1281.d.KUB_overlord
		trigger = { NOT = { original_tag = KUB } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_kremlin_1

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1281.a #accept
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
			modifier = {
				factor = 40
				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				NOT = { tag = KUB }
				KUB = { 
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = DKB
				OR = {
					kuban_is_pro_german = yes
					KUB_has_chernomortsy = yes
					has_socialist_government = yes
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_cossack_hosts_dissolved }
				}
				NOT = { is_ally_with = RUS }
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_guaranteed = KUB }
			KUB = { 
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1015 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1283 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1281.b #Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1282 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Don refuses!
	id = rusfor.1282
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1282" }
	title = rusfor.1282.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1282.d
		trigger = { FROM = { original_tag = KUB } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1282.d.KUB_overlord
		trigger = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = KUB } } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Then it is war
		name = rusfor.1282.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				KUB = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = { #Back down
		name = rusfor.1282.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				KUB = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = KUB decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = KUB
				value = -1000
			}
			KUB = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

				is_in_faction = no
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 20
				NOT = { tag = KLY }
				KLY = { 
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					is_guaranteed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				tag = KLY
				OR = {

					has_government = social_conservative

			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		effect_tooltip = {
			FROM = {
				annex_country = { target = ROOT }
			}
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { has_guaranteed = KLY }
			KLY = { 
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1015 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
		else = {
			FROM = {
				country_event = { id = rusfor.1288 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1286.b #Never!
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_subject_of = FROM }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			base = 95
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = {
					OR = {
						is_actual_major = yes
						is_neighbor_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = -15
				RUS = {
					NOT = {
						surrender_progress > 0
						any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_ally_with = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				FROM = { same_government_type_as_ROOT_authoritarian = no }
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = RUS_will_declare_war_on_ROOT
		FROM = {
			country_event = { id = rusfor.1287 days = 2 random_days = 2 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Don refuses!
	id = rusfor.1287
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1287" }
	title = rusfor.1287.t

	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1287.d
		trigger = { FROM = { original_tag = KLY } }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1287.d.KLY_overlord
		trigger = { FROM = { NOT = { original_tag = KLY } } }
	}

	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_cossacks_2

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #Then it is war
		name = rusfor.1287.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				KLY = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

	option = { #Back down
		name = rusfor.1287.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				KLY = { 
					OR = {
						is_in_faction = yes 
						is_guaranteed_by = GER
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 100
				any_enemy_country = { is_actual_major = yes }
			}
		}
		activate_targeted_decision = { target = KLY decision = RUS_Attack_Country_default }
		hidden_effect = {
			add_ai_strategy = {
				type = prepare_for_war
				id = KLY
				value = -1000
			}
			KLY = {
				add_ai_strategy = {
					type = prepare_for_war
					id = RUS
					value = -1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

			}

			}
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				long_name = MAN_russian_party_long
				name = MAN_russian_party
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = MAN_ZRO
			add_timed_idea = {
				idea = RUS_eurasian_integration
				days = 400
			}
		}
		every_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					region = 218
					region = 222
				}
			}
			add_claim_by = MAN
		}
		MAN = { save_global_event_target_as = china_ally_target }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {	
		name = rusfor.1417.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 90
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
				NOT = { state = 537 }
				NOT = { state = 555 }
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = PREV
			}
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = ROOT
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1421
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1417.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1420
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = rusfor.1418
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1418"}
	title = rusfor.1417.t
	desc = rusfor.1418.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {	
		name = rusfor.1417.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 60
			modifier = {
				add = -20
				RUS = { has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism }
			}				
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		reverse_add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = ROOT
			modifier = KR_trade_agreement
		}
		every_owned_state = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_claim_or_core_of_FROM = yes
					state = 537 
				}
				NOT = { state = 555 }
			}
			FROM = {
				transfer_state = PREV
				add_to_array = { global.RUS_integration_state_array = 537 }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1421
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1417.b
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 40
			modifier = {
				add = 20

			}				
		}
		FROM = {

			}
		}
	}

country_event = { #vladivostok captured
	id = rusfor.1422
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1422"}
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = {
		tag = RUS
		controls_state = 408
		has_war_with = TRM
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1422.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				TRM = { is_subject_of = JAP }
			}
			TRM = {
				TRM_remove_japanese_influence = yes
				set_temp_variable = { target = JAP }
				clear_all_relations_with_TARGET = yes
			}
			white_peace = JAP
		}
		TRM = { force_capitulate = yes }
	}
}
country_event = { #Hidden failsafe event if TRM peaces out before Vladivostok is captured
	id = rusfor.14220
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.14220"}
	title = rusfor.1422.t
	desc = rusfor.1422.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = {
			tag = RUS
		has_idea = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
		TRM = { exists = no }
	}
	option = {
		remove_ideas = RUS_Siberian_War_Buff
	} 
}

			factor = 30

			}
		}

			type = annex_everything
		}
	}

country_event = { #Alaska Integration
	id = rusfor.1436
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1436.t
	desc = rusfor.1436.d
	trigger = {
		tag =  ALA
		OR = {
			is_subject_of = RUS
			is_subject_of = SOV
			is_subject_of = TRM
		}
		NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS }
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { days = 1 }
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1436.a
		set_cosmetic_tag = ALA_RUS
		hidden_effect = {
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat
				long_name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
				name = "Rossiyskaya Administratsiya"
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = authoritarian_democrat
				elections_allowed = no
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = national_populist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = paternal_autocrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = authoritarian_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_conservative_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = market_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_liberal_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = social_democrat_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = radical_socialist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = syndicalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Russian Administration"
				desc = "POLITICS_RUSSIAN_ADMIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/ALA/Portrait_Alaska_Russian_Administration.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = totalist_subtype
				traits = {  }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}

				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}

			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = CAN
					is_subject_of = JAP
				}
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}

		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}

		}

		}

	id = rusfor.1439
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }
	title = rusfor.1429.t
	desc = rusfor.1429.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1439.a #Let them decide but we won't back them up militarily.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		ALA = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1440
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1429.e #We're keeping it.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1441
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = { #Surrender
		name = rusfor.1429.a
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 30
				has_war = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_war_with = RUS
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			set_autonomy = {
				target = ALA
				autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
				freedom_level = 0.75
			}
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
}

	title = rusfor.1440.t
	desc = rusfor.1440.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		name = rusfor.1437.a # Surrender
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = no
			}
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1442
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1437.b # We'll fight, but we're on our own.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 50
			modifier = {
				add = -30
				has_war = yes
			}
		}
		set_autonomy = {
			target = ALA
			autonomy_state = autonomy_free
		}
		ALA = {
			declare_war_on = {
				target = RUS
				type = annex_everything
			}
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1438
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	
	}
}

country_event = { # Alaska Surrenders
	id = rusfor.1442
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1436" }

	desc = rusfor.1442.d
	is_triggered_only = yes

		puppet = ALA
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_CAN
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Canada_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					CAN = {
						has_idea = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = CAN_Defense_Against_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_JAP
			}
			if = {
				limit = { 
					JAP = {
						has_idea = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
					}
				}
				remove_ideas = ALA_Japan_Concessions_ALA
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_idea = ALA_japanese_publications}
				remove_ideas = ALA_japanese_publications
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { # Fate of Turkestan
	id = rusfor.1443
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1443" }
	title = rusfor.1443.t
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.united
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rusfor.1443.d.notunited
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
		}
	}	
	picture = GFX_report_event_turkestan
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 25
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 50
				has_democratic_government = yes
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { 
				same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes 
				is_subject = no
			}
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1444
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 5
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { 
				same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes 
				is_subject = no
			}
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1447
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_dictatorship_government = yes
			}
			modifier = {
				add = 25
				has_government = totalist
			}
		}
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
				tag = SOV
				has_socialist_government = yes
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1453
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KHI
				}
				KHI = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.e
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			UTR = { 
				same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes 
				is_subject = no
			}
			has_completed_focus = RUS_Expansionism
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
		}
		UTR = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1456
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.g
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united }
			OR = {
				TRK = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				KHI = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				UZB = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
				KYR = { same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes }
			}
			RUS_russian_monarch = no
			}
		every_other_country = {
				limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = KYR
					tag = KHI
					tag = UZB
					tag = TRK
				}
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					same_government_type_as_ROOT = yes
					is_subject = no
				}
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1444
						days = 3
					}
				}
			else = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.f
		ai_chance = {
			base = 100
		}
		trigger = {
			RUS_russian_monarch = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = global_turkestan_united
			}
			UTR = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1459
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KYR
				}
				KYR = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = TRK
				}
				TRK = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1453
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = KHI
				}
				KHI = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					country_exists = UZB
				}
				UZB = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1456
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1443.h
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = KYR
					tag = KHI
					tag = UZB
					tag = TRK
			}
				exists = yes
		}
			if = {
				limit = { is_subject = yes }
				ROOT = {
					create_wargoal = {
					type = annex_everything
						target = PREV
				}
			}
				}
			else = {
				ROOT = {
				declare_war_on = {
						target = PREV
					type = annex_everything
				}
			}
			}
		}
	}	
}

	id = rusfor.1460
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1460" }
	title = rusfor.1460.t
	desc = rusfor.1460.d

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1460.a
		hidden_effect = {
			annex_country = { target = FROM }
		}
		584 = { add_claim_by = ROOT }
		add_to_array = { global.RUS_integration_state_array = 584 }
		KHI = {
			transfer_state = 861
			add_state_core = 861
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = KHI
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		KHI = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		}
		UZB = {
			transfer_state = 405
			transfer_state = 585
			transfer_state = 732
			add_state_core = 405
			add_state_core = 585
			add_state_core = 732
		}		
		set_autonomy = {
			target = UZB
			autonomous_state = kr_autonomous_puppet
			freedom_level = 0.75
		}
		UZB = {
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			}
			set_political_party = {
				ideology = paternal_autocrat
				popularity = 60
			}
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
		}
	}

country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1462
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1462" }
	title = rusfor.1462.t
	desc = rusfor.1462.d
	trigger = {
		tag = JAP
		has_war_with = RUS
		NOT = { country_exists = TRM }
		408 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		1246 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
		409 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = yes }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		if = {
			limit = { 408 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			408 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 409 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			409 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 219 = { owner = { is_russian_tag = yes } } }
			219 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = {
						id = rusfor.1463
						days = 3
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { has_war_with = RUS }
			RUS = {
				country_event = {
					id = rusfor.1463
					days = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { # Japan-RUS peace
	id = rusfor.1463
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1463" }
	title = rusfor.1463.t
	desc = rusfor.1463.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1462.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = JAP
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				is_in_asia = yes
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		JAP = { transfer_state = 408 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 1246 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 409 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 637 }
		JAP = { transfer_state = 562 }
		637 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		562 = { add_claim_by = JAP }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				is_chinese_tag = yes
				is_subject_of = ROOT
			}
			release = PREV
		}
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		add_stability = -0.2
		add_war_support = -0.5
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {

		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				has_completed_focus = BRY_Our_Relations_With_Russia
				NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1468
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1467.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				is_guaranteed_by = FROM
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 1.5
				has_completed_focus = BRY_Our_Relations_With_Russia
				NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = FROM }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 2
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						NOT = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
					}
					is_guaranteed_by = MON
				}				
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1469
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}	
}

				add = 70

			}

country_event = { # Peaceful unification with Transamur
	id = rusfor.1480
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1480" }
	title = rusfor.1480.t
	desc = rusfor.1480.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1480.a
		if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = ROOT }
				remove_claim_by = FROM
				add_core_of = FROM
			}
			FROM = {
				annex_country = {
					target = ROOT
					transfer_troops = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_owned_state = {
				limit = { is_core_of = FROM }
				remove_claim_by = ROOT
				add_core_of = ROOT
			}
			annex_country = {
				target = FROM
				transfer_troops = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1509
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1509" }
	title = rusfor.1509.t
	desc = rusfor.1509.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1213 }
			1213 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1000 }
			1000 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { owns_state = 1001 }
			1001 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 773 = { is_claimed_by = RUS } }
			773 = { is_controlled_by_ROOT_or_ally = no }
		}
		OR = {
			surrender_progress > 0.4
			has_global_flag = AXIS_VICTORY
		}
		RUS = { 
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = AZE
				AZE = {
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			AZE = { has_capitulated = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				country_exists = ARM
				ARM = {
					OR = {
						is_subject_of = ROOT
						is_in_faction_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			ARM = { has_capitulated = yes }
		}		
	}
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1509.a
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1510
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1509.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 0
		}
		add_war_support = -0.05
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				NOT = { is_subject_of = GER }
			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
	}	
}

		}

			}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				NOT = { is_subject_of = GER }
			}
			leave_faction = yes
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {

			}

country_event = { #Danzig Treaty
	id = rusfor.1516
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1516" }
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
				}
				news_event = {
					id = rusfor.1518
					days = 1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.1516.t
	desc = rusfor.1516.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1516.a
		setup_danzig_treaty = yes
		increase_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
		set_truce = {
			target = GER
			days = 2900
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = GER
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		GER = { add_ideas = GER_danzig_treaty }
	}			
}

country_event = { #Austrian Peace treaty
	id = rusfor.1522
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1522" }
	title = rusfor.1522.t
	desc = rusfor.1522.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1522.a
		save_event_target_as = peace_country
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = RUS
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					is_subject_of = RUS
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
				}
			}
			event_target:peace_country = { white_peace = PREV }
		}
		set_truce = {
			target = FROM
			days = 1200
		}
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = FROM
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
	}	
}

			}

		}

country_event = { #Treaty of Budapest
	id = rusfor.1526
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1526" }
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			random_other_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
				}
				news_event = rusfor.1527
			}
		}
	}
	title = rusfor.1526.t
	desc = rusfor.1526.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1526.a
		setup_budapest_treaty = yes
		diplomatic_relation = {
			country = AUS
			relation = non_aggression_pact
			active = yes
		}
		AUS = { add_ideas = AUS_budapest_treaty }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = HUN
					tag = CZE
					tag = CRO
					tag = GAL
				}
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_in_faction_with = AUS
					is_subject_of = AUS
				}
			}
			add_ideas = AUS_budapest_treaty
		}
	}	
}

# RUS Violates Treaty
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1600
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1600" }
	title = rusfor.1600.t
	desc = rusfor.1600.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus }
		tag = GER
		RUS = {
			OR = {
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_1
				has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk_renegotiated
			}
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
		}
		OR = {
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = UKR }
				UKR = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = WHR }
				WHR = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = FIN }
				FIN = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = LIT }
				LIT = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}
			}
			AND = {
				RUS = { has_war_with = BAT }
				BAT = { 
					has_socialist_government = no
					is_ally_of_ROOT = no
					NOT = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
				}				
			}
		}	
	}	

	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
		}
		RUS = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1601
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
		}
		add_stability = -0.1
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1601
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1601" }
	title = rusfor.1601.t
	desc = rusfor.1601.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1601.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 80
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.5
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = rus_brest_litovsk }
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk
		}
		else = {
			remove_ideas = rus_brest_litovsk_1
		}
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
		add_named_threat = { 
			threat = 7
			name = "Russia Repudiated Minsk Treaty!"
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1602
				days = 3
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1600.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				has_completed_focus = RUS_Realpolitik
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 5
				OR = {
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		every_enemy_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					original_tag = UKR
					tag = FIN
					tag = LIT
					tag = BAT
					tag = WHR
					is_ally_with = UKR
					is_ally_with = FIN
					is_ally_with = LIT
					is_ally_with = BAT
					is_ally_with = WHR
				}
			}
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 100 }
		}
		add_war_support = -0.1
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_10 = yes
	
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1602
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1602" }
	title = rusfor.1602.t
	desc = rusfor.1602.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.a #Cease all contacts between the Völkerbund and Russia!
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
		}
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		embargo_FROM = yes
		hidden_effect = {
			for_each_scope_loop = {
				array = ROOT.faction_members
				RUS = { embargo_PREV = yes }
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1603
				days = 1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.b #Back down, we cannot afford a conflict with Russia.
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
		}
		trigger = {
			country_exists = FRA
		}
		set_global_flag = GER_withdrew_from_caucasus
		add_political_power = -100		
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1602.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 3
				RUS = { 
					OR = {
						has_war_with = UKR
						has_war_with = FIN
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0.1
				OR = {
					date < 1938.1.1
					enemies_strength_ratio > 0.8
					surrender_progress > 0
					strength_ratio = { tag = FROM ratio < 1.0 }
					FROM = {
						is_subject = yes
						overlord = {
							strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
						}
					}
					FROM = {
						is_in_faction = yes
						faction_leader = {
							strength_ratio = { tag = ROOT ratio > 0.8 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1603
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1603" }
	title = rusfor.1603.t
	desc = rusfor.1603.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1603.a #I WILL SURVIVE
		add_stability = -0.1
		add_ideas = rus_ceased_contacts_germany
		RUS_remove_riga_accords = yes
	}	
}
# RUS in Entente?
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1700
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1700" }
	title = rusfor.1700.t
	desc = rusfor.1700.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1700.a
		ai_chance = { base = 100 }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { is_in_faction_with = FROM }
			set_country_flag = was_in_faction_with_RUS
		}
		FROM = { dismantle_faction = yes }
		ROOT = { add_to_faction = FROM }
		every_other_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = was_in_faction_with_RUS }
			ROOT = { add_to_faction = PREV }
		}	
	}
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1700.b
		ai_chance = { base = 0 }
		FROM = { 
			country_event = {
				id = rusfor.1701
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}	
}
country_event = { #
	id = rusfor.1701
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusfor.1701" }
	title = rusfor.1701.t
	desc = rusfor.1701.d
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = rusfor.1701.a
		add_opinion_modifier = {
			target = FROM
			modifier = KR_hates_govt
		}
	}	
}

news_event = { #Vozhd Takes Power in Russia!
	id = russianews.1
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.1" }
	title = russianews.1.t
	desc = russianews.1.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_savinkov

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.1.a
		trigger = { original_tag = GER }
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.b
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
			NOT = { original_tag = GER }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.c
		trigger = { has_socialist_government = yes }
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.e
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ROM
			has_country_flag = ROM_selectczc
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.f
		trigger = {
			original_tag = ROM
			has_country_flag = ROM_selectcarol
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.g
		trigger = {
			original_tag = SER
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.1.h
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_in_faction_with = GER
				has_socialist_government = yes
				original_tag = ROM
				original_tag = SER
			}
		}
	}
}

news_event = { #Reds Win Civil War
	id = russianews.5
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.5" }
	title = russianews.5.t
	desc = russianews.5.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_soviet_russia

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.5.a
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = GER
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					original_tag = WHR
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.5.b
		trigger = {
			original_tag = WHR
			has_government = social_democrat
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.5.c
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = ENT
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					original_tag = WHR
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.5.e
		trigger = {
			is_in_faction_with = INT
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					original_tag = WHR
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russianews.5.f
		trigger = {
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENT }
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER }
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					original_tag = WHR
					has_government = social_democrat
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russianews.22
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russianews.22" }
	title = russianews.22.t
	desc = russianews.22.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_tsar_wrangel_2

	major = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	show_major = {
		NOT = {
			tag = RUS
		}
		OR = {
			regional_europe_news = yes
			regional_asia_news = yes
			regional_middle_east_news = yes
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = russianews.22.a
	}
}

# The Fall of Russia
news_event = {
	id = russia.1902
	immediate = { log = "[GetLogInfo]: event russia.1902" }
	title = russia.1902.t
	desc = russia.1902.d
	picture = GFX_news_event_RUS_collapse

	trigger = {
		wants_world_news = yes
	}

	major = yes
	fire_for_sender = no
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.1902.a
		trigger = { is_ally_with = GER }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.b
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = INT
			NOT = { has_war_with = GER }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.c
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = INT
			has_war_with = GER
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.e
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = ENT
			INT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			NOT = { has_war_with = INT }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.f
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = ENT
			INT = { is_faction_leader = yes }
			has_war_with = INT
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.g
		trigger = {
			is_ally_with = ENT
			INT = { is_faction_leader = no }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.h
		trigger = { original_tag = JAP }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.i
		trigger = { is_chinese_tag = yes }
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1902.j
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				is_ally_with = GER
				is_ally_with = INT
				is_ally_with = ENT
				original_tag = JAP
				is_chinese_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #force RUS to collapse if the war drags on too long
	id = russia.1919
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		RRF = { is_ai = yes }
		surrender_progress > 0
	}

	option = {
		force_capitulate = yes
	}
}
country_event = { #force RVA and RRF to collapse if the war drags on too long
	id = russia.1920
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1919 FROM = [From.GetName]" }

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		controls_state = 195
		controls_state = 219
	}

	option = {
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = RVA
				RVA = { is_ai = yes }
			}
			RVA = { force_capitulate = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				country_exists = RRF
				RRF = { is_ai = yes }
			}
			RRF = { force_capitulate = yes }
		}		
	}
}

	id = russia.1921

	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		is_ai = yes
		WRA = { is_ai = yes }
		surrender_progress > 10
	}

	option = {
		force_capitulate = yes
	}
}

	id = russia.1923
	immediate = { 
		log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1923 FROM = [From.GetName]" 
		bolsheviks_gome_home = yes
	}
	title = russia.1923.t

unit_leader_event = { #soviet generals
	id = russia.1924
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1924"}
	title = russia.1924.t
	desc = russia.1924.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.03
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { 
					has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_italian_clique 
					NOT = { has_id = 1954 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_field_marshal = yes }
					demote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 1954 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 15
		if = {
			limit = {
				SRI = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_italian_clique }
				set_nationality = SRI
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_italian_clique }
				set_nationality = FRA
			}
		}
	}
}
unit_leader_event = { #soviet generals
	id = russia.1925
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.1925"}
	title = russia.1925.t
	desc = russia.1925.d
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
		}
		add_war_support = 0.05
		add_stability = -0.05
		add_popularity = {
			ideology = totalist
			popularity = 0.02
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { 
					has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_british_clique 
					NOT = { has_id = 1955 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { is_field_marshal = yes }
					demote_leader = yes
				}
			}
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 1955 }
			if = {
				limit = { is_field_marshal = no }
				promote_leader = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.1924.b
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_political_power = 15
		if = {
			limit = {
				ENG = { is_in_faction_with = INT }
			}
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_british_clique }
				set_nationality = ENG
			}
		}
		else = {
			every_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_unit_leader_flag = SOV_british_clique }
				set_nationality = FRA
			}
		}
	}
}

### Renaming cities by Nicolay Romanov ###
country_event = { #Peterburg 
	id = russia.2006
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2006"}
	title = russia.2006.t
	desc = russia.2006.d
	picture = GFX_rus_gorod_na_neve

	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #a great idea!
		name = russia.2006.a
		set_province_name = { id = 6174 name = "Sankt-Peterburg"}
		195 = { 
			set_state_name = STATE_195_IMPERIAL
			set_state_flag = renamed_state_imperial 
			hidden_effect = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2006.b


	}
}

country_event = { #Rename for Murmansk
	id = russia.144
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.144" }
	title = russia.144.t
	desc = russia.144.d
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = russia.144.a
		set_province_name = { id = 3134 name = "Romanov-na-Murmane" }
		213 = { 
			set_state_flag = renamed_state_imperial 
			set_state_name = "Romanov-na-Murmane"
			hidden_effect = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = russia.144.b
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = russia.2008
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2008"}
	title = russia.2008.t
	desc = russia.2008.d
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #a great idea!
		name = russia.2008.a
		set_province_name = { id = 9097 name = "Petergof"}
		set_province_name = { id = 3529 name = "Tsaritsyn"}
		set_province_name = { id = 7274 name = "Novo-Nikolayevsk"}
		set_province_name = { id = 9402 name = "Tsaryovokokshaysk"}
		217 = { set_state_name = "Tsaritsyn" }
		570 = { set_state_name = "Novo-Nikolayevsk" }
		hidden_effect = { 
			195 = { set_state_flag = renamed_petrodvorets }
			570 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_imperial }
			217 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_imperial }
			1193 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_imperial }	
			every_controlled_state = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2008.b


	}
}

	id = russia.2010

		name = russia.2010.a
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2010.b
		set_province_name = { id = 6332 name = "Korolevets"}
		5 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_korolevets }
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_controlled_state = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2010.c
		country_event = russia.2011
	}
	option = { #
		name = russia.2010.e
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = soviet_russia_restored }
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = RUS_GOR }
				NOT = {
					has_government = totalist
					has_government = syndicalist
				}
			}
		}			
		country_event = russia.2012
	}
}

		}

		5 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_savinkovsk }
		hidden_effect = {

		}

			OR = {
				has_country_leader = {
					name = "Kirill I"
					ruling_only = yes

			has_government = totalist
		}

		5 = { set_state_flag = renamed_state_novooktyabrsk }
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_controlled_state = { rename_state_effect = yes }
		}
	}
	option = { # go back
		name = russia.2012.e
		country_event = russia.2010
	}
}
