country_event = { #flag event
	id = russia.2013
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2013"}
	title = russia.2013.t
	desc = russia.2013.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_socialist_flag
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = { #E
		name = russia.2013.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV
		}
	}
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2013.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_alternative_2 }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_alternative_2
		}
	}
   option = { #E
		name = russia.2013.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_alternative }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_alternative
		}
	}	
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2013.e
	}
}
country_event = { #flag event
	id = russia.2014
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.2014"}
	title = russia.2014.t
	desc = russia.2014.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_RUS_soviet_flag

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union
		}
	}
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2014.b
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative
		}
	}
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2014.c
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative_2 }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative_2
		}
	}  
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2014.e
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative_3 }
			}
			set_cosmetic_tag = SOV_union_alternative_3
		}
	}	
	option = { #E
		name = russia.2013.e
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = russia.3000
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event russia.3000" }
	title = russia.3000.t
	desc = russia.3000.d
	picture = GFX_report_event_KSV_helicopters

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	fire_only_once = yes	

	option = {
		name = russia.3000.a
		if = {
			limit = { has_dlc_got = yes }
			complete_special_project = sp:sp_air_helicopter
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = helicopter_equipment_1 amount = 100 }
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				helicopter = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = helicopter_1 amount = 100 }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					is_in_faction_with = RUS
					NOT = { tag = ROOT }
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = russia.3001
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = russia.3001

			limit = { has_dlc_got = yes }
			add_breakthrough_progress = {
				specialization = specialization_air
				value = 0.25
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_technology = {
				helicopter = 1
			}
			add_equipment_to_stockpile = { type = helicopter_1 amount = 25 }
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Rumors of a monarchist plot in the Military
	id = rusdroz.56
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdroz.56"}
	title = rusdroz.56.t 
	desc = rusdroz.56.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_civilwar_over
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #those are just rumors
		name = rusdroz.56.a
		ai_chance = {
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_KORNILOV_SAVINKOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_GORGULOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_SOLIDARISTS
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RULE_OPTION_RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_ABUKUMOV
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_WRANGEL_TSAR_WRANGEL
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.02
	}
	option = { #purge them
		name = rusdroz.56.b
		ai_chance = {
			base = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000
				OR = {
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_ALONE
					}
					has_game_rule = {
						rule = RUS_post_assassination
						option = RUS_POST_ASSASSINATION_DROZDOVSKY_MONARCHIST
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_political_power = 50
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.57
			days = 8
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Drozdovsky Takes Over!
	id = rusdroz.57
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdroz.57"}
	title = rusdroz.57.t 
	desc = rusdroz.57.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_droz1_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #omg!
		name = rusdroz.57.a
		remove_power_balance = { id = RUS_denikin_wrangel_conflict }
		add_ideas = rus_silent_darkness
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 402 }
			retire = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 405 }
			promote_leader = yes
		}
		random_unit_leader = {
			limit = { has_id = 411 }
			remove_unit_leader_trait = RUS_kornilov_officer
			add_unit_leader_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		remove_ideas_with_trait = economy_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Nikanor_V_Savic_eco_pau
		remove_ideas_with_trait = security_minister
		add_ideas = RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_sec_pau
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectdenikin
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectwrangel
		clr_country_flag = RUS_selectsavinkov
		set_country_flag = RUS_duma_dissolved
		kill_country_leader = yes
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Drozdovsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_MIKHAIL_DROZDOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Drozdovsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = junta_subtype
		}
		create_country_leader = {
			name = "Mikhail Drozdovsky"
			desc = "POLITICS_MIKHAIL_DROZDOVSKY_DESC"
			picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Mikhail_Drozdovsky.png"
			expire = "1.1.1"
			ideology = militarism_subtype
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = "National Stabilization Regime"
			name = "Klika Drozdovskogo"
		}
		set_politics = {
			ruling_party = paternal_autocrat
			elections_allowed = no   
		}
	}
	
}

country_event = { #results of our initiative
	id = rusdroz.7
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdroz.7"}
	title = rusdroz.7.t 
	desc = { text = rusdroz.7.d_success trigger = { check_variable = { InitiativeFailed > 2 } } }
	desc = { text = rusdroz.7.d_fail trigger = { check_variable = { InitiativeFailed < 2 } } }
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #agree on his terms
		name = rusdroz.7.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					InitiativeFailed = 2
				}
			}
			uncomplete_national_focus = {
				focus = RUS_Rally_The_Monarchists
				uncomplete_children = yes
				refund_political_power = no
			}
			complete_national_focus = RUS_Drozdovtsy_Rule_Alone
			country_event = {
				id = rusdroz.8
				days = 4
			}
		}
		else = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_droz_monarchists_united
			add_political_power = 50
		}
	}
}

				NOT = { has_id = 411 }
			}
			set_nationality = MON
		}
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.12
			days = 4
		}
	}
	option = { #purge them and leave them
		name = rusdroz.11.c
		ai_chance = {
			base = 10
		}
		add_to_variable = { AntiDrozdovitesPlot = 1 }
		country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.12
			days = 4
		}
	}
}
	
country_event = { #purges check
	id = rusdroz.12
	immediate = {log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rusdroz.12"}
	title = rusdroz.12.t 
	desc = rusdroz.12.d 
	picture = GFX_rus_russia_flag_event
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = { #bruuh
		name = rusdroz.12.a
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = {
					AntiDrozdovitesPlot = 3
				}
			}
			country_event = {
			id = rusdroz.13
			days = 4
			}
		}
		else = {
			add_political_power = 50
			set_country_flag = RUS_droz_purges_complete 
			set_party_name = {
				ideology = national_populist
				long_name = "National Stabilization Regime"
				name = "Klika Drozdovskogo"
			}
			add_popularity = {
			ideology = national_populist
			popularity = 0.3
			}
			set_politics = {
				ruling_party = national_populist
				elections_allowed = no	
			}		
		}
	}
}

			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_trait = RUS_drozdovsky_officer
					has_id = 411
				}
			}
			retire = yes
		}
		set_country_flag = Mikhail_Drozdovskiy_dead
		set_country_flag = Aleksandr_P_Kutepov_dead
		set_country_flag = Anton_V_Turkul_dead						
		set_country_flag = Lavr_G_Kornilov_dead
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_idea = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
			}
			remove_ideas = RUS_Lavr_G_Kornilov_carm_pau
		}
		remove_ideas_with_trait = head_of_government
		add_ideas = RUS_Anton_I_Denikin_hog_pau
		hidden_effect = {
			effect_tooltip = { kill_country_leader = yes }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Anton Denikin"
				desc = "POLITICS_ANTON_DENIKIN_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/RUS/Portrait_RUS_Anton_Denikin.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = junta_subtype
			}
		country_event = {
			id = rusd.66
				days = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

				division_names_group = RUS_INF_01
				regiments = {
					militia = { x = 0 y = 0 }
					militia = { x = 0 y = 1 }
					militia = { x = 0 y = 2 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 0 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 1 }
					militia = { x = 1 y = 2 }
					militia = { x = 2 y = 0 }
					militia = { x = 2 y = 1 }
					militia = { x = 2 y = 2 }
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 219 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Otryad Chyornoy Sotni\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 3
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				prioritize = { 195 }
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Otryad Chyornoy Sotni\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"
					owner = ROOT
					count = 4
				}
			}
			random_owned_controlled_state = {
				limit = { valid_state_for_spawning_friendly_unit = yes }
				create_unit = {
					division = "division_template = \"Otryad Chyornoy Sotni\" start_experience_factor = 0.5"

				}
			}
		}

		set_party_name = {
			ideology = paternal_autocrat
			long_name = "Vserossiysky Narodny Soyuz (All-Russian Popular Union)"
			name = "VNS"
		}
		set_party_name = {
			ideology = national_populist
			long_name = "Vserossiysky Narodny Soyuz (All-Russian Popular Union)"
			name = "VNS"
		}
		add_soccon_to_coalition = yes
		add_pataut_to_coalition = yes
		add_natpop_to_coalition = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = RUS_Purishkevich_dead
					has_country_flag = Droz_Purishkevich_Failed
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_npo
				RUS_Vladimir_M_Purishkevich_sec_pau
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = Droz_Markov_Failed
				}
			}
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				RUS_Nikolay_E_Markov_hog_npo
				RUS_Aleksey_A_Ignatiev_for_pau 
				RUS_Vladimir_N_Kokovtsov_eco_npo
				RUS_Nikolay_P_Vladimir_sec_pau
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

			base = 50
			modifier = {
				factor = 1000

					rule = RUS_Monarch

				}
			}

country_event = { #Karelian crisis
	id = rus_karelian_crisis.25
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rus_karelian_crisis.25" }
	title = rus_karelian_crisis.25.t
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.25.d
		trigger = { original_tag = RUS }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.25.d.ger
		trigger = { original_tag = GER }
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	

	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.25.a
		add_stability = -0.02
		if = {
			limit = { original_tag = RUS }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_A
				GER = { 
					country_event = {
						id = rus_karelian_crisis.25 
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_A }
				}
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_AA
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_B }
				}
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BA
			}
			else = {
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CA
			}
			RUS = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
			FIN = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
			GER = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.25.b
		add_political_power = -25
		if = {
			limit = { original_tag = RUS }
			hidden_effect = {
				set_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_B
				GER = { 
					country_event = {
						id = rus_karelian_crisis.25 
						days = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_A }
				}
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_AB
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					RUS = { has_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_B }
				}
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BB
			}
			else = {
				set_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CB
			}
			RUS = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
			FIN = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
			GER = { country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.26 }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.25.c
		trigger = { original_tag = RUS }
		add_political_power = -50
		hidden_effect = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_C
			GER = { 
				country_event = {
					id = rus_karelian_crisis.25 
					days = 2
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { #Karelian crisis
	id = rus_karelian_crisis.26
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rus_karelian_crisis.26" }
	title = rus_karelian_crisis.26.t
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.26.d
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_AA 
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_AB 
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.26.d2
		trigger = { 
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BA 
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BB
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.26.d3
		trigger = { 
			has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CA
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.26.d4
		trigger = { 
			has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CB
		}
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	

	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.26.a
		trigger = { original_tag = FIN }		
		215 = {
			add_dynamic_modifier = {
				modifier = RUS_karelian_autonomy
			}
		}
		FIN = {
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = RUS
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = yes
			}
		}
		custom_effect_tooltip = tooltip_white_line 
		1326 = { 
			transfer_state_to = RUS
			enable_state_integration_80_compliance = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CB
			}
			1324 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
			147 = { set_demilitarized_zone = yes }
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_CA
			}
			1324 = { 
				transfer_state_to = RUS
				add_claim_by = RUS
				enable_state_integration_80_compliance = yes
			}
			147 = { 
				transfer_state_to = RUS
				add_claim_by = RUS
				enable_state_integration_80_compliance = yes
			}
			RUS = {
				every_owned_state = {
					limit = { is_claimed_by = FIN }
					remove_claim_by = FIN
				}
			}
			FIN = {
				set_country_flag = FIN_treaty_of_tampere_neutral_status
				set_rule = {
					desc = FIN_treaty_of_tampere_neutral_status
					can_join_factions = no
					can_not_declare_war = yes
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { 
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BA 
					has_global_flag = RUS_FIN_GER_treaty_of_tampere_BB
				}
			}
			1324 = { 
				transfer_state_to = RUS
				add_claim_by = RUS
				enable_state_integration_80_compliance = yes
			}
			722 = { transfer_state_to = FIN }
		}
		else = {
			722 = { transfer_state_to = FIN }
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.26.b
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { original_tag = FIN }		
		}		
		event_option_tooltip = rus_karelian_crisis.26.a
	}
}


country_event = { #Karelian crisis
	id = rus_karelian_crisis.27
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rus_karelian_crisis.27" }
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			FIN = { 
				remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = FIN_request_german_mediation }
			}
		}
	}
	title = rus_karelian_crisis.27.t
	desc = rus_karelian_crisis.27.d
			
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes 
	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = RUS_Karelian_Crisis_global
		russian_civil_war = no
		FIN = {
			is_valid_peace_target = yes
			has_war_with = RUS
		}
		RUS = { is_valid_peace_target = yes }
		OR = {
			#Finland loses
			OR = {
				surrender_progress > 0.2
				RUS = {
					count_triggers = {
						amount = 3
						controls_state = 1324
						controls_state = 146
						controls_state = 1326
						controls_state = 147
						controls_state = 1325
					}	
				}
			}
			#Finland wins
			OR = {
				AND = {
					RUS = { surrender_progress > 0.1 }
					controls_state = 195 #Petrograd
				}
				count_triggers = {
					amount = 3
					controls_state = 1328
					controls_state = 1327
					controls_state = 215
					controls_state = 216
					controls_state = 1274
					controls_state = 213
					controls_state = 195
					controls_state = 722
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.27.a
		trigger = { original_tag = FIN }
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { 
					#Finland loses
					OR = {
						surrender_progress > 0.2
						RUS = {
							count_triggers = {
								amount = 3
								controls_state = 1324
								controls_state = 146
								controls_state = 1326
								controls_state = 147
								controls_state = 1325
							}	
						}
					}
				}				
				if = {
					limit = { 
						RUS = { controls_state = 1324 }
					}
					1324 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						RUS = { controls_state = 1325 }
					}
					1325 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						RUS = { controls_state = 1326 }
					}
					1326 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						RUS = { controls_state = 147 }
					}
					147 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						RUS = { controls_state = 146 }
					}
					146 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
					1326 = { 
						transfer_state_to = RUS 
						add_claim_by = RUS
					}
				}
				FIN = { 
					if = {
						limit = { has_government = social_democrat }
						add_popularity = { ideology = social_democrat popularity = -0.15 }
						add_to_variable = { FIN_sdp_strength = -15 }
					}
					else = {
						add_to_variable = { FIN_kokoomus_strength = -15 }
					}
					#country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.29 
					#country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.30 
					#country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.31 
					#country_event = rus_karelian_crisis.32 
				}
			}	
			else = {
				every_state = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							state = 722
							state = 215
							state = 216
							state = 1327
							state = 1328
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { 
							FIN = { controls_state = PREV }
						}
						transfer_state_to = FIN
					}
				}				
			}
		}				
		RUS = { 
			white_peace_with_ROOT = yes 
			set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.27.a
		trigger = { original_tag = RUS }
		effect_tooltip = {
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 722
						state = 215
						state = 216
						state = 1327
						state = 1328
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						is_owned_by = RUS 
						is_controlled_by = FIN
					}
					transfer_state_to = FIN
				}
			}		
			every_state = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						state = 1324
						state = 1325
						state = 146
						state = 1326
						state = 147
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { 
						is_owned_by = FIN 
						is_controlled_by = RUS
					}
					transfer_state_to = RUS
					add_claim_by = RUS
				}
			}		
			FIN = { 
				white_peace_with_ROOT = yes 
				set_truce = { target = ROOT days = 730 }
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { #Karelian crisis
	id = rus_karelian_crisis.28
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rus_karelian_crisis.28" }
	title = rus_karelian_crisis.28.t
	desc = rus_karelian_crisis.28.d
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	

	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.28.a
		ai_chance = { 
			base = 99
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					RUS_dont_attack_if_vulnerable_or_preparing = yes
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_target_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_faction_is_stronger = yes }
					FROM = { RUS_dont_attack_if_overlord_is_stronger = yes }
				}
			}
		}
		add_stability = -0.05
		RUS_increase_ruling_party_pop_small = yes
		declare_war_on = {
			target = FROM
			type = annex_everything
		}
	}
	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.28.b
		ai_chance = { base = 1 }
		add_political_power = 15
	}	
}

		}
		add_political_power = -50
		add_stability = 0.05
		add_war_support = -0.15
	}	
}

country_event = { #Karelian crisis
	id = rus_karelian_crisis.32
	immediate = { log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: event rus_karelian_crisis.32" }
	title = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.32.t2
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	}
	title = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.32.t
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.32.d2
		trigger = { has_government = national_populist }
	}
	desc = {
		text = rus_karelian_crisis.32.d
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { has_government = national_populist }
		}
	}
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = FIN
		OR = {
			AND = {
				has_country_flag = FIN_lapua_movement_victory
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = FIN_crack_down_on_socialism }
			}
			AND = {
				has_government = totalist
				NOT = { has_completed_focus = FIN_second_red_terror }
			}
		}
	}

	option = { #
		name = rus_karelian_crisis.30.a
		decrease_ruling_party_popularity_by_20 = yes
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = FIN_lapua_movement_victory }
			clr_country_flag = FIN_lapua_movement_victory
			set_country_flag = FIN_socialist_victory_flag
			add_political_power = -100			
			add_popularity = { ideology = totalist popularity = 0.35 }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = totalist elections_allowed = no }
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				FIN_Tuomas_Hyrskymurto_hog_tot
				FIN_Arvo_Tuominen_for_tot
				FIN_Eero_Haapalainen_eco_tot
				FIN_Akseli_Anttila_sec_tot
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { country_exists = KAR }
					KAR = {
						country_event = {
							id = kar.26
							days = 1
						}
						country_event = {
							id = kar.72
							days = 60
							random_days = 40
						}
					}
				}
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = INT decision = fin_join_internationale }
				activate_targeted_decision = { target = RUS decision = fin_join_internationale }
			}
		}
		else = {
			clr_country_flag = FIN_socialist_victory_flag
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = INT decision = fin_join_internationale }
			remove_targeted_decision = { target = RUS decision = fin_join_internationale }			
			set_country_flag = FIN_lapua_movement_victory
			add_popularity = { ideology = national_populist popularity = 0.4 }
			set_politics = { ruling_party = national_populist elections_allowed = no }
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			remove_all_ministers = yes
			add_ideas = {
				FIN_Bruno_Salmiala_hog_npo
				FIN_Arne_Somersalo_for_npo
				FIN_Jussi_Muilu_eco_npo
				FIN_Vihtori_Kosola_sec_npo
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				country_event = { id = finland.14 days = 6 }
			}
		}		
		effect_tooltip = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 311 }
				remove_unit_leader = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			random_unit_leader = {
				limit = { has_id = 311 }
				set_nationality = NSW
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_idea = FIN_mounting_dissent_idea }
			remove_ideas = FIN_mounting_dissent_idea
		}
		if = {
			limit = { gives_military_access_to = GER }
			GER = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = FIN
					relation = military_access
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_military_access_to = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = military_access
				active = no
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { is_guaranteed_by = GER }
			GER = {
				diplomatic_relation = {
					country = FIN
					relation = guarantee
					active = no
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_non_aggression_pact_with = GER }
			diplomatic_relation = {
				country = GER
				relation = non_aggression_pact
				active = no
			}
		}
		remove_opinion_modifier = {
			target = GER
			modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
		}
		GER = {
			remove_opinion_modifier = {
				target = ROOT
				modifier = KR_approves_of_govt
			}
		}
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = GER decision = FIN_join_reichspakt }
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = SCA decision = fin_join_sdu }
		remove_targeted_decision = { target = SWE decision = fin_join_sdu }
		hidden_effect = {
			GER_leave_mitteleuropa = yes
			leave_faction = yes
			drop_cosmetic_tag = yes
			random_other_country = { news_event = worldnews.415 }
			create_country_leader = {
				name = "Juho Kusti Paasikivi"
				desc = "POLITICS_JUHO_KUSTI_PAASIKIVI_DESC"
				picture = "gfx/leaders/FIN/Portrait_FIN_Juho_Kusti_Paasikivi_KX.png"
				expire = "1.1.1"
				ideology = pataut_national_conservative_subtype
			}
		}
	}	
}

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = {
		name = rusdeminfo.11.a
		country_event = rusdeminfo.25
	}
}
